original: The Swiss Guard

The famous mercenaries of Switzerland - the Swiss Guards - are disciplined, loyal and employ revolutionary battle tactics which has given them the reputation of being the most powerful troops in the world. $MONARCHTITLE$, consider a pact with Switzerland, to provide us with a constant corps of Swiss mercenaries to protect $COUNTRY$ against hostile troops.
translation: 著名的瑞士雇佣兵——瑞士卫队——因他们的纪律、忠诚及对战术革命性的运用闻名，是世界上最强大的部队。$MONARCHTITLE$，考虑与瑞士签订一个协议，使我们可以得到源源不断的瑞士雇佣兵，保护$COUNTRY$免受敌军的侵略。

original: Send a legate to Switzerland to ask for the Swiss Guard.
translation: 向瑞士派遣使节以请求瑞士卫队的帮助。

original: Do nothing.
Pope asks for Swiss Guard

Our soldiers seek fortunes abroad and that has led to our troops getting reputation of being the most disciplined, loyal and powerful troops who employ revolutionary battle tactics. Many wishes to hire our troops, even the Pope who wishes to enter a pact with us. He asks that we provide [From.GetName] with a constant corps of Swiss mercenaries. This will surely increase our prestige and give us other favors.
translation: 随着我们的士兵不断地在海外寻求财富，这些部队渐渐以他们的纪律、忠诚以及对革命性战术的运用而闻名。许多人想要雇佣我们的部队，连教宗都想与我们签订协议。他请求我们为 [From.GetName] 提供源源不断的瑞士雇佣兵部队。这么做毫无疑问地会为我们带来更多的威望并获得更多的人情。

original: Send the guards to the Pope.
No, we need them more.
Switzerland sends Swiss Guard

The messenger from Switzerland has arrived, and announced that they agree to the pact. He adds; 'The Swiss see the sad situation of the Church of God, Mother of Christianity, and realize how grave and dangerous it is that any tyrant, avid for wealth, can assault with impunity, the common Mother of Christianity.'
translation: 瑞士的回信来了，告诉我们他们已经同意了这一协议。他还说：「瑞士已经把上帝的教会，基督教之母所处的令人悲伤的境地看在了眼里。我们也意识到了任何一位利欲熏心的暴君都可以在践踏了基督教的共同母亲之后仍然逍遥法外这一沉重而危险的事实。」

original: We are most grateful for this!
No Swiss Guard
Due to the excellence of the Swiss mercenaries and the high demand from other countries, Switzerland has rejected our pact and refuses to send any corps to our defense.
translation: 由于瑞士雇佣兵优秀的质量和来自其他国家的大量需求，瑞士拒绝了我们的协议，并且不会给我们送来任何部队。

original: But... we need them!
Passetto di Borgo

Pope Nicholas III erected the passage Passetto di Borgo, which links the Vatican City with the Castel Sant'Angelo in 1277. Many Popes have used it as an escape route when in danger, and now it is the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s turn! Rome is lost, and the enemy has entered the palace to arrest the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 教宗尼古拉三世在1277年修建了这条连接梵蒂冈城和圣天使堡的博尔戈通道。历史上许多教宗在身陷危险中时都将这条通道作为逃跑的路线，而现在轮到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]了！罗马已经沦陷，敌人已经闯入宫殿准备逮捕 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: Flee through the passage!
Stay. We have nothing to fear.
translation: 留下来吧，我们已经没有什么好怕的了

original: Cardinal-Nephew

The long tradition of appointing a nephew or other relative to the College of Cardinals is an easy way to make sure that family members are well cared for. Popes Gregory IX, Alexander IV, Adrian V, Gregory XI, Boniface IX, Innocent VII and Eugene IV have all promoted relatives to cardinals, especially nephews, thus the name Cardinal-Nephew. It is said that the first Cardinal-Nephew was Lotario, cousin of Pope Benedict VIII. The promotions of papal relatives to the College of Cardinals became common in the 13th century and now there's an opening for a Cardinal [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] should consider whether or not a relative of his should get the appointment. Of course, the ruler must be asked beforehand, and if they refuse we can do nothing.
translation: 任命自己的侄子为枢机团成员这一悠久的传统是教宗保证自己的家庭成员被精心照料的最简单的方法。教宗格里高利九世，亚历山大四世，阿德里安五世，格里高利十一世，卜尼法斯九世，英诺森七世和尤金四世都曾把自己的亲戚提名为枢机团成员，其中尤以侄子为多，所以才有了侄子枢机这一说法。据称第一个侄子枢机是教宗本笃八世的侄子洛塔里奥。到了13世纪，将教宗的亲戚任命为枢机团成员变得更加普遍了。现在，枢机团中出现了一个空位。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 应该好好想想应不应该把自己的一位亲戚任命为枢机。当然，我们必须提前取得该地方统治者的同意，否则我们什么也做不了。

original: No, this is a tradition we should end.
translation: 不，这一传统不能再延续下去。

original: Let us ask him if our nephew may become the new Cardinal.
translation: 让我们问问他，我们的侄子能否成为新任枢机。

original: A Cardinal-Nephew from the Pope
translation: 一位教宗家的侄子枢机

original: The [From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] is asking us to appoint his Cardinal-Nephew to [Root.GetName] as Cardinal. It is a very common practice among Popes to elevate a relative, most often a nephew, to Cardinal. Benedict VIII's cousin Lotario was first one to be appointed Cardinal-Nephew in 1015.
translation: [From.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Owner.Monarch.GetName] 请求我们把他的侄子任命为 [Root.GetName] 的枢机。教宗把自己的亲戚（通常是侄子）任命为枢机是一个非常普遍的做法。1015年，本笃八世的侄子洛塔里奥成为了第一个被任命的侄子枢机。

original: Accept the Pope's Cardinal-Nephew.
translation: 同意教宗的侄子担任枢机。

original: Refuse.
Accepted Cardinal-Nephew
[From.Owner.GetName] has accepted the nephew as the new Cardinal in [From.GetName].
translation: [From.Owner.GetName]已经同意让教宗的侄子担任[From.GetName]的新枢机。

original: Perfect!
Refused Cardinal-Nephew
[From.Owner.GetName] has refused to appoint the nephew to Cardinal in [From.GetName].
translation: [From.Owner.GetName]已经拒绝让教宗的侄子担任[From.GetName]的枢机。

original: How disappointing.
Sack of Rome

The recent battle has left the city of Rome in shambles, an event that will soon be known as the Sack of Rome. Mutinous troops of our enemy desired the sack and pillage of our rich city that for them appeared to be an easy target. The troops were joined by deserters and numerous bandits and their number soon greatly outnumbered ours. Our massive walls and strong artillery force at first seemed capable to repel the attackers, and when their commander was fatally wounded in the first assault we thought they would retreat, but no. Their restraint disappeared when their commander fell, and the soldiers captured the walls of Rome the same day. On the steps of St Peter's Basilica, our last few guards met a ghastly end, slaughtered before the pillage began. Destruction, looting and executions followed until, at last, the bandits, deserters, soldiers and looters began their long trek home with what valuables they managed to pilfer.
translation: 刚刚结束的战斗让罗马淹沦为了废墟，这一事件不久后就将被称作罗马之劫。敌人哗变的军队想要劫掠我们富饶的城市，他们似乎以为这是一件很好得手的目标。在许多逃兵和强盗加入了敌人的队伍中后，他们的人数迅速超过了我军。我们坚实的城墙与强大的火炮在一开始看起来足以击退这些攻击者，在他们的指挥官在第一次进攻中受了致命伤后，我们以为他们将要撤退，但他们并没有。指挥官的倒下让士兵们丧失了最后一丝理智，在当天罗马的城墙就落入了他们的手中。在圣彼得大教堂的台阶上，我们最后的几名卫兵的惨死宣告了劫难的开始。破坏，洗劫和屠杀持续了数天，直到这些强盗，逃兵，士兵和掠夺者满载着价值连城的赃物开始回家的旅途后才结束。

original: Hire more soldiers to ensure the Sack of Rome will never happen again.
translation: 雇佣更多的军队，为保证罗马之劫永远不会再次发生。

original: Repair the damage done to the city, that is all we can do.
translation: 我们能做的就只有修复被破坏的城市了。

original: The Vatican Library

It is not yet formally established, though our library contains a multitude of manuscripts, books, edifices and other written works. Right now the books are scattered in Rome, Avignon and elsewhere, but if we collect them in our capital and add to it, our great library could become one of the greatest since the Royal Library of Alexandria. The founding of the Vatican Library could re-establish $CAPITAL$ as a destination for scholarship.
translation: 虽然我们的图书馆还未正式成立，但是在它金碧辉煌的大厦中已经储藏了大量的手稿，书籍和其他文学作品。现在许多书籍散落于罗马，阿维尼翁等地，只要我们能够将它们收集并储存起来，我们华丽的图书馆就将成为自亚历山大图书馆以来最伟大的图书馆。梵蒂冈图书馆的建立可以使$CAPITAL$重新变成天下学子趋之若鹜之地。

original: Establish it, and focus on administrative works.
translation: 建立它，并专注于行政著作。

original: The focus should be on diplomatic works.
translation: 重点应该放在外交工作上。

original: Fund a library about the military arts.
translation: 建立一座有关军事艺术的图书馆。

original: We will need to think more about this.
Sistine Chapel

The Cappella Maggiore - the Greater Chapel - is used for masses that can be held in smaller, less public spaces than the Basilicas. The years have not been gentle to the once magnificent chapel that was decorated by Fra Angelico, its walls are leaning and it is in ruinous state. The chapel should be demolished, the structure is not safe enough for the many masses that are held there every year. A new, more magnificent building should take its place, and there are many famous artists that would be honored if they were asked to decorate the new Sistine Chapel.
translation: 「Cappella Maggiore」——「大礼拜堂」是为了在比圣伯多禄大殿小些、隐秘些的地方举行弥撒而准备的。岁月并没有放过这座装饰着弗拉·安杰利科的画的华丽礼拜堂——它破败的墙壁业已倾斜，其结构不能保障一年几度的弥撒能安全举行，是时候把它拆除并兴建一座更加瑰丽的崭新礼拜堂了。为新的西斯廷礼拜堂做装饰即便对画界名流来说也是不可多得的荣誉。

original: Demolish the old and build the new on the same place.
translation: 重新拆建这座旧礼拜堂。

original: Just stop using the old chapel, there are other buildings we can use.
translation: 别用老礼拜堂就好了，我们又不是没有其他地方可以做弥撒。

original: Decorate the Sistine Chapel

The old, decrepit Cappella Maggiore is no more - in its place the grand Sistine Chapels now stands. The Temple of Solomon and the Sistine Chapels are the same dimensions, as given in the Old Testament. The exterior is unadorned by decorative details, the building divided into three stories with a vaulted ceiling and six tall arched windows on the sides, two on either end. Although beautiful in its simplicity, the chapel's beauty could be enhanced by frescoes painted by the foremost artists of our time.
translation: 那座破旧的大礼拜堂已经不复存在了——崭新瑰丽的西斯廷大礼拜堂拔地而起。它可与旧约中所记载的所罗门神殿媲美。礼拜堂的外墙还未经雕饰，在宏伟的拱顶下其内部被分为三层，左右两侧各有六扇拱形的窗户，前后则各有两扇。虽然其简约之美就足以令人迷醉，但如果我们能请来本时代最伟大的艺术家来为这座礼拜堂装饰壁画，那么它的美丽一定会更加耀人。

original: Hire Sandro Botticelli.
Hire Domenico Ghirlandaio.
translation: 雇佣多梅尼哥·基尔兰达约。

original: Hire Pietro Perugino.
Hire Michelangelo.
Just find someone to decorate the chapel!
translation: 随便找一个人来装饰就行了！

original: Leave it as it is, we need not do it now.
translation: 就这样吧，我们不需要现在就装饰。

original: Indulgences - to sell or not?

Many countries have started to sell indulgences for money, so that the rich may save their souls and continue living in sin. This practice guides a lot of money to the coffers of the Church, and while some condemn it, others think it should be allowed.
translation: 许多国家都开始出售赎罪券，让那些自以为可以如此「拯救」自己灵魂的有钱人继续活在罪恶之中。虽然有些人谴责这一行为，但由于教会的金库也因此而充实起来，许多人认为应该允许出售赎罪券。

original: We forbid this practice!
Money makes the world go around...
Simony Judged

In the Acts of the Apostles 8:9-24, Simon Magus offered the two disciples Peter and John money if they empowered him to impart the power of the Holy Spirit to anyone he placed his hands on. This act, of selling spiritual things such as church offices and roles, is called Simony after this man and many a ruler has been swayed by the glimmer of gold to sell bishop seats.
translation: 在《使徒行传》第八章第九至二十四节中，术士西蒙试图用金钱收买彼得和约翰两名门徒，希望能够得到授权，使他能给触摸过的人传授圣灵的力量。买卖圣职 (Simony)，用金钱购买教职、圣职等宗教职位的行为，之后就以他的名字命名。许多利欲熏心的统治者就被金钱所迷惑，卖出了主教的职位。

original: We will treat this as the crime it is!
translation: 我们会把这种行为看作犯罪！

original: This is a practice we will allow.
translation: 我们将会允许这种行为。

original: Veneration of Relics - allow or disallow?
translation: 敬奉圣髑——该不该被允许？

original: Churches has always kept relics from saints, to venerate and in some cases use to heal the sick and infirm. This long practice has now been challenged, and some believe it to be idolatry, a heresy that should be banned. The selling of relics has made many a church rich, and if the Pope were to publicly announce his support of this practice, some of that money would find its way to our coffers.
translation: 教会中长久以来就有保存圣人遗物的习惯，一方面为了供人敬奉，一方面也用来治疗病人和体弱者。这一悠久的传统如今受到了质疑，许多人认为这是应该被禁止的异端——偶像崇拜。买卖圣髑让许多教会富有了起来，如果教宗正式地表明他对此行为的支持，那么这些钱的一部分说不定会跑到我们的教会财产中。

original: Prevent the sale of relics!
We will grow richer if we allow and practice this.
translation: 如果我们允许并实践这一行为，那么我们也会变得更加富裕。

original: Galileo Galilei

The notion that the Earth and the planets would revolve around the Sun is an idea Nicolaus Copernicus first wrote about in his book 'De revolutionibus orbium coelestium' in 1543 and now Galileo Galilei has promoted it again, in his book 'Sidereus Nuncius' - 'Starry Messenger'! His controversial championing of this has given him many enemies in the Catholic Church, and although we admit that he would be a most interesting debate opponent, maybe we should be cautious and just imprison him to stop his ideas to reach the public?
translation: 尼古拉斯·哥白尼在1543的《天体运行论》中第一次提出的地球与其他行星一起围绕太阳旋转的学说。现在该理论在伽利略·伽利莱的著作《星际信使》中被再一次推广了！他对这一学说的支持使得他在天主教会中树立了许多敌人。虽然我们承认他会是一个有趣的辩论对手，但是也许我们应该小心行事，直接将他关进监狱来避免这一言论流传至公众耳中。

original: Invite him to discuss theology.
He must be put to trial.
Sublimis Deus

It is to our dismay that we have learnt that Catholic countries have enslaved the Indians of the West and the South to use them as a cheap work source. Granted that earlier Popes have allowed this, as they argued that these new people were not truly human and possessed no souls. The New Testament says that the gospel has been preached to all nations and since they do not believe in our God, perhaps they do not count. Humanity is divided into three race, Europeans, Asians, and Africans, one for each of the sons of Noah, and the Indians of the Americas do not fit among these divisions. Now that we know that these pagans can be converted, it is time to revision our old beliefs and acknowledge these as humans, with souls, who God has a purpose for.
translation: 对于许多天主教国家将西方和南方的印第安人奴役并用作廉价劳动力的做法我们感到十分的遗憾。由于之前普遍认为他们不是真正的人类，且没有灵魂，所以此举被教宗允许。新约中说福音已经被传至了所有的国家，所以若他们不相信我们的上帝，那么他们也不配算作人类。人类被分为由诺亚的三个儿子分为三个种族，分别是欧洲人，亚洲人和非洲人，然而新大陆的印第安人并不符合任何一个类别。现在既然我们知道了这些异教徒是可以被感化的，那么是时候改变我们的想法并将他们看作上帝所创造的，拥有灵魂的人类了。

original: Condemn it and make sure every Catholic knows that it is wrong.
translation: 谴责这种行为，让所有天主教徒知道这样做是不对的。

original: Their purpose is slavery.
translation: 这些人的唯一用处就是奴隶。

original: The Pope Condemns Slavery
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has issued a new papal bull, the Sublimis Deus, which forbids the enslavement of the Indians of the West and the South and all other people.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 刚刚颁布了新的教宗诏书《崇高的神》，其中禁止了把西方和南方的印第安人和其他任何一种人用作奴隶的行为。

original: Accept the papal bull.
Refuse and continue the slavery of these people.
translation: 拒绝并继续对这些人的奴役。

original: [From.GetName] Follows the Pope's Decree
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] will condemn slavery.
Excellent!
[From.GetName] Disregards the Pope's Decree
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] refuses to condemn the slavery of the Indians of the West and South.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]拒绝谴责西部和南部印第安人的奴役制度。

original: How can they not!?
Witch Trials

People in provinces suffering from famine, disease and unfortunate events claim that sorcery and witchcraft are behind their misery. Women, children and men have been accused of being witches, of worshiping the Devil and being a threat to Christendom. It has gone so far that people have lynched alleged witches without a proper trial!
translation: 许多省份中的那些饱受饥荒，疾病与厄运折磨的人们都认为他们的痛苦是由巫术与魔法造成的。他们指控了许多女人，儿童与男人，声称他们是崇拜魔鬼，危害基督教的巫师。愤怒的民众甚至对那些所谓的「巫师」在未经审判的情况下动用了私刑！

original: There are no such things as sorcery and witches!
translation: 世上根本就没有什么巫术和魔法！

original: We will not interfere, not now.
translation: 我们不会干涉，至少现在不会。

original: Send a messenger to the Pope, to ask for advice.
translation: 派遣使者向教宗寻求建议。

original: Do nothing about it.
Pope Condemns Witch Trials

The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has sent a messenger to discuss the recent witch hunts in our country. He strongly condemns the witch trials, especially the lynchings that have occured when suffering people have taken it into their own hands to punish alleged witches. 'There are no such things as witches and sorcery, only superstitions and the blame that suffering people wish to lay on innocent women, children and men'. We might not agree with this sentiment, but [From.Monarch.GetName] is the [From.Monarch.GetTitle]...
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 派遣了一名使者来讨论最近在我们国家发生的猎巫事件。他强烈地谴责了女巫审判，尤其是当受难的民众亲手对这些所谓的「巫师」所动用的私刑。「这世上根本就没有巫师与魔术，只有迷信与受苦难的人们想要归咎于这些无辜男人，女人和儿童身上的责任。」我们也许对这种看法不敢苟同，但毕竟 [From.Monarch.GetName] 是 [From.Monarch.GetTitle]……

original: Stop the witch hunts and trials!
translation: 马上停止对巫师的审判！

original: The witches are to blame for our suffering, this cannot stop!
translation: 这些巫师应该为我们所受的苦难负责，审判不能停止！

original: $FROMCOUNTRY$ Stops the Witch Trials
No More Witch Trials!
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has stopped the witch hunts in $FROMCOUNTRY$ and proclaimed that sorcery and witchcraft are nothing more than silly superstitions.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经禁止了在$FROMCOUNTRY$的女巫审判，并宣称所谓的巫术和魔法只不过是愚蠢的迷信。

original: That is wonderful!
What? How dare [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] go against the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]?
$FROMCOUNTRY$ Allows Witch Trials
Witch trials for all!
translation: 所有巫师都要接受审判！

original: The suffering of [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]'s people has hardened [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] heart and the witch trials will continue in $FROMCOUNTRY$.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]的人民所受的苦难坚定了[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]的信念。$FROMCOUNTRY$将会继续进行女巫审判！

original: This is not what we decreed!
Excellent!
Witch Trials in $FROMCOUNTRY$

[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] is asking the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] for advice about the recent witch hunts and trials. The people of $FROMCOUNTRY$ are blaming the famines, diseases and other unfortunate events on sorcery and witchcraft. The sufferings have led to women, children and men being accused of worshiping the Devil and being a threat to Christendom. Should they be banned, these witch hunts and trials, or should the people be allowed to hunt, pursue, lay blame and punish people that might be innocent or not of witchcraft?
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 正在向 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 请求有关最近的女巫审判的意见。$FROMCOUNTRY$ 的人民将饥荒，疾病与其他的厄运归咎于巫术和魔法作崇。他们指控许多女人，儿童与男人崇拜魔鬼和危害基督教。女巫审判是否应该被禁止？还是说我们应该允许人民抓获，追捕，谴责并惩罚那些也许是无辜或者是不使巫术的人们？

original: Condemn the witch hunts and trials!
translation: 谴责女巫狩猎与女巫审判！

original: The people should be allowed to continue this practice.
translation: 我们应该允许人们继续这么做。

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle]: Condemn Witch Trials

After asking [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] for advice on the whole witch situation, about whether or not we should continue with our witch hunts and trials, we waited long for the answer. It finally arrived, with the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] signature at the end of the official document. 'Cease with the witch hunts and trials immediately!'
translation: 在向 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 请求了有关巫师以及是否应该禁止女巫审判的意见后，我们等了很长时间。写有 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 署名的官方文件终于到达了：「立即停止对巫师的追捕与审判！」

original: We obey.
We decline.
[From.Monarch.GetTitle]: Allow witch trials

The message from the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] was very clear, sorcery and witchcraft should be pursued, the accused ones tried and the guilty ones punished for their sinful deeds. All who worship the Devil, attend witches' Sabbaths and threaten Christendom will burn in Hell!
translation: 从 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 寄来的信是十分简单明了的：我们应该追捕那些行巫术和魔法的人，审判他们并惩罚那些有罪的人。所有崇拜魔鬼，参加女巫的集会和威胁基督教的人都将在地狱的烈火中燃烧！

original: We understand, and we accept.
No, we refuse!
The Rival's Pope

The former Papal controller is a rival of our current, and there are plenty of decisions, papal bulls and decrees of the last [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] that can be made undone. This would soil the former [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s reputation and make him look incompetent, which would be looked upon with gratitude and approval from our current Papal controller.
translation: 前任教廷监护是现任的教廷监护的宿敌，因此现在可以将前任教廷监护[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的许多决定，诏书与法令废除。这样可以抹黑[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的名声，让他显得无能，而现任教廷监护也会对此表示感激和认同。

original: Then we will erase his deeds.
translation: 我们会所有与他相关的条例全部废除。

original: Every Pope should be respected, even the bad ones.
translation: 每个教宗——即使是昏庸的教宗，都应该受到尊敬。

original: Rivalry between Popes

The previous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] was controlled by one of our rivals, and if [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] were to erase the work he has done by dissolving decisions, cancel Papal bulls and dismissing decrees of his, then it would soil the reputation of both the previous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] and our rival!
translation: 前一任 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 的教宗是我们的宿敌，如果 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 能通过撤销决定，取消诏书和解除法令来抹去上一任教宗的工作，那么我们就可以抹黑上一任 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 和我们的宿敌的名誉！

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] erased the former Pope's decisions!
He did nothing!?
Papal Rivalry

The current Papal controller is pressuring [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] to undo decisions, papal bulls and decrees of the previous [From.Monarch.GetTitle] who we were Papal controller of. It would soil our and our [From.Monarch.GetTitle]'s reputation, making us both look incompetent!
translation: 现任的教宗正在迫使 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 撤销上一任由我们担任教廷监护的 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 的决定，诏书和法令。这么做会使得我和我们的 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] 的名声都受到损害，并让我们看起来碌碌无能！

original: The bast... [From.Monarch.GetName] actually did it!
translation: 那个混账…… [From.Monarch.GetName]真的这么做了！

original: Thankfully, [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] refused!
Sent Swiss Guard
No Swiss Guard
The Swiss Guard
Disciplined, loyal and with revolutionary battle tactics - the Swiss Guards are the most powerful troops in the world.
translation: 纪律，忠诚和革命性的战斗战术——瑞士卫队是世界上最强大的部队。

original: Pope's Pet
The Vatican Library - Military Edition

Focusing on military works and encouraging research in the art of war, the recently founded Vatican Library will become the foremost collection of books on war, soldiers, the army and military practices in the world.
translation: 最近成立的梵蒂冈图书馆将成为战争，技术，军队和世界军事实践等书籍最重要的收藏地,并着眼于军事著作和鼓励研究战术当中。

original: The Vatican Library - Diplomatic Edition

Diplomats are encouraged to write about their journeys, negotiations and daily work which will then be published and added to the Vatican Library. Using these works, scholars can analyze and do research to determine various practices of diplomacy and when, how and why they work best.
translation: 鼓励外交官进行书写成作，然后予以公布，并加入到梵蒂冈图书馆的收藏，协商和日常工作中。通过这些作品，学者可以分析和研究，以确定外交在何时，何地以及何人上采用什么方式是他们最好的工作做法。

original: The Vatican Library - Administrative Edition
A great collection of books, manuscripts and documents of all kinds, most about administrative works, is the core of the new Vatican Library.
translation: 书籍、手稿和各种文档的大集合，大多数是关于行政工作的，这也是新的梵蒂冈图书馆的中心目标。

original: Sistine Chapel
On the site where the old Cappella Maggiore once stood, derelict and ruinous, the new grand Sistine Chapel now stands.
translation: 往日破败的大礼拜堂旧址上，崭新的大西斯廷礼拜堂巍然屹立。

original: Sistine Chapel decorated by Botticelli
translation: 波提切利装饰的西斯廷礼拜堂

original: The walls of the Sistine Chapel are now decorated with frescos by Sandro Botticelli. His contributions are the 'Temptations of Christ', the 'Punishment of the Rebels' and 'Trial of Moses'.
translation: 西斯廷教堂的墙壁用了桑德罗·波提切利的壁画装饰。他贡献了「耶稣受魔鬼试探」 「造反者的处罚」和「摩西的试炼」三幅画作。

original: Sistine Chapel decorated by Ghirlandaio
translation: 基尔兰达约装饰的西斯廷礼拜堂

original: The great artist Domenico Ghirlandaio was part of the team of Florentine and Umbrian painters who created a series of frescoes on the walls of the Sistine Chapel of the lives of Moses and Jesus. He painted the 'Vocation of the Apostles' and the 'Resurrection of Christ'.
translation: 伟大的艺术家多梅尼科基尔兰达约是佛罗伦萨和翁布里亚美术协会的一员，他们创造了一系列的壁画。摩西和耶稣的西斯廷大教堂的墙壁上画的「复活的基督」的「使徒的职业」就是由他贡献的。

original: Sistine Chapel decorated by Perugino
translation: 佩鲁吉诺的西斯廷教堂装饰

original: The Umbrian painter Pietro Perugino painted the Sistine Chapel's altar wall with the 'Assumption', the 'Nativity', and 'Moses in the Bulrushes'. The frescoes he painted on the walls were 'Moses and Zipporah', the 'Baptism of Christ', and 'Delivery of the Keys'.
translation: 在西斯廷教堂坛墙上的「圣母升天」「耶稣诞生」和「摩西在蒲草」中。翁布里亚画家彼得佩鲁吉诺贡献了墙壁上的壁画「摩西与西坡拉」「基督的洗礼」以及「交付的钥匙」。

original: Sistine Chapel decorated by Michelangelo
translation: 米开朗基罗的西斯廷教堂装饰

original: Michelangelo has repainted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel, which was painted as golden stars on a blue sky before. Now it is painted with scenes from Genesis, the Creation, the Fall of Man, the Promise of Salvation through the prophets, and the genealogy of Christ.
translation: 在粉刷一新的西斯廷大教堂中.之前画成金色的星星在蓝天的天花板已经由米开朗基罗的从创世纪，创造，人类的堕落，通过先知的救赎的应许，和基督的家谱。所替代.

original: Sistine Chapel Decorated
A team of Umbrian and Florentine painters have painted the walls of the Sistine Chapel with a series of frescoes of the lives of Moses and Jesus.
translation: 一个翁布里亚和佛罗伦萨画家组成的团队画了一系列的摩西和耶稣的生命壁画来装饰西斯廷教堂的墙壁。

original: Selling of Indulgences
The Selling of Indulgences gives a welcomed revenue to our treasure coffers and allows the rich to save their souls and continue living in sin.
translation: 赎罪券的销售提供了一个客观的收入来充实库房，并允许富人拯救他们的灵魂，继续与他们的罪孽生活。

original: Simony
The gold from selling church offices and roles fills our coffers.
translation: 教会大小圣职的赎买将充实我们的金库。

original: Veneration of Relics
Relics from Saints, that is to say, physical remains such as bones or personal effects, are sold by churches and slowly making them rich.
translation: 从圣徒的遗物.也就是说身体遗留的如骨头或毛发以及个人的物品来由教会出售，慢慢使他们变得富有。

original: This disables the event 'Selling of Indulgences' for Catholic countries.
translation: 这将禁用天主教国家的「出售赎罪券」事件。

original: This disables the event 'Simony' for Catholic countries.
translation: 这将禁用天主教国家的“西摩尼”事件。

original: This disables the event 'Veneration of Relics' for Catholic countries.
translation: 这将禁用天主教国家的“圣物崇拜”事件。

original: Condemned Slavery
Allows Slavery
Condemned Slavery
The Pope has decreed that the abhorrent practice of slavery should be prohibited and that slave trade should be outlawed.
translation: 教宗颁布了法令，禁止奴隶制度的可憎行径，取缔奴隶交易。

original: Condemned Witch Trials
Condemned Witch Trials
Allows Witch Trials
Allows Witch Trials
Razing Power Gain
Looting Speed
Erased the Rival Pope's desicions
Erased our Pope's decisions
Did not erase the rival's Pope's decisions
translation: 没有推翻宿敌的教宗的决策

original: Did not erase our former Pope's desicions
translation: 没有推翻前任教宗的决策

original: Cardinal Nephew
General Hospital

A suggestion has been put forward to set up a general hospital, to create a place where the needy would be welcomed and assisted. The public health is very important, and to offer a free midwifery course and some establishments to combat disease would increase the well-being of everyone.
translation: 公众健康是非常重要的，有人已经提出建议建立一个综合医院，要创造一个有需要的人将受到欢迎和帮助的地方。提供免费的助产学课程和抗击疾病会让民众更加幸福。

original: If this should improve the public health, then what are we waiting for? Do it!
translation: 如果这能改善公众健康，那我们还等什么呢？那就去做吧！

original: Prayer will solve all their problems, do not waste money on that!
translation: 祷告将解决所有的问题，不要花冤枉钱！

original: Fort Maintenance

Our forts are the most important defense we have against intruders and enemies, but they are in great need of restoration. We would need to increase our taxes in order to fund this, and that will most certainly upset those who pay taxes.
translation: 我们的堡垒是最重要的防线，我们可以依托它抵御入侵者和敌人，但它们非常需要修缮及维护。我们需要增加对堡垒的资源投入，但这肯定会打乱社会收入。

original: We need this, ignore the rabble!
translation: 我们需要这个,无视暴民

original: Do what is possible with the money we already have.
Modernization of the Forts

The forts no longer look as if they would crumble before our eyes, they are now sturdy enough to withstand most attacks to their walls. Their defenses, although now functional and impressive despite their age, are still lacking in comparison to other nation's forts. We would need to dig deep into the pockets of our taxpayers in order to be able to fund the upgrades and the modernization our forts sorely need.
translation: 堡垒不再看起来好像要在我们的眼前崩溃，他们现在坚固的可以抵御大多数攻击。它们的防御功能虽然不错但令人印象深刻的年龄却不能忽视，而且仍然不能跟其他民族的堡垒做比较。我们需要挖掘我们纳税人的口袋来升级我们的堡垒现代化。

original: It is for the greater good... who wants to be invaded?
translation: 这是更大的好处.谁想被入侵？

original: They are good enough as they are.
Too High Taxes

It's hard to hear the citizens rage against the raised taxes from the high, high walls and inside the thick, thick towers of our restored forts, but we do hear them threatening revolt and rebellion unless we lower the taxes.
translation: 高墙内厚,堡垒恢复了厚塔.但人民愤怒的表示税收太高了,我们也确实听到他们威胁起义和反抗,除非我们降低税收.

original: We hear, and we reluctantly oblige.
translation: 我们听到了，无奈地接受了要求。

original: Say what? WE CANNOT HEAR YOU!
translation: 说什么？我们没有听见这样的声音

original: Embellishment of Forts
A gift of a stained-glass was placed in one of our forts, and the effect is exquisite. So exquisite, in fact, that we consider embellishing every fort we own with our sigil in stained-glass.
translation: 彩色玻璃装饰在了我们的一个要塞，并且效果精美。事实上，如此精致的东西我们应该把我们的每一个堡垒都该点缀着彩色玻璃的印记。

original: Vanity is a sin, even if it is for a fort!
translation: 虚荣是一种罪过，而且它是一个要塞！

original: Just increase the taxes to pay for it.
The Quest for Religious Freedom

A man known for his radical ideas about religious reforms is condemning the priests and the [Root.Religion.GetName] doctrines in his sermons. This has led to widespread complaints and demands for religious freedom from our not-so-loyal citizens.
translation: 有人知道关于宗教改革的事情，他的激进思想和言论正在谴责和布道正在攻击 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的教义. 这导致了更多人的抱怨以及对宗教自由的诉求，这些正让我们的人民变得不那么忠诚了.

original: Our country is [Root.Religion.GetName] and will always be [Root.Religion.GetName]!
Concede full religious freedom to the city.
False Beliefs

One of [Root.GovernmentName]'s purposes is to spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and protect it from heresy. It is a noble cause, but when heresy strikes in the very heart of our country it shames us. One of our provinces does not follow the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith and as our cause is to spread the true faith we must deal with this or be forever shamed.
translation: [Root.GovernmentName] 的目的是传播 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的信仰并保护其免遭异端邪说的侵蚀，这是一项崇高的事业.但当异端们罢工并攻击我们的城市的时候这让我们开始蒙羞。并且我们的一些省份开始不遵循 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的信仰跟教义.我们是否应该坚持传播真正的信仰并且处理好这些事.

original: Send missionaries and increase efforts to convert the heretics.
translation: 派遣传教士加大力度支持转换异端。

original: Then we shall be ashamed.
Forgery of Documents

It was a common defense against annexation and usurpation to forge documents, have them counterfeited or backdated to corroborate one's arguments during times of struggles for expansion of land or privileges. Even now these questionable methods are used, and even we ponder if this practice should benefit us. Hopefully no one will detect the discrepancies...
translation: 这是一个共同防御兼并篡夺伪造的文件，伪造或追溯证实某人在领土扩张的时代有过特殊的斗争。让我们思考这些问题是否能够被利用，如果这种做法能够让我们受益。那我们应该祈祷上帝不要让人发现这些文件的伪造.

original: Forge those documents.
Keep that filth out of our archives!
The forgery might be discovered...
Forged Documents

Despite our best efforts in concealing the forgery, the counterfeit, the backdated documents, we were exposed. All we wanted to do was to protect [Root.Country.GetName] from those who would seek to annex and usurp our provinces.
translation: 尽管我们尽了最大努力销毁文件,但我们还是暴露了。我们现在要做的就是从那些想吞并我们省份的人手上保卫[Root.Country.GetName] 。

original: Bribe, blackmail, beat anyone who let this secret slip!
translation: 贿赂，敲诈，威胁任何泄密的人！

original: The Local Noble

[Root.Heir.GetName] quickly gained the trust and favor of the people of [Root.Country.GetName], especially the local aristocrats who [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] belonged to before becoming the heir to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. This has helped us regain authority and our hold on the rule is greater than ever.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName] 迅速赢得了[Root.Country.GetName] 人民的拥戴信任和支持， 特别是在当地贵族 [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] 成为 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的继承人之前， 这帮助我们重拾了我们的权威，同时我们也已变得比以往更加强大。

original: How fortunate for us that we have chosen [Root.Heir.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我们选择了 [Root.Heir.GetHerHim]是一件多么幸运的事情!

original: The Foreign Noble

Along with a great mind for diplomacy, military advancement and administration, the heir to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Heir.GetName], also brought alliances and connections to foreign courts that might prove indispensible.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，[Root.Heir.GetName]，除了带来伟大的外交、军事进步和管理思想之外，也带来了可能是不可或缺的盟友，或者与其他外国王室的荫亲。

original: We had our doubts about [Root.Heir.GetHerHim], but they are long gone now.
translation: 我们曾怀疑 [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] ，但他们早已经走了。

original: The Merchant's Son

A shrewd mind for negotiations and a talent for bargaining that must come from [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] merchant parents have made burghers, free peasants and the nobles of [Root.Country.GetName] respect and fear [Root.Heir.GetName]. They will never attempt to fool [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] in any kinds of bargains or negotiations when [Root.Heir.GetName] becomes [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName] 从 [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] 的商人父母那里所继承的精明头脑与还价的天赋使得 [Root.Country.GetName] 的市民，自由农民与贵族都对他充满了敬畏。在 [Root.Heir.GetName] 成为 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 之后，他们就再也不会敢在做生意和协商时愚弄 [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] 了。

original: Our heir might be a mere merchant's son, but [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] has proven [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]!
translation: 虽然我们的继承人虽然仅仅只是一个商人的孩子，但是 [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] 已经证明了自己！

original: The Talented Theologian

Learned in the science of things divine, the next [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Heir.GetName] is able to use various forms of analysis and argument to help understand, explain, defend or promote numerous religious topics.
translation: 出于对神圣理论的钻研，下一任 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Heir.GetName] 有能力用多种不同的分析和论点来帮助理解，解释，辩护或是推广许多宗教的话题。

original: We knew from the beginning that [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] will rule [Root.Country.GetName] wisely.
translation: 我们从一开始就知道 [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] 会是 [Root.Country.GetName] 的一位英明的统治者。

original: The Local Preacher

The people rejoiced when the local preacher [Root.Heir.GetName] was chosen as the heir to [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] of [Root.Country.GetName]. Were they rejoicing because they saw an end to [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] constant sermons, or because they believed in [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] being able to make a difference in [Root.Country.GetName]? No matter what, the people support and trust the next [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Heir.GetName].
translation: 人们在知道当地的 [Root.Heir.GetName] 牧师被选做 [Root.Country.GetName] 的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 时，他们都欢欣鼓舞。他们高兴的原因是因为他们终于不用再听 [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] 滔滔不绝的布道？还是说他们相信 [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] 能够给 [Root.Country.GetName] 带来什么改变？无论如何，人们都都支持并信任下一任 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，[Root.Heir.GetName]。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] had the people's support, now [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] has ours.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName] 有人民的支持，而我们有 [Root.Heir.GetSheHe]。

original: Rule Challenged

It began, as it always does, with rumors, gossip and sneaked glances filled with contempt and malice. If this challenge to [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s rule goes too far, that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was not elected properly to the seat of [Root.Country.GetName], people will no longer speak but might try to depose [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]!
translation: 就如往常一样，这一切都始于充斥着蔑视与恶意的谣言碎语和窥探。当这些威胁 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 统治的谣言变得不仅仅是谣言，甚至说 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 不是靠正当的选举来登上 [Root.Country.GetName] 的位置时，人们就有可能要废除 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] 的位置！

original: How did this happen?
Banned Pilgrimages and Superstitious Practices
translation: 禁止朝圣和迷信的活动

original: The strict, dictatorial attitude of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has provoked the peasants and burghers of [Root.Country.GetName] who demand that the ban on pilgrimages and superstitious practices is lifted. The rage exuded from these simpletons about bans that will in time be beneficial to all is not something to be tampered with.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]严厉而独断的态度激怒了[Root.Country.GetName]意图撤销禁止朝圣和迷信习俗法令的农民与市民。这道禁止令在不远的将来对全国人民只有好处，不应做改动，但那些愚民只会对着这一法令发火，阻碍它的推行。

original: We take it back, do any pilgrimage you want!
translation: 我们找回了这项权力,去肆意朝圣吧！

original: The decision stands, and you'll thank us for it later!
translation: 之后你会感激我们让你做出这项决定的！

original: The Great Feud of [Root.GetName]

The serious conflict with the city of [Root.GetCapitalName] has gone too far! The citizens have taken some of the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]'s vassals prisoner, and despite our best efforts - countering this with anathema and interdict - the city prevails! They have started to strengthen the city's fortifications and will fight any who tries to take the city. We have tried ordering the city to revert the city wall to its previous size, but they refuse.
translation: 与 [Root.GetCapitalName] 城的严重冲突已经收不了场了！市民已经把 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] 的几位封臣劫为人质，尽管我们已经尽力通过诅咒和禁止令来抵抗，他们还是赢了！他们已经开始加强城市的防御，并要与任何想要夺取这座城市的人进行殊死的斗争。我们已经尝试命令他们将城墙修葺如初，但是他们拒绝了。

original: Keep at it, they will relent sooner or later.
translation: 坚持下去，他们迟早会后悔的。

original: Give them what they want...
The Mad Seer

He claims to be a seer who has seen the civic glory, the destruction of secular art and culture and the great flood that will cleanse [Root.Capital.GetName] from its filth. The mad preacher calls for [Root.Religion.GetName] renewal and has instituted an extreme puritanical campaign. Enlisting the help of [Root.Capital.GetName]'s young men, there is a risk that he will cause disturbances or even dispute [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s right to rule!
translation: 他声称自己是一个预见了城市的荣耀，世俗的毁灭与将会洗净 [Root.Capital.GetName] 中所有罪恶的大洪水的先知。这位疯狂的牧师要求 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的复兴，并创立了一个极端的清教徒运动。通过争取 [Root.Capital.GetName] 的年轻人的帮助，他有可能会引发一场混乱，甚至威胁到 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的统治！

original: Make sure he is silenced, for good!
translation: 为了任何理由都要确保他再不发声！

original: Neither acknowledge his rants nor react to them.
translation: 既不承认也不对他的咆哮做出反应。

original: A Council after our own Tastes
translation: 一个符合我们要求的议会

original: To our chagrin but not our surprise, the perpetual struggle between the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and each institution in [Root.Country.GetName] - ecclesiastical, educational, legal, medical, fiscal, administrative and publicistic - only increases with each new reform suggested. By establishing like-minded people in the various institutions, perhaps that will persuade the reluctant populace to change their minds into a more adaptable form.
translation: 我们毫不吃惊地发现，随着每颁布一轮新的改革，都令人震惊的加速了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 与 [Root.Country.GetName] 的每一所学院之间的冲突——无论是有关教会，法律，教育，医疗，经济，管理还是传播。我们也许能够通过在这些学院里安插一些志同道合的人来说服这些固执的人们，让他们的思维变得更加开明。

original: We will start with our own advisors.
translation: 我们将任用我们自己的顾问。

original: Remind people more forcefully who is the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of [Root.Country.GetName]!
The Social and Political Conflict in [Root.GetName]

The urban aristocrats and the guilds and the lower classes are in the grips of a conflict, which the advisors of [Root.Owner.GetName] saw as an opportunity to strengthen the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]'s influence in the city of [Root.GetCapitalName]. The encouragement by [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]'s advisors made the guilds revolt against the aristocrats and they have opened the city gate to allow [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]'s army to occupy the city. This is a great opportunity for us to subject the city to the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] and curtail the city's rights!
translation: [Root.Owner.GetName] 的顾问认为城市贵族，公会与下层人民所面对的冲突是加强 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 对 [Root.GetCapitalName] 城影响的大好机会。在 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] 的顾问的鼓励下，公会对城市的贵族发起了反抗，并打开了大门让 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] 的军队占领这座城市。这是让这座城市归于 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] 的统治并遏制其权力的好机会！

original: March in and take the city!
There's no need for an occupation. We already own the city.
translation: 我们已经拥有了这个城市，没有必要占领了。

original: The Secularists Among Us
translation: 我们当中的世俗主义者

original: Each incident that lowers our devotion to [Root.Country.GetName] sees more and more trouble approaching our doorstep. There are those that believe that religious considerations should be excluded from civil affairs, and their numbers have grown. They clamor for change and wish for us to secularize our government.
translation: 每一个破坏我们对[Root.Country.GetName]忠诚的事件都导致着更多的麻烦。认为宗教考量应该与世俗分开的人越来越多。他们叫嚣着要求改变，并希望我们能够让政府世俗化。

original: So be it.
That drastic step will not be taken yet.
translation: 这种极端的手段还未被被采取。

original: Decadence Rules

Disillusioned by what they see as corruption and decadence, fellow worshippers have stopped sending donations to us and stopped volunteering to fight in our armies as the bulwark of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 出于对我们政府中“腐败”与“衰落”的失望——按他们的话说——我们的同伴教徒们已经不再给我们送来捐助，也不再以 [Root.Religion.GetName] 之盾的名义在我们的军队中作战了。

original: This is a disaster, a pure disaster!
translation: 这是一场灾难,一场彻底的灾难！

original: Corrupt [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]

[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has become corrupt, focusing on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] personal aims rather than the good of the faith. Our people have become disillusioned with [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]  [Root.Monarch.GetName] 变得愈加堕落腐化了，相比为我们共同的信仰做贡献，他只注重于 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 自己的军队。我们的人民对 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] 十分失望。

original: Ignore the depravity of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
Try to make a change.
Volunteers for the Holy Fight
Inspired by our holy cause, volunteers from the [Root.Religion.GetName] world have arrived to help take the fight to the infidel and spread the true faith!
translation: 来自 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的义兵们被我们的神圣事业所感发，已经到达战场准备开始对异教徒的战斗并传播真正的信仰！

original: Marvelous! Such a great initiative.
translation: 真是不可思议!这是一个伟大的计划。

original: The New Monarch

The life as a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has not been as you imagined it to be, the power you wield is less than what a king or a duke, a caliph or even an Emir has. The pressure of always having to adhere to the strict rules and laws of [Root.Religion.GetName] and to enforce these has left you exhausted. Might it be time, as some of your advisors suggest, to secularize [Root.Country.GetName] and become a ruler of another name?
translation: 作为 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的生活并不如你想象那般。你所掌握的权力不如国王，公爵与哈里发，甚至不如一位埃米尔。无时无刻需要遵守并宣扬 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的严苛法律与条令的压力已经让你精疲力尽。如你的一些顾问所说，现在是不是到了对[Root.Country.GetName] 进行世俗化并给您的头衔换一个名字的时候了呢？

original: Yes, let my brow be weighted down by a crown instead.
translation: 是的，我的额前需要一顶王冠。

original: No, I will keep the title of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 不,我将继续保有 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的称号。

original: The Influential Reformer

A no-nonsense [Root.Heir.GetWomanMan], well-versed in the art of rhetoric, the next ruler [Root.Heir.GetName] is already using [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] powers for good, spreading [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] ideas to any who will listen - members of the high society are eager to prove their intellect to [Root.Heir.GetHerHim], while others are simply fascinated by the handsome [Root.Heir.GetWomanMan]. Regardless of why, there is clearly something special about [Root.Heir.GetName], as even folks usually completely uninterested in politics find themselves taking part of the discussion.
translation: 下一任统治者 [Root.Heir.GetName] 是一位严肃、精于修辞艺术的[Root.Heir.GetWomanMan]，而且已经很好地行使了[Root.Heir.GetHerHis] 的权力，并向任何愿意倾听的人传播[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]的思想——众多上流社会的人士急切地向[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]证明自己的才智，而其他人只是简单地被[Root.Heir.GetWomanMan]英俊的外表吸引。不管为什么，[Root.Heir.GetName]一定有过人之处，这让那些平时对政治完全不感兴趣的人发现自己参与到政治讨论中来。

original: [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap] might be just what [Root.Country.GetName] needs.
Conflict between City and [Root.GovernmentName]
translation: 城市和 [Root.GovernmentName] 之间的冲突

original: The long rivalry between the [Root.GovernmentName] and one of our cities has damaged relations between us for many years. The city is seeking freedom from the authority of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName], and has been unwilling to shelter our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]s during times of unrest and war.
translation: 在[Root.GovernmentName]与我们的一座城市之间长年累月的对抗不可避免地破坏了我们之间的关系。这座城市不但在骚乱与战争时期保卫我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，而且已经在尝试从[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]的控制之下获得自由。

original: Sooner or later they will come to their senses.
Enforce our authority!
The Lanterne of Light

The heinous heretical book 'The Lanterne of Light' claims that the principal cause of the persecution of the original Christians was the illegal retention of precious goods by priests. It also goes on to compare the seats of archbishops or bishops with those of the Antichrist. This book has been found in the possession of a relapsed heretic that, despite many years in prison and many tearful abjurations still seem to refuse to change his ways.
translation: 令人憎恶的异端书“光之灯”中声称最初基督徒遭受迫害的主要原因是其牧师非法地持有贵重的物品。同时，书中也比较了天主教与敌基督中大主教和主教的职位。我们在一个异端的手里发现了这本书——虽然他已经入狱多年并多次含泪发誓弃绝异端，但现在看来他拒绝改变自己的想法并再次皈依了异端。

original: Sentence the heretic to prison once more.
translation: 这些异端们将再次被宣判入狱

original: Burn the heretic.
Unfair Taxes

One of our cities was granted the privilege to elect its own council and mayor, which of course has led to a constant struggle between them and the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]s. Besides this struggle for power in the city, it has caused unrest as the burgomasters and town councilors are levying unfair taxes. We need a quick way to assert our authority and regain control of this city, but without alarming the culprits to our intent.
translation: 自从授予我们的一座城市自己选举市长和议会的权利后，他们与[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]间冲突就没有停过。除此之外，镇长与议会成员的不合理征税也导致了民众的骚乱。我们需要一个能够在不惊动这些罪魁祸首的前提下迅速恢复对该城控制的方法。

original: Invite them to a gala dinner and arrest them there!
translation: 邀请他们参加一个会宴并逮捕他们！

original: This will disrupt the stability of our realm, better we avoid it.
translation: 这会破坏我国的稳定，我们最好别做。

original: The Gala Dinner

The feast is lavish, as it is supposed to be. Food and drinks are plentiful, no one will leave without a full belly and a hangover to look forward to. The mayor and the councilors are drinking heavily and will not be able to resist the firm, sober hands of the guards. The animosity between [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and the council of the city seems to have dissolved during the several courses of the gala dinner. Should we proceed with the plan to arrest the mayor and the councilors?
translation: 正如我们所希望的那样，宴会极尽奢华。长长的宴会桌上摆满了玉盘珍馐，没有一个人离开宴会的时候不是挺着圆鼓鼓的肚子，喝得酩酊大醉。市长和议员们早已不胜酒力，根本不可能抵挡滴酒未沾的侍卫们坚实的双手。随着庆祝晚宴渐至尾声，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 与城市议会之间的敌意仿佛已经烟消云散。还需要继续我们逮捕市长与议员的计划吗？

original: Arrest them and force them to renounce their rights.
translation: 逮捕他们并强迫他们放弃他们的权力。

original: We have clearly managed to improve relations, no need to do anything rash.
translation: 显然我们已经设法改善关系,不需要再做任何事了。

original: Bonfire of the Vanities

There is a vigorous preacher in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] whose outdoor sermons about the temptations of vanity objects have led to his supporters collecting and burning cosmetics, arts, books deemed immoral and musical instruments. He rages on about how these objects might tempt one to sin and urges people, especially the famous artists of [Root.Country.GetName], to bring the things he deems immoral to his bonfires.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] 一位激进牧师有关浮华虚荣之物的诱惑的布施已经使得他的追随者们开始收集并焚烧化妆品，艺术品，乐器和被认为不道德的书籍。他仍在继续宣讲这些物品是如何诱惑人们犯下罪行的，并敦促人们，尤其是 [Root.Country.GetName] 有名的艺术家们，把他们所认为不道德的东西丢入篝火中。

original: Stop the man!
Allow him to continue, but rescue the art.
translation: 让他继续，但是放过那些艺术品！

original: The Bishop's Needle

The fortified city of [Root.Province.GetName] only allows the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]s of [Root.Country.GetName] to enter through a very narrow gate called Acus Episcopi or Bishop's Needle. The narrowness of the gate makes it impossible to enter accompanied by knights, and the city's guards refuse to let [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]'s soldiers enter through the normal city gates.
translation: 在 [Root.Province.GetName] 的堡垒城市只允许 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] 们从一个被称作主教之针的一座极窄的城门中进入城市。该城门的宽度使得我们不可能在有骑士护卫的情况下进入城市，而且城市的守卫也拒绝让 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] 的士兵们从普通城门进入。

original: Force the city gates open! No one will stop us from entering our own city.
translation: 强行打开城门！没有人能阻止我们进入自己的城市。

original: Accept the city's rules grudgingly.
Shared Power
Jubilee in [Root.Capital.GetName]

A jubilee - a holy year - involves pilgrimage to a sacred site such as Rome or our own capital. It is a special year of remission of sins and universal pardons, something the Pope usually convokes every 25 or 50 year, but who is to say that we cannot convoke our own jubilee in [Root.Capital.GetName]?
translation: 天主教中大赦年的活动包括了对圣地的朝圣，例如罗马或者我们自己的首都。一般来讲，教宗每25或50年才会举办这么一次豁免罪行，大赦天下的特殊节日，但是又有谁说过我们不能在[Root.Capital.GetName]举办我们自己的大赦年呢？

original: A most wonderful idea - we approve!
translation: 一个绝妙的主意——本座赞成！

original: Not this year - perhaps the next?
Jubilee in [From.Capital.GetName]

The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.Country.GetName] has convoked a jubilee in [From.Capital.GetName], a holy year of remission of sins and universal pardons. This is a Christian tradition which dates back to 1300 when Pope Boniface VIII convoked a holy year in Rome.
translation: [From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]在[From.Capital.GetName] 举办了一次大赦年，大赦天下的神圣一年。这一基督教传统可以追溯到1300年教宗卜尼法斯八世在罗马举办的第一次大赦年。

original: This should be reserved for us, not every Christian ruler should be allowed this!
translation: 不是每一个基督教统治者都应该被允许的，这应该是为我们保留的！

original: That is a wonderful idea!
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] Reacts to Jubilee in [Root.Capital.GetName]

The tradition of jubilees was started when Pope Boniface VIII convoked a holy year in Rome 1300. [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] sent a messenger to us when the news about the jubilee in [Root.Capital.GetName] reached [From.Monarch.GetHerHim], and we fear [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] reaction...
translation: 大赦年的传统可以追溯到1300年教宗卜尼法斯八世在罗马举办的第一次大赦年。当[Root.Capital.GetName]擅自举办大赦年的消息传到了[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]耳中时，[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]向我们派遣了一位信使。我们很担心[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]的反应……

original: ...and he does not like it, not at all.
...but we needn't worry. He approves!
The Papal Protégé

Having [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName] as a mentor has developed [Root.Heir.GetName]'s whole person. The wisdom of the [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] has guided [Root.Heir.GetName] and given [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] the people of [Root.Country.GetName]'s respect and devotion.
translation: 在 [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName] 的谆谆教导之下， [Root.Heir.GetName] 的身心都受到了长足的发展。[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] 的智慧引领着 [Root.Heir.GetName] ，给 [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] 带来了 [Root.Country.GetName] 人民的尊重和忠诚。

original: The [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] believed in [Root.Heir.GetHerHim], and now we do too.
Confiscation of a Reformed Church

An abbot has confiscated a Reformed church! His action was not sanctioned by [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName], and had we known about his intentions, we would have persuaded the abbot to choose another building for his chapel. This has of course upset the people of the affected province, and even though we forced the abbot to return the church, the enraged peasants and burghers will not forget the slight.
translation: 一个修道院院长刚刚征用了一个改革宗教堂！他的行为并没有受到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的制裁，而要是我们早些知道他想要这么做的话，我们就会说服他选另外一栋建筑来作为他的教堂了。这一行为毫无疑问地惹怒了受影响省份的居民——虽然我们要求修道院长归还了那座教堂，但愤懑的农民和市民们不会忘记他们受到的蔑视。

original: What else do they want?
Hallesches Heilthum

The late [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] feared for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] peace of mind in heaven and collected many relics to ensure that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] would spend as little time in purgatory as possible. These 8100 relics and 42 holy skeletons were recently found, secreted away in various places all over the former [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s residence.
translation: 出于已故的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 对自己在天堂中内心宁静的担心，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 收集了许多圣遗物来保证自己待在炼狱的时间尽可能的少。我们最近在这位前任[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的家中找到了藏好的8100件圣遗物和42具圣骸。

original: The sale of indulgences is what triggered [Root.Religion.GetName]! Keep them hidden.
translation: 出售赎罪券是触发了[Root.Religion.GetName] 的行为! 把它们藏起来。

original: Make room for them. I wonder if the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] got into heaven...
translation: 为他们腾出空间。我想如果 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 进入天堂……

original: The Nag's Head Rumor

The whispers and glances at [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] when [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] travels the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName] are caused by a disturbing rumor. People actually believe that [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] was not consecrated solemnly, but instead was consecrated with a Bible pressed to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] neck while inside a tavern of disrepute!
translation: 随着一则令人不安的谣言的传播，只要当 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 在 [Root.Capital.GetName] 的街头路过时，伴随着 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 的往往是旁边市民的唏嘘声和白眼。人们甚至认为， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的祝圣并不是庄严正式的，而是在把圣经按在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 的脖子上，在一件声名狼藉的小酒馆里完成的！

original: Ignore the matter and pray it goes away.
translation: 不管这件事，祈祷它消失吧。

original: Deny it fervently.
Confiscated Reformed Church
The confiscation of a Reformed church by an abbot has greatly upset the peasants and the burghers even though it has been returned.
translation: 虽然财产都已被尽数归还，但修道院长没收改革宗教会财产的行为还是严重地激怒了当地的农民与市民。

original: The Local Imam Khatib

[Root.Heir.GetName] was the leader of prayers in the masjid and preacher at the congregational prayer on Friday before [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] was chosen to rule [Root.Country.GetName] after [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]. The local community who had elected [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] as Imam Khatib will be sad to see [Root.Heir.GetName] leave, for few others are as learned and as virtuous as [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] in instructing the congregation in the basics of Islam. When [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] leaves, religious questions will now have to be asked to someone inferior to [Root.Heir.GetName], but what they will lose, we will gain.
translation: 在 [Root.Heir.GetName] 被选作 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的继任者来统治 [Root.Country.GetName] 之前，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe] 是清真寺中的伊玛目并负责星期五集体礼拜时的讲道。很少有人能够在做集体礼拜向教徒们讲解伊斯兰教法时表现出像 [Root.Heir.GetName] 一样的学识与贤德，因此当地那些推选他为伊玛目哈提卜的人民们将会为了 [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] 的离开而伤心。当 [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] 离开之后，当地人民不得不请教学识不如 [Root.Heir.GetName] 的人宗教问题，但是他们所失去的，就是我们所得到的。

original: It was wise of us to select [Root.Heir.GetName] as our next [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 我们选择 [Root.Heir.GetName] 作为我们下一个 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 是明智的.

original: The Guiding Principles

Some may argue that the Al-Shura is part of the ruling structure, but not one of its pillars. Meetings should follow the teachings of Islam, consultations the guidelines of the Quran and Sunnah. The leader should be elected from the ones attending to head the meeting. Discussions are based on mushawarah and mudhakarah - deliberation and consensus. Everyone may voice their opinions and the voices of the majority are accepted, as long as it does not violate the teachings of the Quran and Sunnah.
translation: 有些人也许会认为咨询理事会是统治系统的一部分，而不是它的支柱之一。会议应该遵循伊斯兰教法以及古兰经和圣训的指南。一位主持会议的领袖应该从与会者中选出。讨论应该基于审议与共识。所有人都可以发言表达自己的想法，其中多数人的想法将会被接受——只要他们不违反古兰经与圣训的教导。

original: Make it one of the pillars.
It seems an easy way to administrate our country.
translation: 这似乎是管理我们国家的一种简单方法。

original: Heart of Mercy

Ali, cousin of the Prophet once said: 'Infuse your heart with mercy, love and kindness for your subjects. Be not in face of them a voracious animal, counting them as easy prey, for they are of two kinds: either they are your brothers in religion or your equals in creation. Error catches them unaware, deficiencies overcome them, evil deeds and sins are committed by them intentionally and by mistake. So grant them your pardon and your forgiveness to the same extent that you hope God will grant you His pardon and His forgiveness. For you are above them, and he who appointed you is above you, and God is above him who appointed you. God has sought from you the fulfillment of their requirements and He is trying you with them.'\nA valuable lesson can be learnt from his words, which we could devote ourselves to, or find ways to incorporate into our administration.
translation: 先知的堂弟阿里曾说过：“为了你的臣民，向你的内心注入怜悯，爱与善良。在他们的面前不要做一个贪婪的动物，把他们看做容易下手的猎物，因为他们中不是你在信仰上的兄弟，就是与你平等的创造物。在不备时他们就会出错，身心上的不足会压倒他们，他们会有意或无意地做出邪恶的事，犯下罪行。所以如你希望真主对你赦免和原谅，你也应给予他们你的赦免与原谅。因为你在他们之上，任命你的人在你之上，而真主则在任命你的人和你之上。真主希望你满足对这些人的要求，他也会把你与这些人一同审判。”\n我们可以从他的话中学到许多珍贵的教导。我们可以终于这些教导，并找到一种把它融入我们的管理的方法。

original: Inshallah.
Wise words that we will heed.
translation: 我们会注意明智的建议。

original: Bayt al-Mal

The House of Wealth administers the taxes and serves as a treasury which manages personal finances and government expenditures. It administers the zakat as well, the tax every wealthy Muslim pays and which will be distributed to those in need, unemployed, injured or otherwise incapable to work. This last year, whatever the problems [Root.Country.GetName] had, the inhabitants had a better one. The amount of zakat that flows into the Bayt al-Mal exceeds any expectations we might have had. Now what should we do with this surplus of ducats?
translation: 贝特马尔是一个用来管理税收，个人财政和政府收支的金库。它也管理着天课，一种由富有的穆斯林缴纳，被分发给那些有需要的，失业的，因受伤或其他原因无法工作的人们的税收。就在上一年，就算是要说 [Root.Country.GetName] 这个国家遇到了什么问题，该国的居民都没有受到影响，过了安居乐业的一年。进入贝特马尔的天课超出了我们所有的想象。现在的问题是，我们该怎么用这些多出来的达克特？

original: Money goes into our big coffers.
translation: 金钱进入到我们的大金库。

original: It will go to the poor and needy, as always.
translation: 它一如既往地去到穷人和有需要的人的手里。

original: The Education of Women

Muhammad, may peace be upon him, praised the women of ansar because shame did not prevent them from learning Islam. Fatima al-Fihir - who founded the University of al-Karaouine, Lubna of Cordoba - the skilled mathematician and Fatima b. Abi al-Qasim 'Abd al-Rahman b. Muhammad b. Ghalib al-Ansari al-Sharrat whose works of legal theory, jurisprudence as well as mysticism show her great knowledge of Islamic sciences, are all great examples of what happens when you educate women. Throughout history, women have shown that they are willing and able to learn about Islam and to continue the work with spreading [Root.Religion.GetName]. Giving women the great opportunity to learn and teach, we will be able to spread our faith much faster.
translation: 穆罕默德——愿宁静与安详伴你左右——赞赏他们安沙的妇女们不顾所受的耻辱学习伊斯兰教法的精神。卡鲁因大学的创始人，科尔多瓦的卢布那，优秀的数学家法蒂玛·菲赫里与深谙伊斯兰教科学，创作了许多有关法理与神秘主义著作的法蒂玛·阿比·卡西姆·阿卜杜·拉赫曼·穆罕默德·贾利卜·安萨里·沙拉特都是受过良好教育的妇女的代表。纵观历史，妇女们都表现了她们对学习伊斯兰教法与传播 [Root.Religion.GetName] 的热情。若是能够授予妇女学习和教学的机会，我们就可以更快地传播我们的信仰。

original: Education should be for all, men and women.
translation: 教育应该对所有的男人和女人开放。

original: This is a matter we need to reflect upon before we decide anything.
translation: 这是我们在决定任何事情之前需要反思的问题。

original: The Bazaar

[Root.Capital.GetName] attracts traders and merchants from all over the world, and the sound and smell of distressed animals, the voices bargaining, the smell of spices and all the colors of the garments, the fabrics and the carpets sold here can be overwhelming. An area in the center of the bazaar has been left untouched, intended for a mosque but as the bazaar has become increasingly busy, that place could be better used for more market stalls.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName] 吸引着来自世界各地的商人和交易者——紧张的牛马所发出的声音和味道，讨价还价的话语，香料的气味和衣裳的颜色，布匹和地毯的种类都令人眼花缭乱。随着集市变得越来越繁忙，集市中央的一块为清真寺预留的，没被动过的地方也被计划建立更多的商铺。

original: Allow more space for traders.
Make it a place of worship.
translation: 使它成为一个礼拜的地方。

original: Religious Cleansing

Muhammad himself smashed idols when he retook Mecca, and we have been encouraged by our advisors to emulate the prophet's example, cleanse [Root.Country.GetName] and return Islam to its simple beginnings. Idolatry is forbidden, but still people pilgrimage to holy shrines and pray at tombs in [Root.Province.GetName]. Is this haram - a sin, or should they be forgiven?
translation: 就如先知本人在重归麦加时破坏偶像那样，我们的顾问也鼓励我们以先知为榜样，净化 [Root.Country.GetName] 并把伊斯兰教还原为它最简单的形式。虽然偶像崇拜已经被禁止，但人们仍然往圣地朝圣，向 [Root.Province.GetName] 的陵墓跪拜。这到底应该被视作罪行，还是说他们应该被原谅？

original: Cleanse this province of its sins!
This is not haram, but mubah - not recommended but not sinful either.
translation: 这不是圣地，但它是合法的—不推荐但也无罪。

original: The Corrupt Governor

Each and every governor has their financial assets and other details recorded before they are appointed. This is then kept in a special office, only to be reviewed each year when they are being checked for discrepancies in the finances. This is to avoid corruption and bribery, but sometimes the system fails.
translation: 每位管理者在任职之前都必须记录下他们的资产和一些其他细节。这些记录被存储在一个特殊的办公室，只有在每年调查财政上的出入时才会被拿出来检查。这一做法是为了防止腐败和贿赂，但这一系统也并非完美无缺的。

original: Give his position to one more qualified and less inclined to bribes.
translation: 把这个位置交给一个合格的并且不腐败的人！

original: I had sent you as a governor, not as a merchant!
translation: 我曾把你任命为一位官员，而不是一位商人！

original: Ignore the matter.
A Kafir in Our Court
translation: 我国法庭里的无神论者

original: $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$$PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$ upset the wrong [Root.Religion.GetName] person with a statement that could be interpreted as if the advisor had knowingly abandoned Islam. Before we could interrupt the discussion and perhaps save $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$$PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$ from any accusations, declarations of being a kafir, an unbeliever, had been made.
translation: $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$$PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$说了不该说的话——让人觉得这位顾问决意摒弃了伊斯兰教——这招惹到了不该招惹的一位[Root.Religion.GetName]人士。在我们能够介入这次争论并避免$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$$PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$遭到任何不公的指控前，这位顾问已经被认定为一个卡菲勒——不信者。

original: Ignore it, excuse it, forget it.
Try to find a solution to this.
translation: 试图找到一个解决办法。

original: Fire the advisor.
A Coup Against Decadence

Complaints about [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] debauchery, decadent ways and refusal to restore the prestige of Islam has become increasingly common. The peasants murmur in anger that [Root.Monarch.GetName] spends [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] days sleeping and nights with slave girls and musicians. The imam of [Root.Capital.GetName] named the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in the public prayers, the peasants even threw stones at him!
translation: 最近关于 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的放荡，腐化和他拒绝恢复伊斯兰荣光行为的抱怨声越来越大。农民们愤怒地低声说着 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 是如何在白天呼呼大睡，又如何在夜晚与性奴和乐师享乐。当 [Root.Capital.GetName] 的阿訇在公共礼拜中提到了 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的名字时，农民们甚至开始向他身上丢石子！

original: I promise to change my ways.
translation: 我承诺会改变我的方式

original: The peasants may utter any reproach they wish, but I am [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]!
translation: 农民们可以提出他们所希望的任何责难，但我是 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]!

original: The Rafida

Those we call the rafida, who reject Islamic authority and leadership, who do not recognize Abu Bakr, Umar, and Uthman as successors of the prophet Muhammad, may peace be upon him, the Shiites have made their presence known in our provinces and attracted others to join them. They even call themselves Rawafid - someone who refuses - and pride themselves of having always rejected evil, not turned towards it.
translation: 这些被我们称作正统反对者的什叶派教徒已经在许多省份中出现并发展，吸引了许多人皈依他们。他们拒绝承认伊斯兰政权和领导者，他们也不认为阿布·伯克尔，欧麦尔和奥斯曼是先知穆罕默德—愿宁静与安详伴他左右—的继承者。他们中的一些人甚至自豪地称自己为拒绝者，并以他们拒绝而不投向邪恶的精神而骄傲。

original: Waste no time - expel them from [Root.Country.GetName]!
translation: 不要浪费时间-从 [Root.Country.GetName] 驱逐他们！

original: They may believe and call themselves whatever they wish.
translation: 他们可以相信并称呼自己任何名字

original: The Nasibi

Those we call the nasibi, those who hate the Ahl Al-Bayt - the Household of the prophet Muhammad - and who hate their followers have emerged in our provinces. The Sunni who foolishly believe that Abu Bakr, Umar, and Uthman are legitimate successors of Muhammad, may peace be upon him, threaten the religious uniformity of [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: 我们称那些十分仇恨先知穆罕穆德的家族以及他的追随者为纳斯比,而这些人已然出现在我们的省份之上.那些愚蠢地相信阿布·伯克尔，欧麦尔和奥斯曼都是穆罕默德的合法继承人的逊尼派会威胁到[Root.Country.GetName]的宗教统一。

original: The Sunnis have no place in [Root.Country.GetName].
Leave them be, they will one day realize their mistake.
translation: 随他们吧，他们总有一天会意识到错误的。

original: The Dishonesty in the Majlis

The council called for a meeting, a majlis, to discuss important and urgent matters in [Root.Country.GetName]. Though their faces were honest, their words true, their intentions were deceitful and dishonest! Money squandered, prestige lost, and the hopes of a just majlis for [Root.Country.GetName]'s good shattered and broken.
translation: 国会决定召开会议,议题是讨论[Root.Country.GetName]的紧急事务.然而即便国会的元老言表真挚忠诚,但他们的意图确是虚伪且不诚实的!经此一遭,钱财被挥霍,声誉受损,更严重的是国会的公正在[Root.Country.GetName]的事务上被彻底的破灭.

original: Do what we can to heal this wound to our pride.
translation: 尽一切努力化解这些,我国的威信不容这些劣迹.

original: We trusted them and they betrayed us.
translation: 我们相信他们,然后他们就背叛了我们！

original: I blame myself for being too naïve.
Advisor Accused of Shirk

The work of an advisor will expose you to different cultures, religions and traditions. We have always chosen to avert our gaze from the peculiar habits of $STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$ and the obsession our advisor has with illuminated manuscripts and miniatures. Though our suspicions grew when we heard gossip and tales from servants and people of the court, we would never have anticipated the look on $STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$'s face when the imam accused them of shirk - practicing idolatry!
translation: 一个顾问的工作就是向你提供不同文化不同宗教不同习惯上的做法.然而我们则总是选择回避对于$STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$特殊的习惯的看法以及感情偏向于顾问给我们提出的美好蓝图. 可当我们从周围侍从以及宫廷中的人口中听到某些流言蜚语时,我们的怀疑也逐渐增加,然而我们也永远不会预料到当阿訇指责$STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$偶像崇拜时候的表情!

original: Remove $STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$ from court, immediately!
Dismiss the notion - $STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$ is a good advisor.
translation: 驳回那些流言蜚语——$STATESMAN$$TRADER$$DIPLOMAT$$COLONIAL_GOVERNOR$是个尽责的好顾问。

original: Abolish Idolatry?

'Your rule is questioned,' your advisor says, 'and the people are doubting your piety. You must do something to establish a religious and political sovereignty! Idolatry is haram, but still your people offer prayers to saintly figures, make pilgrimages to tombs and mosques, venerate trees, caves and even stones. Show your religious strength, abolish these things and grasp the power that is legitimately yours!'
translation: '你的统治备受质疑呀,'你的顾问这般说，'人民正怀疑你的虔诚.你必须实施办法去建立一个政和教都能接受的宗主权!偶像崇拜是有害,但你的人民依旧对着那些圣徒的塑像在祈祷,向着庙宇和陵寝朝圣,雕刻石像和木雕.展示你的对宗教的控制力度,排斥那些质疑你合法性的玩意!'

original: Go ahead, forbid a bunch of things.
translation: 去吧,禁止这些乱七八糟的东西.

original: Why bother?
Taxes or Agriculture

The people of [Root.Country.GetName] are nomads and peasants who live of what the land provides. Our governors need us to decide what we should focus on, taxes or agriculture? One advisor claims that the development of land is more important than the collection of the tax. Tax can only be obtained by the development of the land and to demand tax without doing that will ruin [Root.Country.GetName] and destroy its people. Another claims that people will develop the land without interference if tax is demanded of them and they see a reason behind the demand.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]上生活的人们,都是一些游牧民和农民,都是靠山吃山靠水吃水.我们的政府人员要我们决定施政的方针,是专注税收还是农业？一位顾问建议地方土地的发展比收税要重要.而税收只能靠土地富裕程度来获取,而且收税的程度不能损害[Root.Country.GetName]和人民的利益.另一个位则宣称人们勤奋劳动是取决于税赋多少,他们要看到劳动背后的理由.

original: Focus on taxes.
Focus on agriculture.
Try to balance between them.
Reforms of the Pious

After many meetings, discussions and majlis, our ministers and advisors have brought us different reforms for us to consider. Each has presented their ideas, and we are to choose between two of these. The first one: exclude state officials, such as diplomats and governors, from entering into any business. This to let them fully concentrate on their work and not on anything else, thus hopefully allowing them to do a better job. The second reform: distribute pasture lands and game reserves that now are reserved for the family of the dignitaries among the poor, to cultivate the land. Unpaid labor should also be made illegal.
translation: 经过多次的国会讨论，大臣和顾问给我们提出一套改革方案以供考虑。最后讨论剩下两个方案。第一个是：把如外交和行政等的国家部门的商业性质给清除出去。这个能他们完全专注与工作上而心无旁骛，因此能有效提高他们的工作效率。第二个是：把显贵和皇家手中掌握的牧场和狩猎场分发给无业穷人，让他们去耕作。而且无酬劳的奴隶式劳动形式也应该被定性为非法。

original: Exclude state officials from entering any business.
translation: 给国家行政机构除去商业化.

original: Distribute lands among the poor.
Choose none of them.
New Schools

Each and every province, and every city, should have at least one madrassa, a religious school with free education, delicious food, free books and even stipends to each students provided. There should be annual examinations, and the students who performed splendidly should receive prizes and be recommended for high and honorable positions. Should these teach Hadith, the teachings, deeds and sayings of the prophet Muhammad, may peace be upon him, or should they teach Fiqh and Imaan, theology and belief?
translation: 每一省份每一城市,都至少要有意见教会学校,再配有免除学费书费等一切费用,甚至还给每个学生津贴.而且还应该有每学年年度考试,给予成绩优异的学生奖励或者将来推介到更好的职位工作.而那些教授默罕默德圣训的律法家和阿訇应该传授什么知识呢？是教育他们教法学和概念,还是教育他们神学和信仰？

original: Madrassas to teach Hadith.
translation: 宗教学校应该教授圣训成为伊斯兰.

original: Madrassas to teach Fiqah and Imaan.
translation: 宗教学校应该教授律法成为伊玛尼.

original: Two madrassas, one to teach Hadith, and one for Fiqah and Imaan.
translation: 宗教学校应该同时兼备两者,伊斯兰和伊玛尼都要.

original: We cannot afford any schools right now.
translation: 我们承担不起兴办教育的费用.

original: The Sulh

Two conflicting parties have come to you. They ask you to mediate the conflict and put forth documents, witnesses and other evidence. You look over the material provided as you ponder how to declare a hudna - a truce - and how the settlement should be created in order to maintain the honor and status of both parties. This property dispute is not the first you have to settle, but it is a rare, sensitive one that must be settled in such a way to avert a cycle of revenge. Both have claims that should give them the right to the land, but which one is true and which one is false?
translation: 两个互相斗争的伙伴来觐见于你.他们请求你介入争端并即刻呈上相关文件,证人和一些证据.看过这些东西之后,你考虑如何制定一份协议,如何能制定出维持双方的荣誉以及身份.这类财产争端问题你已经司空见惯,但这次有点特殊,由于争端双方身份敏感你必须早早定论以酿成冲突.双方都宣称自己是应该被给予这片土地，然而谁对谁错？

original: Give that man the whole land.
translation: 随便把整块土地给予一方.

original: Split the land in two.
Order them to solve this petty conflict elsewhere.
translation: 让他们到其他地方闹去.

original: The Qadi, the Hisbah and the Muhtasib
translation: 法官,执法官与督商检事

original: Not many months after you appointed a Qadi - a judge ruling in accordance with Sharia - he comes to you with furrowed brow and anxious eyes. He tells you of your people's decadence, their crimes and their impious ways. Reminding you sternly of Hisbah, your divinely sanctioned duty to intervene and command right and forbid wrong. The laws of Allah must be followed. Your people need mutaweens, religious police, to enforce Sharia.
translation: 在你任命了一名法官,之后没几个月.有天他带着紧缩的眉头和忧愁的神情前来晋见你.他告诉你,你的人民啊都腐化堕落了,他们是如此的罪端多生如此的不守虔信. 接着来提醒你的还有你的执法官,以神之名除恶扬善的执法官.并申明,阿拉的律法必须严厉执行.你的人民需要督商检事,宗教法警察,去强制实施伊斯兰的律法.

original: Find volunteers and train them to become Muhtasibs.
translation: 那就去寻找志愿者训练他们成为监督员.

original: I don't think this is a correct way to deal with this.
General Hospital
The new General Hospital with its free midwifery course and establishments to combat disease has increased the public health and the well-being of your countrymen.
translation: 这间综合大众医院能给以免费的助产服务,能建立疾控机构,也能提高人民的健康水平造福国家.

original: Fort Maintenance
Our cities are contributing money to our forts' maintenance.
translation: 我们的城市需要出钱来维护堡垒.

original: Expulsion of Heretics
You have expulsed the Heretics in this province.
translation: 你把异端驱逐出了这个省份。

original: Pope approves of Jubilee
Pope disapproves of Jubilee
Jubilee
A jubilee is a holy year of remission of sins and universal pardon where people go on pilgrimages to holy cities.
translation: 大赦年，这一年中大众可以前去朝圣以洗去罪恶或得到宽恕。

original: This choice may influence other events.
translation: 这选择可能会影响其他事件。

original: Confiscated Reformed Church
Religious Cleansing
We are seeking to return Islam to its simple beginnings, and emulate Muhammad when he retook Mecca and smashed idols.
translation: 我们正寻找回归伊斯兰本源的方法,力图效法穆罕默德在麦加粉碎偶像的行径.

original: The Rafida
The Shiite are sometimes called the Rafida - the ones who refuses - as they refuses to acknowledge Abu Bakr, Umar, and Uthman as successors of the prophet Muhammad.
translation: 什叶派有时也称为正统反对者,the Rafida,也就是指不承认艾布·伯克尔,欧麦尔,奥斯曼是先知穆罕默德的正统继承者的学说.

original: The Nasibi
Haters of the Ahl Al-Bayt - Household of the prophet Muhammad - and their followers, the religious group Sunni foolishly believe that Abu Bakr, Umar, and Uthman are legitimate successors of Muhammad.
translation: 纳西卜,就是指仇视先知穆罕穆德的后继家族,以及逊尼派那些愚忠于艾布·伯克尔,欧麦尔,奥斯曼等合法哈里发的人.

original: Idolatry Abolished
Prayers to saintly figures, pilgrimages to tombs and mosques, the veneration of trees, caves and stones are now abolished.
translation: 向圣徒偶像进行祈祷,去陵寝和寺庙进行朝圣,雕刻石像和木雕等一系列偶像崇拜活动现在被抛弃了.

original: Focus on Taxes
The governors are instructed to focus on taxes, not very pious but very effective.
translation: 政府人员现在被组织去专业收税,虽然不太厚道但十分有效率.

original: Focus on Agriculture
The governors are instructed to focus on agriculture, very pious and hopefully effective in time.
translation: 政府人员现在被组织去发展农业,利国利民,虽然功在当代但利在千秋.

original: Balance Taxes and Agriculture
The governors are instructed to balance their focus equally on taxes and agriculture.
translation: 政府人员被组织去平衡收税和发展农业,双得益彰.

original: Madrassa for Hadith
A school which teaches the corpus of the reports of the teachings, deeds and sayings of the prophet Muhammad.
translation: 一所教导学生有关先知穆罕默德的言行训令的宗教学校诞生了.

original: Madrassa for Fiqah and Imaan
translation: 宗教学校教授律法和伊玛尼

original: A school that teaches theology and belief.
translation: 一所教导学生有关神学和信仰的学校诞生了.

original: One madrassa for Hadith and one madrassa for Fiqh and Imaan.
translation: 一所学校教授圣训,一所学校教授律法和伊玛尼.

original: Two schools in every province and city, one that teaches Hadith and another that teaches Fiqah and Imaan
translation: 每个省份每个城市都有两件学校分别教授圣训和律法

original: Muhtasib
The religious police force will enforce Sharia - the laws of Allah - in our provinces.
translation: 宗教法警察在众多省份内强制施行伊斯兰律法.

original: Educated Women
Women are given the great opportunity to learn and teach others of Islam.
translation: 女性被授予了丰富的机会去学习以及教授其他部分的伊斯兰.

original: Complaints about Modern Forts
The cost of making our forts modern and fashionable irritates the common people whose tax money are spent on features they deem unnecessary.
translation: 我们那造价昂贵兼时尚现代的堡垒惹怒了很多一般百姓，他们认为这种东西十分没必要。

original: Country Rages Against Unpopular Decision
translation: 举国震怒于不合人心的政策

original: The whole country is in uproar, the actions of the ruler has displeased them and the peasants are waving their pitchforks in protest.
translation: 整个国家正处于骚动状态,统治者不得人心的政策让人们举着草叉在不停抗议.

original: Reformer Seeks Safe Haven

Fearing for his safety one of the great theologians of our age has had to leave his homeland. As a Protestant country it is our duty to offer a safe haven for this man and doing so would undoubtedly strengthen the position of our State Church. At least as long as this reformer agrees with our policies.
translation: 一位被称为本世纪最伟大神学家的学者,因为担心言行惹祸而决心离开故乡寻求庇护.而我们作为新教国家,我们有责任去给提供安全庇护给以这份学者,这样就能够巩固我国在宗教人士间的位置.至少能让这位教改学者拥护我们的政权.

original: Let us welcome this great man!
For as long as the Reformer lives within our borders he may chose to criticize or condone the policies of our State Church.
translation: 然而这位教改学者居住在我国之内越久,他就越可能对我国宗教政策给予批评或者赞颂.

original: Turn him away.
Gave Refuge to Reformer
Refused Refuge to Reformer
Harboring Reformer
We have allowed one of the more active Theologians of the Reformation to take up residence in our country, lending his great name and works to our State Church.
translation: 我们允许一位进行激进改革的神学家在我国寻求庇护,从而借着他的名号打响了我国国家教会的名头.

original: Reformer seeks refuge in [From.GetName]

One of the most prominent proponents of the Reformation in our country has left for [From.GetName] claiming to fear persecution from the Catholic authorities here. Not content to simply leave the man now spends his time producing pamphlets to deride not only the Catholic church but also his old homeland.
translation: 我国一位成就突出的教改神学家出逃至[From.GetName]处寻求避难,并称是畏惧我国天主教势力的迫害. 然而这神棍并不满足于逃难,还热衷于制作小册子来嘲讽他故乡的天主教信仰.

original: Outrageous!
Reformer seen to criticise State Church
translation: 教改学者批评国家教会

original: Having a strong-willed Reformer within our borders has not been entirely without friction. It would seem that a man who has already forsaken his home country can be quite unwilling to moderate his views to fit the policies of his new home.
translation: 这位在我国避难的教改学者仍不减强势,而且处处有摩擦产生.看来这位学者已经是到何处都看不惯他所处的地方的不完美.

original: Living under our protection means supporting the Church!
translation: 寄人篱下,就该听任主人之言,支持我国教会!

original: Well if you feel that strongly about it...
translation: 好吧，既然你这么大意见……

original: State Church Condemned!

Disappointed with our inability to fully embrace the Reformation the foreign reformer has departed for to the lands of a more inclined prince. In the long run this may strengthen our church but pamphlets have already begun circulating about the falseness of the Church of [Root.GetName].
translation: 对我国完全不接受改革感到失望的外国的教改学者已离开我国前往另一位公侯的领地。或许在长期来看，这样有利于强化我国教会，但就当下而言，或许明天就会有关于[Root.GetName]教会虚伪的流言蜚语。

original: Ok.
Criticism Withdrawn
A sharp reprimand was all it took. The minor crisis in the relations of our state church has blown over and the troubling voices of criticism are quiet.
translation: 承受过一阵尖锐的批判过后.对于我国国家教会的危机已经随风而飘越发渺茫,批评声音也越来越少.

original: Great!
The Fear of Crypto-Catholics
translation: 对于地下天主教徒的恐惧

original: Ever present in our state is the fear that some who professes to believe in all aspects of our state church are still secretly a Catholic sympathizer. One noble family in particular, though firmly entrenched in the machinery of the state, is said to have Papist leanings. As the years drag on these rumors refuse to die and would now seem almost impossible for us to ignore.
translation: 出现在我国的恐慌是由于有人或多或少的相信我国国家教会仍然秘密与天主教廷有联系.而且还特别指出有一个盘踞国家机关的贵族家庭,具有十分的天主教倾向.而这些流言还越演越烈,进而发展到我们不可忽视的程度.

original: Restrict this family from holding offices.
translation: 把这些家族在官方力量之下控制起来.

original: They must be put on Trial.
Ignore these vile rumors.
Persecution of Crypto-Catholics

Our policy of active persecution of suspected Crypto-Catholics in the administration has cut down on the willingness to criticize our State Church but also means that some steer clear entirely from seeking a career in the service of the state.
translation: 我国启动了迫害和怀疑地下天主教徒的政策，确实减少对于国家教会的批评声音，同时也意味着这种案例将完全绕开国家机构而处理国家事件。

original: Fear of Crypto-Catholics
translation: 对于地下天主教徒的恐惧

original: Our unwillingness to investigate rumors of Crypto-Catholics secretly trying to subvert the state has fueled various conspiracy theories in the countryside.
translation: 我们不愿意去调查那些地下天主教的流言,这样流言不仅图谋颠覆国家，也助长了在坊间流言的蔓延.

original: 'The Last Days' of [Root.GetName]

Religious fervor has gripped [Root.GetName] as the population have become convinced the end of days is drawing nearer. Peasants are talking of signs in the sky and contrary to the doctrine of the State Church local priests are giving sermons on the apocalypse. As Millenarianism sweeps the province blame is being put on the State and State Church itself which professes to be Protestant yet clearly is not living up to its name.\nOfficial reactions have so far been very weak as even among the clergy of [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] some feel these fears are justified.
translation: 随着宗教狂热的扩散，[Root.GetName]也笼罩其下，人们越来越相信末日将近。一众村夫都在讨论异样的天象。本地牧师也违背了国家教会的教义，宣讲起关于世界末日的布道。随着千禧年末世的说法蔓延全省，村夫都在埋怨国家和国家教会虽称自己信奉新教，却名不副实。\n而官方对此的态度迄今为止还十分冷漠，甚至在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的教士们也感到这些恐慌是有理由的。

original: Try to calm the situation down.
Act forcefully.
They are right to be afraid. Repent, for the end is nigh!
translation: 他们有理由去担忧末日。忏悔吧，末日近了！

original: Millenarianism

The belief that the violent end of the world is upon us has gripped the faithful of this province. Believing that the end of days will purge society of all corruption and sin this has mobilized the population here against us and against the state church.
