translation: 混乱的世界末日将要降临的信仰已经笼罩了这个省份的信徒。这一信仰相信世界末日将会净化社会的一切堕落和罪孽，这煽动人们起来对抗国家教会。

original: Fear of the Apocalypse

'We know by scripture, and all learned men affirm the same, that the world was meant to endure 6000 years'.\nMany in our country feel that the end of days is drawing nearer and our State Church is doing what it can to capitalize on this belief. While we run the risk of fueling Millenarian anti-establishment forces in our country the vast majority focuses on ensuring the safety of their own souls.
translation: 从经文中我们得知，并且所有学者也一致认为，世界总共应度过6000年。\n我国的许多人都感觉末日将近,而国家教会也尽其所能地利用这一信仰。而当我们冒着在国内煽动起千禧年主义反体制势力的风险时，却发现我国大多数人都只关心保证自身灵魂的安全。

original: Avarice

Some members of our State Church has suffered dearly due to excessively high interest rates, voices are being raised and pamphlets circulated condemning 'Usury and Fraud' and claiming that petty brokers are to be seen in every street.\nIt is the view of our State and its Church that charging interest is compatible with being a good Christian yet in some cases it seems it can lead to excesses. Perhaps it would be best to further decrease the allowed amount of interest to curb the worst cases.
translation: 我国教会中的一些成员已深深受害于过高的贷款利息率，关于此事的呼声越来越大，四处流传的小报谴责着“高利贷和欺诈”，声称卑鄙的掮客在街巷上到处可见。\n而我们国家和教会的观点则认为，收取利息和成为一个正派基督徒之间并无冲突，虽然有时候这种活计会弄出很过分的状况。也许我们最好降低法律允许的最高利息率，遏制最坏的情况发生。

original: Ignore the naysayers.
Let us decrease the interest limit for a while.
translation: 那我们就暂时把最高利息率调低点吧。

original: Economic Downturn

Widespread use of excessively high interest rates and financial speculation has led to an economic downturn in this area and some feel the state church is at fault for easening the Christian ban on usury.
translation: 这一地区由于普遍的过高利息率以及金融投机活动，引发了经济衰退，有些人认为国家教会放松对基督徒放高利贷的禁止是错误的。

original: Stricter Usury Regulations
In order to curb the worst excesses of allowing interest to be charged for lending money we have changed the maximum allowed amount of interest slightly.
translation: 为了遏止允许借贷收息会带来的最坏后果，我们稍微调低了利息上限。

original: Message for the Faithful

One of the great Strengths of having a State Church is the ability to reach out to all the faithful in our country at once. A national day of prayer is coming up and it is customary for the Sermon this day to be partly dictated by the central State Church. What should the sermon focus on during the years ahead?
translation: 建立国家教会的一项强大的优势就在于它可以同时惠及全国的信徒。下个全国礼拜日将近，按惯例这一天的讲道一定程度上应该由中央国家教会决定。那么今后我们讲道的内容应该专注于什么呢？

original: Gratefulness for the Peace we now enjoy.
translation: 感恩我们现在享有的和平。

original: Justification for our Wars.
Purity of Faith.
The unity of Christianity itself.
Avoid Meddling on the local level.
Propagating for the value of Peace
We have used the national prayer day sermon to make our subjects understand the great value of Peace and how every good Christian should do their utmost to preserve it.
translation: 我们在全国礼拜日上的讲道，让我们的臣民明白和平的可贵，同时要求每位善众都竭力维护这份和平。

original: Propagating for the justness of our Wars
We have used the national prayer day sermon to make our subjects understand the justness of our cause in the wars we fight.
translation: 我们在全国礼拜日上的讲道，让我们的臣民明白，我国每一场战争都是合理正义的。

original: Propagating for the Purity of our Faith
We have used the national prayer day sermon to make our subjects understand the great value of preserving the purity of our faith and how to spot those who would soil it.
translation: 我们在全国礼拜日上的讲道，让我们的臣民明白，保持自身信仰的纯洁性是多么可贵，以及如何揪出那些污辱纯洁信仰的人。

original: Propagating for Christian Unity
We have used the national prayer day sermon to make our subjects understand the great value of bonding together with Christendom as a whole against the infidels.
translation: 我们在全国礼拜日上的讲道，让我们的臣民明白，团结整个基督世界，合为一体对抗异端是多么的可贵。

original: Resistance to the Reformation in [Root.GetName]

There are still those, especially in the countryside who oppose the State Church of [Root.Owner.GetName] and who long to return to the embrace of the Roman Church. There is, however, a big difference between religious doubts and open rebellion and so far things have been quiet in [Root.GetName]. The State Church has in turn been content to leave most of these people alone as long as they attend services and pay their taxes.\nIt seems this peace was not meant to last. The recent collection of Church Silver in the area has been regarded as an open declaration of war by the local population and they are now taking up arms to protect their Churches from the greedy hands of [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 仍有一些人，特别是在乡村地区，反对[Root.Owner.GetName]的国家教会，渴望投回罗马教廷的怀抱。然而，质疑教会和公然反叛是有天渊之别的，并且[Root.GetName]的事态还一直很平静。国家教会转而满足于不管大部分的人的信仰问题，只要他们正常服役和纳税。\n现在看来，平静无法再持续下去。最近收缴教会银器的行为被当地人民视作公开宣战，他们拿起武器保卫他们的教堂免遭[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的贪婪之手。

original: Time for some forceful persuasion.
translation: 是时候去用武力说服一下。

original: Exempt this area for now.
$THEOLOGIAN$ denounces the Church of [Root.GetName]

$THEOLOGIAN$ had a promising career long before the reformation reached our country and the state Church of [Root.GetName] was created. As an influential person with firmly grounded ideas, $THEOLOGIAN$ has been hard to convince to embrace the new nature of the Church. This resistance to change has only grown bigger over the years and now $THEOLOGIAN$ is seen to be openly opposed to the Church. A member of the court cannot be seen to openly oppose [Root.Monarch.GetName] like this, something must be done!
translation: $THEOLOGIAN$在新教改革进入我国，[Root.GetName] 的国家教会创立之前，拥有一份前途远大的职业。作为之前当地具有影响力又思想保守的人士，$THEOLOGIAN$难以被说服接受新的教义。然而抵触的情绪随年越盛，现如今$THEOLOGIAN$开始公开反对教会。然而一名宫廷大臣是不允许这样公然反对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的，必须有所对策！

original: Catholic Stronghold
The people of this province have been exempted from the state Church and are allowed to practice their old Catholic faith, for now.
translation: 本省的人民被国家教会特许，仍可信仰追随原有天主教信仰。

original: Banish $THEOLOGIAN$
Try $THEOLOGIAN$ for blasphemy and order $THEOLOGIAN_POSS_PRONOUN$ execution.
This is unfortunate.
Catholic Thinker at Court
translation: 宫廷里的天主教思想家

original: $NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$ is famous for $NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$ sharp intellect and $NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$ presence in our court lends a certain grandeur to our name. $NATURAL_SCIENTIST_CAP_ADJ$$PHILOSOPHER_CAP_ADJ$ is, however, also a firm Catholic and has been allowed to practice $NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$ faith as he wishes in order to come here. It would be unthinkable for the Church of [Root.GetName] itself to criticize [Root.Monarch.GetName] but in the streets of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] there is talk of $NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$ trying to plant subversive Catholic ideas in the head of [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: $NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$由于$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$的睿智而闻名于世。$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$在我们的宫廷中的任职使我们声名显赫。然而$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_CAP_ADJ$$PHILOSOPHER_CAP_ADJ$也同时是一位坚定的天主教徒，为了招徕他，我们允许他保留$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$信仰。没想到的是[Root.GetName]的教会首先发难，指责[Root.Monarch.GetName]。这还不够，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的街头上更流传着$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$正尝试用危险的天主教思想影响[Root.Monarch.GetName]。

original: Let them talk.
Dismiss $NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$ from court.
Influence of $TREASURER$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$

It is rumored that $TREASURER$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$, a close advisor of [Root.Monarch.GetName], is in fact harboring hidden Calvinist leanings. A number of recent laws have been accused of secretly trying to bring our country closer to the ideals of the Reformed churches.
translation: 有传言说[Root.Monarch.GetName]的亲近顾问$TREASURER$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$其实隐藏着加尔文主义倾向。我们近来颁布的一系列法令，被人指责是将我们国家带向改革宗的理想去。

original: Dismiss these rumors as nonsense.
translation: 驳斥这些毫无根据的谣言。

original: Publicly distance yourself from $TREASURER$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$
Attempt to make adjustments to the offending laws.
translation: 尝试调整这些带有侵犯性的法令.

original: The Education of [Root.Heir.GetName]

The teachers of [Root.Heir.GetName] all find [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] to be an exceptionally promising future ruler. In all ways relating to statecraft [Root.Heir.GetName] has shown [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] to be both interested and talented. However the religious authorities have come to worry that [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] has taken a much too large interest in the Catholic faith we have left behind.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]的老师们都发现[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]将来有望成为当世明君。[Root.Heir.GetName]在与治国相关的所有方面都显示出[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]有很大的兴趣和天赋。然而我国宗教当局担心[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]把大量精力都用在我们已经抛弃的天主教信仰上。

original: It will make [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] a better ruler.
translation: 这会让[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]成为更好的统治者。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] will be allowed to pursue an interest in Catholicism.
translation: 允许[Root.Heir.GetName]研究天主教教义的兴趣。

original: Forbid all study of Papist Teachings.
translation: 禁止所有的天主教教义课程教授。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] will be hindered from pursuing an interest in Catholicism.
translation: 不允许[Root.Heir.GetName]研究天主教教义。

original: Catholic Leanings of [Root.Monarch.GetName]

It is no secret that [Root.Monarch.GetName] has a great understanding of the Catholic faith, perhaps much more so than the clergy in our State Church would wish. Nonetheless [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] coronation has been a popular event and the people seem to be behind our new ruler. Undoubtedly an understanding of foreign faiths may be of good use to a ruler of a Protestant Kingdom and few would dare accuse [Root.Monarch.GetName] of Crypto-Catholicism.
translation: 人尽皆知[Root.Monarch.GetName]对天主教教义有着深刻理解，甚至超乎我们国教会神职人员的想象。尽管如此，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]加冕礼备受欢迎，人民看起来很支持这位新君主。 毫无疑问，通晓外国信仰对于统治一个新教王国可能很有益处，而且几乎没有人胆敢指责[Root.Monarch.GetName]是天主教秘密信徒。

original: Long live [Root.Monarch.GetName]!
Tolerant Monarch
Our ruler is known for a great understanding of other faiths and religious minorities in our reign enjoy privileges they otherwise would not because of it.
translation: 我们的君主对于各种宗教信仰都了如指掌，正因如此，我国的少数宗教的信徒们能够享受宗教宽容的特权。

original: Conscience of [Root.Monarch.GetName]

Years have passed and [Root.Monarch.GetName] has proven to be a fair and just ruler. The clergy no longer fear a sudden Catholic coup and their hatred of Papism has been tempered by [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s understanding of the religion.\n[Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself], however, is troubled. As the years have gone by [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has come to realize that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] personal faith lies much closer to the Catholics that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has done so much to protect and not with the dogmatic State Church of [Root.GetName]
translation: 岁月流逝，[Root.Monarch.GetName]成了一位公正贤能的明君。国家教职人员不再担心天主教徒突然政变，对教皇制度的憎恶也随着[Root.Monarch.GetName]的对宗教的广博理解而被缓解。\n[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]却发现自己饱受困扰。因为这么多年过去了，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]才发觉[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的个人信仰越发倾向天主教信仰，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]做了很多努力保护天主教信仰，而不是追随[Root.GetName]国家教会的教条。

original: Personal Abdication is the only Solution.
translation: 唯一的办法只能是退位。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] will have to carry on with a plagued conscience.
Plagued Conscience

Our ruler is far from an ardent believer in the teachings of our State Church. While this does not directly influence our policies it means that the running of the Church itself has become a low priority.
translation: 我们的统治者远不是我们国家教会教义的忠实信徒。虽然这不直接影响我国的政策，但是教会运作的处于了次要地位。

original: Frictions between [Root.Heir.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetName]

[Root.Heir.GetName]'s interest in Catholicism seems only to have grown over the years and [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] now surrounds [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] with philosophers, scientists and artists from the Catholic world. This has grown into something of an embarrassment. As head of the [Root.GetName] Church it is the duty of [Root.Monarch.GetName] to uphold the values of the reformation. Unless [Root.Heir.GetName] can be convinced to change [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] the authority of our Church may suffer.
translation: 年复一年，[Root.Heir.GetName]对天主教的兴趣日渐增长，因此现在[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]招徕了许多来自天主教地区的哲学家，科学家，艺术家，常年围绕着[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself]。在已然发展成了不妥的状况。作为[Root.GetName]教会的领袖，[Root.Monarch.GetName]有责任捍卫宗教改革的信条。除非[Root.Heir.GetName]能被说服改变[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]信仰，否则教会的权威将要受到损害。

original: Try to force [Root.Heir.GetName] to change [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] ways.
Agree to disagree.
[Root.Heir.GetName] sees the error of [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] ways

After it has been made entirely clear to [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] what is expected of [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] [Root.Heir.GetName] has agreed to more clearly distance [Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] from Catholics and their beliefs.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetHerHim]终于完全明白[Root.Heir.GetHerHim] 应该怎样之后，[Root.Heir.GetName]同意了要求，表示[Root.Heir.GetHerselfHimself] 会和天主教徒与天主教进一步划清界限。

original: Praise God!
[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] worth a Mass

Ever since [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] youth [Root.Monarch.GetName] has doubted the truth in the teachings of the Church of [Root.GetName] and now [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has finally taken the step not only to personal conversion but has begun to counter-reform the entire kingdom. The road ahead is by no means going to be an easy one but nobody is as convinced as [Root.Monarch.GetName] that all will go well.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]从[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]青年时代起，就开始质疑[Root.GetName]国家教会所传授的真理。而现在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]最终也决定不只个人转换信仰，还已经开始在整个王国中反对宗教改革。这条路并不是一条阳关大道，但是没人能比[Root.Monarch.GetName]更坚信一切都会转变。

original: Let us put our faith in God.
Converted Monarch
Our Monarch has converted the country due to a personal conviction that Catholicism is the true faith and will do anything to make all subjects follow suit.
translation: 我们的君主因个人信仰,而令全国改宗天主教,并认为天主教教义是唯信之真理，要让全国子民都顺从其.

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] unwilling to Compromise

Despite trying to make the expectations on a royal Heir as clear as possible [Root.Heir.GetName] insists in upholding [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] harmful fascination with the Catholic Church. In the capital propagandists and satirists have already begun distributing pamphlets about the fact that [Root.Monarch.GetName] cannot seem to control his own kin, let alone protect the faithful of the kingdom.
translation: 尽管我们尽力去期望继承人尽可能清楚地认识到[Root.Heir.GetName]坚持[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]对天主教的迷恋是有害的。但在首都，捕风抓影的人们和讽刺者们早就已经开始散发一些关于 [Root.Monarch.GetName]似乎无法控制自己的亲属，独自一人维护对国家的忠诚。

original: There is nothing to be done.
We have no choice but to disinherit [Root.Heir.GetName]!
translation: 我别无选择只好剥夺[Root.Heir.GetName]继承权!

original: Troublesome Cleric

$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ has had an exemplary career, starting as a low level local priest and finally reaching the very top of the Church hierarchy and has over the years come to be regarded as a pillar of the Church of [Root.GetName]. It is therefore very troubling that $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ have begun to take issue with the direction the Church is heading. While $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ has steered clear of directly criticizing [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] it is hard for anyone to take $THEOLOGIAN_POSS_PRONOUN$$INQUISITOR_POSS_PRONOUN$ words as anything but harmful for the State Church.
translation: $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$拥有一个具有示范性的职业生涯。他从当地一份底层的牧师做起，最后到达了教会等级制度的顶端。而且多年来，他已经被视为是[Root.GetName]教会的支柱。但令人不安的是， $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ 很早就开始对教会的发展方向提出异议。虽然$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ 已经开始操纵起舆论直接批评[Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]，然而很难让任何人相信$THEOLOGIAN_POSS_PRONOUN$$INQUISITOR_POSS_PRONOUN$ 的话会对国家教会有害。

original: I'm sure we can find someone else to take $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$'s place.
translation: 我相信我能找人代替$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$的位置.

original: Allow it but make sure $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ has no real power.
translation: 允许他但是确保 $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ 没有实权。

original: The Lingering Hope of Reconciliation

There are still those who long for the time when the Christian faith was unified. While they see the Reformation and the birth of Protestantism as necessary they also lament that it couldn't be done without a schism.\nWhile well intended these kind of leanings can be very harmful to a State Church such as ours and it is therefore a matter of some concern that it seems a number of the officials in our Church as well as some at some of our Seminar are entertaining such ideas.
translation: 现在仍有些人渴望基督信仰能联合统一.当他们看到宗教改革以及新教派别兴起时,他们更是对现状唏嘘不已.\n然而这些看起来美好倾向实际上对现在我国的国家教会十分不利,因此我们担心教会的宗教人员会有意无意地提到倾向.有些人仍然期望终有一天基督信仰可以联合统一。当他们知道改个

original: A reprimand will be enough.
translation: 发布一则训令谴责就够了.

original: Round up the prominent ones and try them for treason.
translation: 抓主骨干分子，并以叛国罪惩治他们

original: Philippists

While it is frowned upon there are some in the hierarchy of our State Church who entertain the idea of reunification with Rome. Our inability to deal decisively with these elements has made it harder for us to convert remaining Catholics within our borders.
translation: 虽然难以接受,但我国某些教士阶层人士确实怀有与罗马联合的想法.同时我们的无能让我们难以转变国境内剩余的天主教徒的信仰.

original: Protestant Diaspora

As Christendom grows ever more divided the trickle of religious refugees has grown into a steady stream. Religious conflicts in major Catholic states have caused many Protestant to leave their old home countries. As a Protestant country with our own Church we would be able to offer them protection and we could also make good use of their skills and assets.\nProtestantism is, however, far from a unified faith and it is not very likely that all those who come to us will find the Church of [Root.GetName] to match their own beliefs fully. While it would be admirable to receive all Protestant Immigrants it might be more prudent to hand pick those that possess skills we could make good use of.
translation: 随着基督教世界的分裂，原本零散的宗教难民已经成为了一个稳定的庞大的群体。在主要的天主教国家内，宗教冲突让许多新教徒背井离乡。作为一个新教国家，我国将能够为他们提供庇护，也能对他们的能力和资产善加利用。\n然而新教宗派远非一个统一信仰派别，他们前来我国都要找到[Root.GetName]的教会以满足他们的精神需求。虽然接收宗教难民是可敬的行径，但也要量力而行，并好好利用。

original: Open our borders to all Protestants.
translation: 向所有新教教徒开放我国边境.

original: Only receive those who can be of use to us.
translation: 只接受那些对我们有用的.

original: Turn them away.
Offer them land in the New World.
translation: 为他们在新大陆提供土地。

original: Protestant Immigrants

Our country has welcomed a number of Protestant immigrants fleeing from their catholic home countries. Their faith may not match ours exactly but we have a common enemy in the Pope and we can put their skills to good use.
translation: 我国迎来了许多从天主教国家逃离的新教移民。他们的信仰可能与我们不完全相同，但我们可以充分利用他们的技能来对抗我们共同的敌人——教宗。

original: Influx of Protestant Refugees

A large number of Protestant immigrants have settled here, leaving their Catholic home countries behind. As they are not used to our state church there has been some tension but the province has in general seen an economic upturn.
translation: 一股数量庞大的宗教难民抛弃了故国定居在这里.虽然他们并不习惯被我国国家教会从而产生了一点矛盾,但总体来说他们已经让这个省份的经济有所好转。

original: Welcomed Refugees
Turned away Refugees
Protestant Emigration
A number of Protestant Emigrants have been promised the protection of our state here by our mother country.
translation: 大量新教移民被我过许诺会受到我们的保护

original: Criticism of Official Bible

Having a Bible Translation sanctioned by the state has done much to unify the Protestant faith in our country and it is the opinion of both the general public and most theologians that our translation has resulted in a book far more true to the origins of our religion.\nThere are, however, also some who find the official Bible translation very lacking. Some groups claim that it is simply outdated and in need of modernization, some that it is too favorable to the ruling state and that we have attempted to make use of it to pacify our subjects. Others again simply see it as not going far enough and still maintain many of the errors that have accumulated over the years in previous versions of the Bible.
translation: 我们拥有一个经国家批准的圣经译本，极大程度地促进国内新教信仰的统一。而且大众和神学家认为我们的译本是一本更贴近宗教起源的书。\n然而也有些人发现官方的圣经译本存在疏漏。一些群体群体声称它仅仅只是过时了，需要与时俱进。一些人认为它过于讨人欢喜以至于不能用于管理国家，因为我们已经开始尝试利用它管理我们的臣民。其他人则是仅仅看到错误并不多，但是仍然坚持一些在历年来诸多圣经版本积累的错误。

original: Stand by the existing version.
Order a new translation.
New Bible Translation

Work is underway to create a new Bible Translation to be used as the official Bible of our State Church. The aim is to as far as possible create a Bible that will satisfy both the needs of the state and address the objections to the old translation that some have had.
translation: 创建一个新的圣经译本作为我国教会官方圣经的工作正在进行。它的目标是创建一个既能满足国家需要，又能解决上一个版本中就已经存在的一些异议。

original: Controversy over Official Bible

We have published an official Bible to be used by our State Church which has done a great deal to promote the uniformity of our faith and to wash away old Catholic baggage. It is, however, impossible for a single translation to satisfy all of those that previously used their own various Bible translations and it seems groups from all over the religious spectra has managed to find some passage they object to. Nonetheless we have elected to stick by our version, confident that it will outlast them all in the end.
translation: 我们出版了一个被国家教会使用的官方圣经，它极大程度上促进了我们信仰的统一，也清除了旧的天主教障碍。然而，对于一个单独的译本，它不可能让之前使用过五花八门的圣经译文的信徒们满意。而且似乎来自各个宗教信仰的人都已经找到了一些他们所反对的篇章。如此,我们选择坚持我们当前的版本,相信它们会比这些老顽固们活得时间更长。

original: The Dilemma of [Root.Monarch.GetName]

It is no secret that the marriage of [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] spouse isn't the most loving union and producing an heir has turned out to be quite problematic. It is rumored that [Root.Monarch.GetName] has had a number of extra marital affairs and the reputation of our Kingdom is running the risk of becoming tarnished. [Root.Monarch.GetName] will not hear of a word about divorce, however, and considers such a thing deeply immoral.\nInstead [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] argues that if bigamy could work for the patriarchs then perhaps that could be used as a precedent for allowing [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] a second union. The Reformers that have been contacted to give their opinions on this have been very hesitant, to say the least, but [Root.Monarch.GetName] seems determined this is the best solution to [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] problem.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]妻子的婚姻并不美好早已经不是秘密,但更重要的是他们没有诞下子嗣.早有传言道[Root.Monarch.GetName]在外有为数甚多的外遇,而这样的行为会败坏我们王国的声誉. [Root.Monarch.GetName]并不害怕离婚,但是想到这些事情确实十分不道德。 \nInstead 而[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]却十分赞成大主教批准他再婚,因为之前已经有先例,再或许让[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]反过来批准大主教成立第二个教会组织.至少来说,就改革派的意见也十分的犹豫不决,但[Root.Monarch.GetName]似乎认定这是最好的解决[Root.Heir.GetHerHis] 问题的方法.

original: Bigamy is sinful.
If it was good enough for the Patriarchs, it's good enough for me.
translation: 如果大主教们都行,那为何我不行.

original: If it was good enough for my predecessors it's good enough for me.
translation: 对于上一任国王来说足够好的对我也一样。

original: Bigamy
Rather than live in sin with partners beside the royal spouse or forever in a loveless marriage our ruler has followed the example of the patriarchs and wedded multiple spouses.
translation: 我们的统治者遵循着先辈们的行为以及多妻的习俗，而不是因王室配偶之外的情人而活在罪恶中，也不是将自己永远的禁锢于一个没有爱情的婚姻中。

original: Bigamy
Overextended Courts

The incorporation of Mosaic Law directly into the laws of [Root.GetName] has led to an unprecedented growth of our country's Justice System in some parts of the country. A steady stream of accusations has grown into an almost unmanageable number of court cases. Not only that but the number of death sentences has also risen greatly and where it not for the already established practice to give dispensation for such a conviction if the convicted can present a certain sum of money as compensation we would have a very bad situation on our hands.
translation: 把摩西法典直接融入[Root.GetName]的法律中,让我国司法系统得到前所未及的进步.然而持续不断的指控已经使我们法庭案件的数量到达了几乎无法管理的地步。不仅如此，四星判决的数量也大幅上升，而且令人棘手的是，只要被判刑的人愿意提供一定数量的罚金作为赔偿的话，他就将免于惩罚。

original: If they have been convicted they have sinned and must pay.
translation: 被判刑的人都是罪恶的，他们必须付出代价。

original: Let's give the courts more resources to handle this.
translation: 让法庭更多的权限去处理这些情况.

original: Overflowing Courts

The incorporation of Mosaic Law directly into the laws of our country has resulted in relatively common incidents such as adultery carrying the death sentence. The population in this area has made good use of the laws and while it is encouraging to see the authority of our courts increase the number of cases has grown to an almost unmanageable level.
translation: 把摩西法典融入我国的法律中,导致了很多案件都被要判死刑,如通奸等等.然而在法律越来越运用纯熟之后,换来的就是法庭的权威上升到什么都管的地位.

original: Stern Theologian

An unusual man has recently emerged from the education system of the Church of [Root.GetName]. He is a priest of unusual charisma and conviction yet instead of desiring to change the Church in accordance to his convictions he is determined to instill the value of keeping with the Protestant traditions and dogmas of the State Church.\nThis is an unusual man in times like these and we could undoubtedly put him to good use.
translation: 最近从[Root.GetName]教会的教育系统中诞生了一个不平常的人.他是一名有着与众不同的魅力与信念的牧师。他并不打算按照他的信念去改变教会。他将追随新教传统与国家教义的价值观灌输给他人。\n在这种时候我们可以好好利用这个异乎寻常的人.

original: Let him educate our priests.
translation: 让他来教育我们的牧师.

original: Let use him to battle heresy.
Loyalty and Tradition, these are the values needed for a leader of our Church.
translation: 忠诚与传统,这就是我国国家教会领袖该有的品质.

original: Stern Theologian

The Education of the priests of our State Church is influenced to a very high degree by an unusually charismatic and dogmatic leader, a man who can instill the right zeal for our state church in our clergy.
translation: 一个不同寻常地有超凡魅力的、教条的，能在我们的牧师中为我们国家教会逐渐灌输正确的热情的领导者，会极大程度地影响我们国家教会的牧师教育。

original: Stern Theologian
The undertaking to convert heathens and heretics is being lead by an unusually charismatic and dogmatic leader, a man who inspires the will to join the State Church like few others.
translation: 转变异教徒与异端信仰的事业由一位十分地有魅力的和教条的领导者领导，这个男人像少数其他人一样激发意志去加入国家教会。

original: Stern Theologian
Our State Church is being lead by an unusually charismatic and dogmatic leader. A stern theologian who values tradition and loyalty above all else.
translation: 我国的国家教会正被一位异乎寻常人魅力的教条式领袖领导着.这个严肃的神学家认为传统和忠诚高于一切。

original: Sacramentarians

Whether the body of Christ is really physically present during the Eucharist or not was one of the main points on which Protestants and Catholics disagreed during the reformation. Some, however, have trouble even accepting the Lutheran Sacramental Union. A recent publication that has gained some circulation in our country seems to have been authored by one of these groups. It will undoubtedly be forgotten soon enough but in the short term the legitimacy of our State Church is being questioned.
translation: 基督的圣体是否真的在圣餐中存在过是新教徒与天主教徒在改革中意见有分歧的要点之一。一些人甚至无法接受路德改革教会。最近在我国发行的一本出版物似乎是由其中一个团体编写的。这无疑将很快被遗忘，但在短期内，我们国教会的合法性受到质疑。

original: Regrettable.
This smells of Crypto-Calvinism, find and banish the instigators.
translation: 这听起来像地下加尔文主义,搜捕并销毁这些煽动分子。

original: Attempt to limit the spread of these pamphlets.
translation: 尝试限制那些刊物的传播.

original: Reformer Praises the Church of [Root.GetName]

One of the great thinkers at the forefront of the Reformation has recently held up our country as a good example for others to follow in one of his publications as well as during a disputation. This will surely strengthen both our international reputation and give further weight behind the authority of our church itself.
translation: 最近，一位站在改革前沿的伟大思想家在他的出版物和一场辩论中，将我国作为一个很好的案例让其他人去遵循， 这无疑会加强我们的国际声誉，进一步强化我们教会本身的权威。

original: Make use of this in our internal propaganda.
translation: 在我们的内部宣传中充分利用他

original: This will help bring us closer to other Protestants.
translation: 这会拉近我们与其他新教徒的距离.

original: Relation to all §YCatholic§! countries decreased by §R35§!.\nRelation with all §YProtestant§! countries increased by §G35§!.\nThese effects will dissipate over the next 12 years.
translation: 与所有§Y天主教§!国家的关系下降§R35§!.\n与所有§Y新教§!国家的关系上升§G35§!.\n这些影响会在未来12年后消失.

original: Ideal Protestant Country
Ideal Protestant Country
Circulation of Hostile Publications

A great number of Pamphlets, woodcuts and other minor publications have begun to circulate recently, no doubt funded by our enemies. In these vile texts it is claimed that many aspects of the Church of [Root.GetName] have been devised as a matter of convenience for the state.\nWhile it is doubtful that this critique will leave a permanent mark on the reputation of our State Church it has been harmed in the short run.
translation: 大量的小册,木雕品和其他小型刊物,最近开始在很多处地方流通,这无疑是我们的敌人搞的鬼.这些恶劣的文字称,[Root.GetName]教会在很多地方只为了国家利益设计.\n虽然这些文字值得商榷,但无疑很快就会对我们国家教会的声誉造成持久的恶劣影响.

original: Witch Trials in [Root.GetName]

The transition from being part of the wider Roman Catholic Church to the local Church of [Root.Owner.GetName] has generally worked well but in some areas it has become unclear where authority lies. When there was suspicion of Witchcraft in the old days the Catholic church would often become involved and might temper the outrage of the local population. The reformation on the other hand has done much to strengthen the belief in popular versions of Christianity.\nA number of women stand accused of Witchcraft in [Root.GetName] and a search has already begun to find more. Local priests and magistrates have gotten involved in the trials but so far state has not been involved. As the number of women awaiting trial grows larger and larger it may be necessary for us to act.
translation: 在[Root.Owner.GetName]地方的旧有罗马教会转型成国家教会的过程中,大部分还是进展良好的,然而有些地方去演化成权威丧失后的社会混乱.因为在以往某些天主教教会通常会抓捕一些女巫嫌疑人以平民愤.但无论如何这项转型改革有利于改造民众的基督教信仰模式.\n在[Root.GetName]有一群妇女给指控施行巫术,以及搜查连坐了越来越多的人.本地牧师以及官员也被卷进这场审判中,但这时国家层面还没被波及.可是越来越多的涉案妇女需要我们立即作出行动.

original: Condone the Trials.
For as long as the trials go on there is a risk that they will spread to more provinces or escalate out of control.
translation: 这些审判长久下去很危险,恐慌会蔓延到更多的地方去.

original: Ignore the Trials.
We must stop these Trials.
translation: 我们必须停止这些审判.

original: Witch trials will not spread or escalate from this province.
translation: 女巫审判不会在这个省份蔓延或升级

original: Regrettable.
Two can play at this game, start a counter-campaign
translation: 两个玩家可以开始一场天主教改革

original: Incorporation of new regions

As our country expands into new regions with Protestant population we have begun the process of incorporating them into the State Church. With the introduction of the Church Parish registers in some recently acquired lands has come a surprising revelation. The area is much more densely populated than its former masters seems to have realized.
translation: 新教信徒在我们的新区域逐渐扩散开来,我国国家教会也开始在这些地区中扎根.由于引入了教会登记册这项制度,给了此地的地方管理新的启示. 从而让这些地区的人口比之前要稠密要兴盛.

original: Great!
Pietism
A new kind of Protestant movement has begun to take hold in our country. Pietists are concerned with inner salvation and show little interest in theological study and the dogma of the State Church.
translation: 一种新兴的新教运动在我国出现.虔敬主义者们只关注内在的自我救赎,而很少在意国家教会所传授的神学理论和神学教条.

original: Attempt to limit its influence.
Let us approach the Pietists with interest.
translation: 饶有兴致地去接触虔敬主义者.

original: Spread of Pietism

Pietists believe in the inner religiousness of individuals rather than in theological dogmas. This lack of interest in strictly defined rules has led to a weakening of the authority of our state church while bringing us closer to other Evangelical churches.
translation: 虔敬主义的信徒宁愿相信内在个人神秘主义的宗教理念,也不愿相信官方神学的教条.这种缺乏严格规章制度的办法严重摧毁我国国家教会的权威,这给了其他福音派可乘之机.

original: Iconoclast Riots in [Root.GetName]

Hatred of the Icons and Images of the old Catholic church is a thing that many Protestant have in common and the policy of allowing these in the Church of [Root.Owner.GetName] has therefore never been entirely unproblematic.\nEnraged at what they see as idolatry the population of [Root.GetName] have stormed many Churches in the province, smashing painted windows and destroying Icons and Altars.
translation: 厌恶旧天主教会中的宗教圣像是很多新教徒的共情,以及[Root.Owner.GetName]教会中共同通过的毫无疑问的一项政策.\n[Root.GetName]的人们被圣像崇拜的现象所触怒了,便冲进本地的教堂之中砸毁彩绘玻璃和雕塑祭坛等等.

original: Punish the perpetrators.
Repair and restore the damaged Churches
translation: 修复还原那些被毁的雕像

original: Iconoclast Riots
Rioters have destroyed Altars, paintings and painted windows in this province, determined to root out what they see as idol worship in our State Church.
translation: 这场骚乱破坏了本省内祭坛,画作,彩绘玻璃,并决心要将他们所见的我国国家教会的偶像崇拜所根除.

original: Charismatic Patriot Preacher in [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]中爱国且富有魅力的传教士

original: [Root.GetName] is a region full of small Protestant churches that all reject the idea of a centralized dogmatic church.\nA powerful preacher has gained prominence here and just as his sermons keeps the communities here together they also keep them determined to retain the autonomy from the church of their old homeland.
translation: [Root.GetName]是一个新教小教堂地区,并共同反对建立一个中央集权的教条式教区.\n一位有作为的传教士在此地极度受欢迎,人们除了支持他在当地的布道之外,还支持他所提出的保持自治免受母国国家教会干扰.

original: Excellent.
Let us do what we can to lessen his influence.
translation: 做些什么让他不要那么受追捧.

original: Patriot Preacher
A charismatic preacher in this province is agitating for the need of total religious freedom from our motherland.
translation: 一位富有人格魅力的传教士在本省,极力鼓动我们摆脱母国取得自由.

original: Religious Tensions
This province is experiencing high tensions due to agitation for several opposing religious beliefs.
translation: 本省由于几波不同的宗教信仰所鼓动,而变得高度紧张.

original: Loyalist Preacher
A charismatic preacher in this province is agitating for the need to support the State Church of our motherland.
translation: 一位富有人格魅力的传教士在本省,极力鼓动支持我们母国国家教会.

original: Religious Tensions in [Root.GetName]

Due to our motherland's policy of sending religious heretics to the colonies a wide variety of different faiths can be found in our settlements. While they could all be said to be protestant in some form or another they have views that are often starkly opposed to each other on many issues. The province of [Root.GetName] has been settled by large numbers of two theologically opposed churches, one stands closer to the Reformed churches of Europe, while the other stands closer to the Protestant Churches. Both are, however, just as opposed to the control of the State Church they have left behind. Tensions are running high and it may be best to step in now to keep them apart before things escalate.
translation: 由于我们母国向殖民地输送异宗教徒的政策,一大群信仰不一致的人落户到我们的土地上.虽然在大致上他们都叫做新教徒,然而他们在很多形式上都有其区别.在[Root.GetName]省份定居了两个数量庞大的欧洲神学社区,一个是倾向改革宗,另一个更倾向信义宗.但他们都反对国家教会在背后对他们进行控制.紧张的局势持续高涨,看来最好采取行动以免事态升级.

original: Why distinguish between Heretics? Let them quarrel if they so desire.
translation: 异宗之间的区别？这么喜欢嘈让他们闹去.

original: Convince the Reformed party to move to other lands.
translation: 把改革宗社区迁至另一块地方.

original: Convince the Protestant party to move to other lands.
translation: 把信义宗社区迁至另一块地方.

original: Charismatic Loyalist Preacher in [Root.GetName]
translation: [Root.GetName]上忠诚且富有魅力的传教士

original: Despite the multitude of denominations of Protestantism in these lands the people of [Root.GetName] seem as loyal as ever to the State Church of our motherland. The recent rise of a charismatic preacher, agitating against those who would propose to cut the ties with that Church, has further cemented the loyalty of the [Root.GetName] population.
translation: 尽管在[Root.GetName]殖民地上的新教宗派人士似乎仍对国家教会忠诚如初.而一位新近出名的富有魅力的传教士,试图激励劝慰那些试图切断与国家教会联系的人,并努力去巩固人们对[Root.GetName]的忠诚.

original: Excellent.
We must do what we can to instill the value of freedom in these people.
translation: 我们必须采取措施去应对那些灌输自由价值的人.

original: Religious Tensions in [Root.GetName]

Few are as tempted by the promise of a new life in the colonies as religious dissenters. As a result our lands are home to a wide variety of different Christian faiths which thanks to the great amount of space to be settled is not as big a problem as it would be back in our mother country.\nIt is not entirely without local conflicts, however, and it seems word of some of these have now reached our home country. We have received orders from home to be more careful about those demanding religious freedoms in our lands.
translation: 一部分宗教异议者都吸引到了我国的殖民地上过起了新生活.因此在我国土地上广泛生活着不同宗派的基督教人士,这不得不感谢殖民土地的宽广,从而缓解了母国的压力.\n然而那些本该是当地的冲突却无意间传到了母国政府的耳中.因为我们收到来自母国的敕令,说有宗教团体试图在殖民地起义并带领殖民地脱离母国.

original: Attempt to enforce greater uniformity with the State Church.
translation: 尝试强制用国家教会去整合信仰.

original: This is only a problem for the State Church itself.
translation: 问题发生在国家教会本身.

original: Religious Tensions in [From.GetName]

Many of the heretics in our lands have chosen to settle in the colonies. This is something that for most of the time is beneficial both for us and for the colonies but lately word has reached us of excessive use by some groups of the religious freedoms colonial life entails. Representatives of the Church of [Root.GetName] feel we must act now or the colonies might inspire heretics back home as well.
translation: 很多原来在我国本土居住的异宗人士,都选择定居在了殖民地上.而这确实有利于我国本土和殖民地的发展,但在之后有些宗教组织试图让殖民地脱离本土.[Root.GetName]国家教会代表觉得我们必须采取措施,或许让殖民地上的异宗人士回到本土.

original: Attempt to strengthen the grip of the State Church over the colonies.
translation: 尝试让国家教会加强对殖民地的管理.

original: What our subjects do on another continent need not concern us.
translation: 我们并不关注另一块大陆上臣民的所作所为.

original: State seen to protect Witches
translation: 国家被看作是在保护女巫

original: Our attempts to temper the increasingly paranoid hunt for Witches in [From.GetName] have been entirely misunderstood by the local population there. Our emissaries have themselves been accused of witchcraft and parts of the population have grown very hostile towards any outside power that attempts to protect the Witches that supposedly haunt the region.
translation: 我们尝试缓解在[From.GetName]里日益偏激的猎杀女巫行为,这种行为却被当地的人民完全误解.就连我们派去的使者都被指控是施行巫术,部分人变得对外来力量感到敌意,因为他们认为这是在保护女巫.

original: Ok.
Witch Hunt Spiraling Out of Control
translation: 猎杀女巫之风近乎失控

original: The most horrifying stories have reached us from the ongoing witch trials in the countryside. In a single day over 70 women have been tried and killed and the search for more goes on and on without local authorities as much as having asked for the opinion of the state. The death toll and the loss of central authority are likely to scar the region forever. Leaders of our State Church in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] seem to be as powerless as everyone else to stop this.
translation: 在郊外地区传来了有关审判女巫的可怕故事.传闻是在一天之内有超过70位女性被抓捕或杀害,而且审判过程不经过当地有关部门的许可和调查.这种私刑以及无视中央权威的举措很可能在当地留下惯例.身居[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的国家教会发言人认为停止这些事情是极度无力的.

original: We must stop this folly!
translation: 我们必须停止这些愚蠢的行为!

original: They are doing God's work!
Death of an Heir

The death of an heir is always a sad event but for the high representatives of the Church of [Root.GetName] the news was secretly received with some relief. They now need not worry about a ruler one day that might have Catholic leaning ideas...
translation: 国家继承人的薨逝通常是一件值得悲伤的事情，但对于[Root.GetName]教会的高级代表来说却是暗暗地松了一口气。他们现在不用担心国家未来是一位天主教信仰的领导者……

original: Ok.
Witch Trials

There is currently an ongoing search for Witches in this area and the local authorities are trying and condemning all Witches that turn up. As the situation grows more and more intense the local economy suffers from the uncertainty and disruption of both the rumors and general scare as well as the death of a number of persons from all parts of society.
translation: 某个地区中正进行着搜捕女巫的活动,当地政府部门正尝试这谴责逮捕所有女巫.然而当地的局势发展得越来越紧张,致使当地的经济受到影响,恐慌和流言和逼迫着越来越多的人出走.

original: Escalated Witch Hunts

The witch trials in this area have escalated into a blind witch hunt where no one is safe from accusations and the threat of execution. The region is absorbed by paranoia and the local society suffers greatly. The State Church has little authority here as local preachers and magistrates quickly decide on who will live or die.
translation: 某个地区上报了一单女巫审判的案件,一个盲眼女巫指控行巫术并威胁着要处以死刑.报告说这个地区充满这偏见以及对女巫的仇恨,但处理女巫的最终决定权还是落在国家所派遣的牧师和裁判官身上,他们必须尽管作出生死判决.

original: Stopped Witch Trials

A number of Witch Trials in this area has threatened to turn local society apart with neighbors reporting on neighbors. The state has, however, stepped in and attempted to deflect the situation. Everyone is not happy with this solution but tensions seem to be decreasing.
translation: 本地社会上发生的众多女巫审判案件,惊吓到了一家接一家的邻居.而国家已经插足介入,虽然很多都都不满意这种解决方案,但无疑紧张的局势日益缓和.

original: Custodian of the Holy Cities
We control the cities of Mecca and Medina and with them the most sacred shrines in the Islamic world.
translation: 我们控制了麦加和麦地那，这两座在伊斯兰世界里最神圣的城市。

original: Organised Through Bishops

Bishops used to be leader of a single church, confined to an urban area. Nowadays, they lead the churches of a larger area and no longer serve individual congregations. Priests are appointed to minister each congregation, and acts as the bishop's delegate.
translation: 主教过去领导着独一间教会,并局限在城市区域范围内.现在他们领导着更大一篇教会区域不再弹幕伺奉着单一群体.因为在之下有教会的牧师代行主教之职责,伺奉着底下大众.

original: Priests May Marry

Emperor Justinian I declared all marriages contracted by clerics in Holy Orders null and void and children of such marriages illegitimate. Priests have always, more or less illegally, lived with their wives and raised families although celibacy is expected of them. By allowing priests to marry we set the seal of approval on clerical marriage and condemn wovs of celibacy on Biblical grounds.
translation: 东罗马帝国皇帝查士丁尼一世曾宣令，任何与教职人员的婚姻都是无效的，任何教职人员的子嗣都属非法私生，一直以来教牧人员或多或少都会和妻子组成家庭，尽管教义要求他们奉行独身。经过我们法律的允许，教牧人员终于不用收到独身誓言的约束，并用圣经中的内容进行驳斥。

original: Adult Baptism

Being baptised as an adult on the basis of profession of faith in Jesus Christ and as admission into a local community of faith is made by those who believe that saving grace and church membership are gifts from God. The recipient's faith must be vocalised and cannot be imprated or transferred from one person to another.
translation: 成年人受洗是信仰耶稣成为基督徒的基础,还有被本地教会接受为教会成员蒙受神恩的象征.而受洗者的信仰和恩典是自我所独有不能消磨也不能转移给另一个人.

original: Holy Sacraments

The seven sacraments are rituals that are efficacious signs of grace, instituted by Christ and entrusted to the Church, by which divine life is dispensed to us. These Holy Sacraments are: Baptism, Confirmation or Chrismation, Eucharist, Penance, Anointing of the Sick, Holy Orders, and Matrimony.
translation: 七大圣事是要得到神之恩典必须而有效的仪式，是耶稣基督所定下的并赋予教会完成的礼节，圣餐礼更是象征耶稣将神圣的血肉分给世人。七圣礼分别为：洗礼、坚信礼或圣膏、圣餐礼、告解礼、终敷礼、圣秩礼及婚礼。

original: Saints Accept Prayers
The Intercession of saints, that saints may be asked to intercede or pray for others, is a doctrine supported by our church.
translation: 圣徒代赎,以及圣徒帮以救赎等赎罪方法,是被我国教会所支持的赎罪形式.

original: Icons

The images depicting Jesus, Mary, saints and angels, cast in metal, carved in stone, embroidered on cloth, painted on wood or made in many different ways are often illuminated. These icons have been debated and opposed, but the popular favor for icons have guaranteed their continued existence and the Church have finally resigned themselves to allow the veneration of icons.
translation: 耶稣,圣母玛利亚,历代圣徒以及天使的形象通常被造以金属的石制的雕像,还有画在布匹上的、木头上的等,并经常被用以祈祷崇拜.关于圣像的使用,历来是备受争议以及产生激烈反对,然而最终民众更愿意保留圣像,教会也乐于允许圣像崇拜.

original: Legalised Divorces

The Church authority determined the annulment of marriages until it came to be considered a civil contract. Civil authorities can decree a 'divortium a vinculo matrimonii' or 'divorce from all the bonds of marriage', thus dissolving a marriage.
translation: 教会一直是用以宣判婚姻是否合法的权威,直到婚姻变成民事协定之前. 而民政部门在之后能够颁布“解除婚约”还是“脱离婚姻关系”等政令,解除一段婚姻.

original: Heretics Deported
The executions of heretics who opposes our Church in beliefs or opinions deemed heretical is being replaced with the deportation of those guilty of this sin.
translation: 对于反对我国教会的异端分子的处置方法，我们采用了流放代替过去的死刑。

original: Parish Registers

Details of baptisms, marriages and burials will from now on be documented in a parish register. Each parish priest will keep a book where they will enter these events and keep it in a sure coffer with two locks.
translation: 洗礼,婚礼和葬礼的细节,现在都能从教区的登记册文档当中查询.每一个教区的牧师,会拿着一个小本已确保所有事项都不无巨细的记录下来,以保证万无一失.

original: Individual Creeds
Accepting and having a higher tolerance of freethinking which allows people to form their own opinions and beliefs about religion leads to a boost in technology.
translation: 接受并具有较强的自由思维能力，允许人们在宗教方面形成自身独特的看法与信仰，从而推动科技的进步与发展。

original: Allow Usury
Monetary loans with interest that enrich the lender is now allowed and no longer considered sinful.
translation: 放高利贷的有钱商人们已经被允许不被视为有罪.

original: Translated Bibles
Translating bibles to other languages gives people the best resource for knowing God in a language that speaks to their minds and hearts.
translation: 把圣经翻译成其他语言,能带给人们更好的资源去了解上帝,并用自身民族的语言去朗诵金句,从而贯彻意志和心志.

original: Pretender [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] Rises

The former and now deposed monarch of [Root.Country.GetName] had a sizeable family, and at least one of them believe they have a better claim to the throne of [Root.Country.GetName] than [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [From.Country.GetName] asks for help

A rebel army led by a pretender is marching towards [From.Country.GetName]'s capital [From.Capital.GetName]! Family members of the deposed monarch of [From.Country.GetName] have managed to gather up a rather large following and are now trying to dethrone [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 一伙由篡位者率领的叛军正在向[From.Country.GetName]的首都[From.Capital.GetName]进军! 被罢黜的[From.Country.GetName]的君主的家族成员召集了一大批支持者正试图推翻[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]的统治.

original: Send them gold and soldiers.
translation: 给他们送去金币和士兵.

original: They will have to deal with it themselves.

original: Help Arrives?

The pretender rebels are closing in on us, and the messenger sent to [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] should return soon. If we are lucky, perhaps the messenger will have soldiers and gold from [From.Country.GetName] that will help us repel those bastard rebels!
translation: 篡位叛军正在接近，而我们送给[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]的消息将很快得到回应。走运的话，信使会带着来自[From.Country.GetName]的金币和士兵回来帮助我们击败那些该死的叛军！

original: [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] sent us gold and soldiers!
translation: [From.Monarch.GetName] 的 [From.Country.GetName] 送来了金币和士兵!

original: [From.Monarch.GetName] refused to send us help!
Incompetent Cousin
Our dearly beloved cousin that rules over one of our subject states has proven to be an incompetent buffoon, one that cannot and should not rule over any country.
translation: 统治我们附庸国的亲爱的表兄表现得如同小丑一般滑稽，他不应该再统治任何国家。

original: Try to find a better one to rule my subject state.
translation: 尝试寻找更合适的人选来统治你的属国。

original: This can only bring disorder to the country. Leave it be.
translation: 这只会为国家带来混乱。别管这个。

original: Competent Cousin

Reforms have been taken, useless ministers and advisors fired, the army and navy have never been better... It seems that our cousin is serving our subject state well, ruling with a firm hand and making competent decisions.
translation: 改革得以施行，无能的大臣被开除，军队和战舰状态空前……看起来我们的表兄在我们的附庸国统治有方。

original: If we ever had doubts, they are long forgotten now.
translation: 即使我们曾经对他有过怀疑，现在也是忘记的时候了.

original: Cousin Claims Chair of [Root.Country.GetName]

Our weak hold on the throne of [Root.Country.GetName] has made our cousin's claim stronger, and that bastard is claiming the throne should be theirs! It would be easy to depose our cousin, but better for the peace if they can be bribed to retract their claim.
translation: 我们对[Root.Country.GetName]王位的脆弱掌控让我们的表兄增强了对其的宣称，这个该死的杂种正在宣称王位应该是他们的！罢黜他应该很容易，但最好以和平的方式————如果他可以被收买的话。

original: Depose our cousin!
Try to bribe them.
Manpower Misused

The manpower we sent our subject state has been used in ways we could never have foreseen! The men have been forced to build roads and buildings, clean town squares from litter and garbage and not once have they seen battle. Though the roads are broader and better than before, the buildings sturdier and the town squares immaculate, surely this was not how these men were supposed to be used?
translation: 我们送给我们附庸国的士兵正在被用于我们没有预想的方面！他们被逼迫去修路和建筑，清洁广场上的垃圾却从未上过战场。尽管道路比以前更好更宽阔，建筑更结实，广场也更整洁了，但这应该不是这些人被送去的目的？

original: Tell them how to use manpower, correctly!
translation: 告诉他们如何正确的使用人力！

original: They are being resourceful, good for them!
Resourceful or Reprimanded

[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] sent us manpower and subsidized our army, but in these peaceful times there have been no need for soldiers. Instead of idling around doing nothing than train, eat and sleep, we have put them to use. They have been building roads and buildings, clean town squares from litter and garbage and other meaningful tasks that would otherwise take more time and money that [Root.Country.GetName] has not.
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 的 [From.Country.GetName] 送给我们士兵并资助我们的军队，但在这和平的年代我们用不着士兵。我们没有让他们毫无意义的训练、吃饭和睡觉，而是给他们找了活干。他们已经修了桥和建筑，清洁了广场上的垃圾并做了其他一些本来要花更多[Root.Country.GetName]支付不起钱的有意义的事情。

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] thinks we have wasted manpower.
[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has complimented us for being resourceful.
The Manpower Menace

We have had no shortage of manpower since our overlord started subsidizing our army, but there's been much trouble among the soldiers since the new ones arrived. Their culture, language, traditions and sometimes even religion differ from our own soldiers, and this causes a lot of trouble for us. They are less disciplined, or just plain refuses to take orders from our own generals.
translation: 自从我们的宗主国开始资助我们的军队，我们就再也不缺人力了。但在新送来的士兵中存在着很大的麻烦。他们的文化，语言，传统有时甚至宗教都和我们的士兵不同，这带来了很大的麻烦。他们纪律不好，或者只是单纯不听从我们自己的将军的命令。

original: Send them back to where they came from.
Try to get them to behave.
Manpower Causing Mischief in [From.Country.GetName]

There are always trouble when people from different cultures, with different languages, traditions and sometimes even religion come together and must work as an unit even when so many things differ from them. The manpower we send to [From.Country.GetName] has caused more trouble than [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] was willing to deal with, and so some of the men have been sent back to us.
translation: 当一群有着不同文化、语言、传统、甚至宗教的人必须作为一个单位一起工作时，他们间的巨大不同总是会带来麻烦。我们送去 [From.Country.GetName] 的士兵造成的麻烦超出了 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] 的忍耐，因此一部分的人被送了回来。

original: Our men can take orders, [From.Monarch.GetName] did not try hard enough!
translation: 我们的士兵可以执行命令， [From.Monarch.GetName] 还不够努力!

original: Soldiers March on their Stomachs

Food, weapons, clothes and all sorts of equipment are necessary to ensure that our armies will be victorious in any battle. However, with the recent influx of manpower we are able to enlist more men that we can barely afford.
translation: 食物，武器，衣服和各种装备是我们的士兵在任何战场上获胜的必要保障。然而，最近涌入的兵员让我们的军队数量增加，我们快供养不起这么多人了。

original: Ask our overlord for more money for upkeep.
translation: 向宗主国要更多的钱来维持军队.

original: Resolve the problem in another way.
[From.Country.GetName]'s Need for Upkeep

Every decent soldier needs food, a weapon or two, clothes and other kinds of equipment to perform their best for the land who orders them around. [From.Country.GetName] knows their limitations in providing these things for the soldiers they can enlist, and have asked that we send them a little something to help them take care of the manpower we subsidize for them.
translation: 每个像样的士兵需要食物，一或两件武器，衣服和其它各种装备来更好地为他们的领主效忠。[From.Country.GetName] 能给士兵提供的物资数量是有限的，他们要求我们送出一点点帮助，以供养我们资助给他们的士兵。

original: Send them a general.
They need a good advisor.
Send more soldiers and gold.
translation: 送去更多的金币和士兵.

original: They have all that they need, we will give them no more.
translation: 他们已经有了所需的一切，我们不会给任何东西.

original: Sent [From.Country.GetName] a General
Sent [From.Country.GetName] an Advisor
Sent [From.Country.GetName] more Gold and Manpower
translation: 给 [From.Country.GetName] 更多的金币和士兵

original: Sent [From.Country.GetName] Nothing
[From.Country.GetName] Responds to Upkeep Demand

We doubted that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] would send us anything to help us with the upkeep of our armies, but still held hopes for something that could truly help us. A general, an advisor, perhaps even more gold and manpower? What would we get, if anything?
translation: 我们怀疑[From.Country.GetName] 的 [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName]不会给我们任何东西来帮助我们维护军队，但仍然对其它的帮助抱有希望。一个将军，一个顾问，也许是更多的金币和士兵？我们能得到什么？如果有的话？

original: [From.Country.GetName] sent a general.
[From.Country.GetName] sent an advisor.
[From.Country.GetName] sent gold and manpower.
translation: [From.Country.GetName] 送来更多的金币和士兵.

original: [From.Country.GetName] sent nothing.
Embargoes and Smugglers

Recent embargoes against our overlord's rivals might be the end of us, financially. Thankfully, there are esteemed individuals in [Root.Country.GetName] who would graciously help us with our trading problem. Though it might be silly to call such a small operation 'smuggling', that is exactly what it is and as we might be breaking some of the embargoes our overlord demanded of us, they will probably not be happy with our misconduct.
translation: 最近对我们宗主国宿敌的禁运也许是我们财政上的末日。幸运的是，来自[Root.Country.GetName] 的有识之士将巧妙地帮助我们的贸易问题。尽管把这种小动作叫做「走私」有点犯傻，但这确确实实就是走私。既然我们要破坏一些宗主国要求的禁运，他们可能会对这种不端行为非常不满。

original: An opportunity like this seldom appears, we must accept!
translation: 机会难得，我们必须接受!

original: It is not worth risking our overlord's wrath for this.
translation: 在宗主国可能发怒的风险前这不值得。

original: There's a slight chance our overlord might notice this
translation: 宗主国发现的概率微乎其微

original: Our Vassal's Smugglers

Our embargoes against our rivals are not working as well as we had hoped them to, and one reason might be that one of our vassals is still trading with them! They are smuggling goods back and forth and thus interfering with our goals and making us appear weak. The smuggling is very minor, but could become very damaging to us.\nOn the other hand powerful business interests would be willing to pay for ignoring the smuggling.
translation: 我们对宿敌的禁运并没有如期望的那样有效，原因可能是我们某个附庸仍然在与之贸易！他们来回走私货物，妨碍了我们的目标并使我们失去贸易竞争力。这些走私还很少，但将来可能变得很严重。\n另一方面，强大的利益集团愿意付钱来让我们忽略走私。

original: Force them to stop the smuggling, now!
translation: 强迫他们停止走私，现在！

original: They may continue this small endeavor.
translation: 让他们继续这小小的尝试.

original: Our vassal is asked to stop smuggling
translation: 我们的附庸被要求停止走私

original: Our vassal is asked to keep the smuggling small-scaled
translation: 我们的附庸被要求不扩大走私规模

original: Busted!

Our smuggling operation has been exposed by [From.Country.GetName], the smugglers literally caught in the act while off-loading goods to be taken to one of [From.Country.GetName]'s rivals. The cowards confessed everything, even for how long this operation had been going on.
translation: 我们的走私行动被[From.Country.GetName]揭露了，走私犯在将货物卸下到宿敌国家时被[From.Country.GetName]抓到了现行。那个懦夫招供了一切，甚至包括我们走私持续了多长时间。

original: They are forcing us to stop this smuggling!
translation: 他们强迫我们停止走私！

original: As long as we keep it small, we may continue.
translation: 只要保持小规模，我们就可以继续。

original: War Never Changes

In exchange for some peace and quiet, our vassals are obliged to pay more income to us, their overlord. They are not called into any of our wars, which we believe is a great trade-off - for some gold they are excluded from almost all wars. One of our vassals wonder if it weren't better if they were called into wars instead of paying these - in their meaning - 'ridiculous sums'.
translation: 为了换取一些和平和宁静，我们的附庸被要求支付更多的收入给我们，他们的宗主。他们不再被召唤进入任何战争，这在我们看来是一笔划算的买卖————一点点金币就避免了几乎所有的战争。我们的一个附庸想知道，如果他们会被召唤加入战争而不用支付这笔金币，岂不是更好？用他们的话说，那是「荒谬的数量」的金币。

original: Ungrateful morons!
Benefits of Scutage

As our war-ravaged land are slowly being rebuilt, we have noticed a look in our vassal's ambassador's eyes, a look of comprehension and fear mixed with some relief that the land they are looking at is not their own. 'Now,' they say, 'the gold we pay in scutage to avoid being called into war seems like small sum, something we could easily part with in exchange for peace.'
translation: 当我们被战火摧毁的土地在被缓慢地重建，我注意到我们附庸国大使的眼神里混杂着理解和恐惧以及对这片土地不是他们的的释然。“现在，”他说，“我们为免于战争支付的税金看起来是那么少，我们可以轻易拿出来以避免战争。”

original: We told them this would work!
translation: 我们告诉过他们这能行得通!

original: Chaotic Conscripts
The soldiers we sent to one of our vassals as a part of the army subsidizing have gone rogue! They threaten with rebellion unless we withdraw them from our vassal's land and let them come home.
translation: 我们作为军事援助的一部分送到我们附庸国的士兵暴动了！他们威胁称要叛乱，除非我们把他们从附庸的土地上撤回并让他们回家。

original: If we close our eyes, maybe they will go away.
translation: 如果我们坐视不管，他们可能就不闹了。

original: Try to soothe these turbulent forces, let them come home if that is what they wish.
translation: 试着安抚这些骚动的队伍，如其所愿，让他们回家。

original: Squandering Loyalists

We pay loyalists to keep the Liberty Desire in our junior partner's country low and manageable, but the latest reports have become more and more desperate in their pleas for money. Money that they must be squandering, not using it to ensure that the union between our country and theirs remain in place!
translation: 我们通过赞助效忠派来使我们被联统国的独立倾向保持在可控范围内，但最近的报告里他们要起钱来却越来越不顾一切。这些本来应该用于确保两国联合统治的资金被他们挥霍掉了！

original: Convince them to budget the monthly payments better.
translation: 说服他们更好地利用我们每月支付的金币。

original: Send them a small sum to secure their loyalty.
translation: 送去一些金币来确保他们的忠诚。

original: The Loyalist Embarrassment

Though we all appreciate the patriots, the loyalists, the ones who love their country and will protect it to all costs, when they manage to embarrass us in front of the whole court their lovability decreases fiercely. This is not what we pay for, that handsome sum that every month disappears into their greedy pockets! The union we try to protect is worth more than their lice-filled heads.
translation: 尽管我们都很感激爱国者、支持者，那些深爱着国家并义无反顾保护它的人。然而当他们在宫廷中公然使我们尴尬时，他们的可爱荡然无存。这不是我们每月支付一大笔钱到他们贪婪的口袋里的目的！我们努力维护的联合统治远远比他们满是虱子的脑袋重要！

original: Off with their heads and put them on the walls of [Root.Capital.GetName]!
translation: 把他们的头砍下来挂在 [Root.Capital.GetName]的城墙上!

original: Surely there is something we can do to forget and forgive this unfortunate event?
translation: 我们一定可以做些什么来忘记和原谅这次令人遗憾的事件。

original: Successful Loyalists

The money sent to loyalists in one of the countries we have a union with has been well spent, more than we could ever have imagined and anticipated. The Liberty Desire of their people has lowered well beyond what we thought possible.
translation: 我们送给被联统国的效忠派的金币被很好的利用了，效果远远超出我们的想象和预料。他们民众的独立倾向降低到比我们想象中的更低。

original: That's a nice surprise!
Loyalists cause a Rebellion

A scourge has hit a country who is in a union with us, a scourge of mad men and women armed with whatever weapons they could find. Enraged by the loyalists' behavior, they have risen! Instead of enforcing the bond between us, the loyalists have managed to harm the country and cause rebels to show their ugly mugs.
translation: 灾难在我们的一个联统国降临了，一群疯子被我们的支持者所激怒，带着他们能找到的一切武器，起义了！不仅没有确保我们的联统，这些支持者们还破坏了国家并造成了叛乱。

original: Try to undo their damage.
translation: 试着修复他们造成的损失。

original: There is nothing we can do.
The Cruel Behavior of Uncouth Officers

'Many small streams creates a large flood' - a proverb that unfortunately proved true in our protectorate. Small events, barely noticeable to us but great slights to those who witnessed or were exposed to them, together with older complains and bitter memories from when the country became our protectorate became the final straw. The deplorable, no, cruel behavior of the officers we sent, has led to a rift and a bad relationship between us and the protectorate.
translation: “许多小溪可以汇成洪流”———— 这样一条谚语很不幸地发生在我们的一个保护国身上。许多对我们来说鸡毛蒜皮的小事，对于亲历者和当事人来说可能意义重大。加上仍怀有着他们被迫成为我们保护国的痛苦回忆的老人的哀怨，成为了压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草。我们送去的军官搞出来的这些糟透了的，不，残酷的行径，已经在我们与保护国之间的关系上造成了裂痕。

original: We need to teach our officers how to become gentlemen!
translation: 我们必须教会这些军官如何做一名绅士！

original: A Gentleman and an Officer

The code of conduct we tried to imprint in every officers' mind before they left our country to work as army instructors in one of our protectorates might not have been time wasted. We have received a message applauding and expressing how impressive the behavior and strict discipline these officers show, and we as a whole country should be proud that we have managed to make gentlemen out of our officers.
translation: 我们在所有军官离开我们国家以军队教官身份前往保护国之前为他们灌输行为准则的努力没有白费。我们收到消息称赞这些军官严明的纪律令人印象深刻，整个国家都应当为我们成功让这些军官成为了绅士而感到骄傲。

original: We couldn't be prouder.
The more we sell, the more we sow, the more we grow
translation: 卖得越多，种得越多，收获越多

original: We control the trade of our protectorate, and the more we manage to export of all the things they grow and produce, the larger the crop! Somehow we have managed to increase both the quality and quantity of their production, and increased our trade power as well.
translation: 我们控制着保护国的贸易，当我们出口了更多保护国生产的物产，产量就越高！我们莫名其妙地就提高了他们的产量、质量，并增加了我们的贸易力量。

original: Quantity and quality, that's the way.
translation: 产量和质量，这是正确的道路。

original: Exacerbation of Export Effects

The traders and merchants of our protectorates suffered a major blow to their trade when we decided to take control of their country's trade power. Their complaints about the 'hardships' this mercantile policy has brought upon them reached the ruler of the protectorate, who agrees with them and has made it clear that our relationships with them is suffering because of this.
translation: 当我们决定转移他们国家的贸易竞争力时，我们保护国的交易人和商人遭受了重大打击。他们对这种政策带来的“困难”的抱怨到达了他们统治者的耳中并得到了后者的同情————很显然我们之间的关系因此而受到了影响。

original: As long as all they do is complain, we don't care.
translation: 他们只是在发牢骚，别管他们。

original: Sibling Rivalry

It is never fun to watch siblings fight - or perhaps it is... especially if those siblings are two countries, one of which is a protectorate of [Root.Country.GetName]. Perhaps we can mediate and see if we can force... negotiate a white peace between them?
translation: 手足相争从来不有趣——尤其是当这对手足是两个国家，其中一个还是[Root.Country.GetName]的保护国的时候。或许我们可以去调解一下，看看能不能逼迫……我是说谈判让他们无条件停火呢？

original: Investigate and intermediate.
Fight! Fight! Fight!
Legitimacy Questioned

Though our grip on the throne of [Root.Country.GetName] may be slipping and our legitimacy questioned, our pride and prestige took a hit when one of our subjects spoke up against us in public. They claim that we have no right in trying to govern them too as we can barely manage our own country.
translation: 虽然我们可能对[Root.Country.GetName]王位的支配有所动摇、正统性被质疑，但我们的属国竟然在公开场合下忤逆，打击了我们的荣耀和威望。他们认为我们没有权利继续统治他们，因为我们已自身难保。

original: Berate them for speaking out against us in public.
They may be right, and it should not affect their opinion of us.
translation: 他们可能是对的，希望这不要损害我们之间的关系。

original: The Hole Called Bankruptcy

A ruler keen of the very best the country can provide, a treasury governed by greedy and incompetent persons, investments that went wrong and too many loans... That is how you dig the hole called bankruptcy, and it might have been all those or just one that made one of our subjects stumble into the hole and fall all the way to the bottom. We can help them get partially out of that hole with a donation of money, or ignore it and make them help themselves.
translation: 统治者搜刮着国家能提供的最好的东西，由贪婪而无能的人管理着财富，错误的投资导致债台高筑……这就是你挖掘的名叫破产的黑洞。我们的一个属国已经因此身陷其中，难以自拔。我们可以给他们一笔钱来帮助他们，也可以坐视不管。

original: Intervene, send them money and a ladder!
translation: 介入，给他们一些钱和一把梯子!

original: They have no one to blame but themselves!
translation: 这种情况只能怪他们自己!

original: The Question of Rights

A subject of ours currently holds lands to which we have a claim. If we were to claim this province for ourselves they would undoubtedly regard us with contempt and distrust. On the other hand they would be in no position to stop us from taking control of the area if we would wish it to be so.
translation: 我们的一个属国最近持有了一些我们拥有宣称的土地。如果我们向他们索要这块土地毫无疑问会引起他们的耻辱和不信任。另一方面我们也可以放弃有关这些土地的权益来避免冲突或搁置争议。

original: Take the province.
Renounce the claim and core.
This situation works for us, leave it be.
translation: 现在的形势对我们有利，别管它。

original: Reprimanded for using manpower wrongly
Used manpower in a resourceful way
Purged useful but badly disciplined soldiers
translation: 清除有用但毫无纪律的士兵

original: Sent a General
Sent an Advisor
Sent Gold and Manpower
translation: 送去更多的金币和士兵

original: Sent Nothing
State Smuggling
In order to survive economic the harsh embargoes imposed by our overlord have been broken.
translation: 为了度过财政困难，宗主国强加的严格禁运被打破了。

original: Hindered from Smuggling
Small-scale Smuggling OK
Vassals are unwilling to pay scutage
translation: 附庸们不愿意支付免除兵役税

original: Loyalist Faux Pas
Overlord Supports Loyalists
Cruel Officers
Excellent Officers
Enhanced Productions
The increased export has increased the production in every province of our country.
translation: 出口的增加提升了我们每一个省份的生产能力。

original: Increased Production Through Export
Better Exports
The export of goods from our protectorates has increased, the quality and quantity amazes both us and our competitors.
translation: 从我们保护国出口的货物大大增加了，其数量和质量令我们和我们的竞争对手感到惊讶。

original: Low Legitimacy
Sent no money in our time of need
translation: 在我们需要时没有送钱来

original: Sent us money in our time of need
translation: 在我们需要时送了钱来

original: Took a province from us
translation: 从我们这里拿走了省份

original: Economy Suffering due to Diverted Trade
translation: 转移贸易价值造成了损失

original: Returned a province to us
translation: 归还了一个省份给我们

original: Free Cities cannot become subjects.
Dictatorships cannot become Free Cities.
translation: 独裁政体不能成为自由市

original: Their capital §Y$CAPITAL$§! must have at least §Y$AMT$§! development for them to become a Free City.
translation: 他们的首都 §Y$CAPITAL$§! 必须有至少 §Y$AMT$§! 发展度才能成为自由市。

original: Click to return this province to §Y$COUNTRY$§!. You will lose §R$AMT$§! prestige, but their opinion of you will increase.
translation: 点击将这个省份归还给§Y$COUNTRY$§!。你将失去§R$AMT$§!威望，但他们对你的好感度会提高。

original: Click to return this province to §Y$COUNTRY$§!. Their opinion of you will increase.
translation: 点击将这个省份归还给§Y$COUNTRY$§!。他们对你的好感度会提高。

original: §R$SUBJECTTYPES$ cannot return provinces.§!
§RThere is no existing nation with a core in §Y$PROVINCE$§! to return it to.§!
translation: §R没有任何拥有§Y$PROVINCE$§!核心的可归还核心对象。§!

original: §RYou cannot return provinces while at war.§!
§RYou cannot return your capital province!§!
§RYou cannot return provinces to a country that is at war.§!
translation: §R你不能归还省份给战争中的国家！§!

original: Both the overlord and the subject must be monarchies.
translation: 宗主国和属国都必须是君主制国家。

original: Subject must have a regency.
You can't do this while in a regency.
translation: 你不能在摄政期间这么做。

original: $DYNASTY$ already rules $COUNTRY$.
Must have positive prestige.
They are in debt.
Their opinion of us must be positive.
translation: 他们对我们的看法必须是正面的。

original: Can have at most §Y$VAL$§! Liberty Desire.
Must be in same religious group.
Need at least §Y$VAL$§! $UNIT$.
From $NAME$: $VAL$
The Free City of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]

The city of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] has been granted Imperial Immediacy as an Imperial Free City of the Holy Roman Empire. While there are many important self-governed cities in the Empire [Root.GetName] now has something beyond its wealth and size to protect it - economic and political freedoms perpetually guaranteed by the Emperor himself.
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]被神圣罗马帝国直接授予了自由市的地位。虽然帝国中还有很多重要的自由市，[Root.GetName]现在将保护他自己的财富和领地以外的东西，而他的经济和政治上的永久自由被皇帝本人亲自授予。

original: Excellent
[Root.GetName] - No longer a Free City of the Empire

[Root.GetName] is no longer a Free City of the Holy Roman Empire. The City leadership has been condemned for Machiavellian misuse of power and disrespect for the Imperial institutions and have lost all privileges associated with the title it was once granted.
translation: [Root.GetName]不再是神圣罗马帝国的自由市。城市的领导人被定罪为不择手段地滥用权力和对帝国体制的不尊重，与此同时地失去了一切曾经授予的特权。

original: Unfortunate
'Wedge Throw'
The farmers in this province have come upon hard times. In order to help them recover we have easened their tax burden and allowed them a loan for 3 years.
translation: 这个省份的农民正处于艰难的时日。为了帮助他们恢复，我们给他们减税并承诺了一笔三年的贷款。

original: Poor Rice Harvests
The farmers in this province have come upon hard times. As we have refused to ease their tax burden or allow them to borrow money the region is now boiling with contempt of state power.
translation: 这个省份的农民正处于艰难的时日。由于我们拒绝给他们减税和贷款，这个地区现在民怨沸腾。

original: Monasteries Blooming

The wise policies of our ruler have had a very beneficial on Monastic activity in this area with a generally positive development here as a result. The Monasteries themselves are rich and the monks are disciplined and as a result the entire province prospers, from the sick and poor to the healthy and rich.
translation: 我们统治者的英明政策深受修僧侣们的欢迎并推动了本地的发展。修道院变得富有，僧侣们更有纪律，最终带来了整个省份从贫穷到富有的繁荣转变。

original: Gifted White Elephant
Cleansing of Monasteries

In order to improve the very lacking Monastic discipline in this area we have exacted very violent and stringent punishments on those who break their vows. Such cleansings are sometimes necessary yet unfortunate, the situation seems to be slowly improving.
translation: 为了改变本地教士严重的纪律涣散问题，我们将对那些违反誓言的人实行无情而严厉的惩罚。尽管出现这种清洗行动很遗憾，但有时是必要的，情况看起来在缓慢地改善。

original: Strict Punishment of Monks

In order to improve the lacking Monastic discipline in this area we have enforced much stricter control of the area and imposed fines on errant monks. Any monk found to be dishonoring his vows or his order will have to pay a large number of livestock to the state.
translation: 为了强化本地教士严重缺失的纪律，我们在这一地区执行了更加严厉的控制并对一些僧侣强制罚款。任何僧侣若被发现违背誓言或命令将被迫上缴大量的家畜给国家。

original: Lacking Monastic Discipline

The lacking discipline of the Monasteries in this area is widely known and as a result the region suffers both economic and spiritually. It is the duty of temporal power to curb such excesses in the Monasteries yet this time it has failed.
translation: 众所周知本地毫无纪律的教士导致了本地无论是经济上还是精神上的萎靡。限制教士们的荒淫无度本应该是世俗权力的责任，但这一次它失败了。

original: Forced Labor
We have forced farmers from the surrounding provinces to help improve this province for the common good.
translation: 为了更广泛的利益，我们强迫周围省份的农民来帮助发展这个省份。

original: 'The Human Sacrifice'
We have asked farmers from the surrounding provinces to help improve this area in exchange for compensation for lost income.
translation: 我们要求周围省份的农民来帮助发展这个省份，作为交换我们会补偿他们的损失。

original: Bountiful Harvest
Food is cheap and our granaries are full after an unusually bountiful harvest.
translation: 在一场不寻常的大丰收后，食物变得便宜，谷仓也装满了。

original: Political Rival Crushed

We have made good use of a temporary string of setbacks for one of our political rivals. He has now been outmaneuvered to the extent that he seems unlikely to become a problem ever again. Others have observed our actions and will think twice before trying to question state power in the future.
translation: 我们巧妙地利用了我们其中一个宿敌的一系列挫折。他现在被我们击败到再也不会成为我们的一个麻烦了。其他目睹了这一切的国家在质疑我们的实力之前都会三思。

original: Hostile Monastery
Due to what they perceive as gross misconduct by their ruler the monks in this province are openly hostile to the state and its ruler.
translation: 由于被统治者认为有粗鲁的不端行为，这个省份的教士对国家和统治者抱有公开的敌意。

original: Popular Bandit

An unusually successful band of brigands is harassing this area and evading state troops. The band in general and the leader in particular have come to achieve popularity even outside of the immediate area due to their success. While it is very uncertain if their goals really are ideological they have started to become a symbol for resisting central power and authority in general.
translation: 一伙异常成功的强盗正在侵扰这个地区并避开了国家的军队。由于他们的成功，他们的领导人在本地甚至附近的地区都有很高的声望。目前还不是很明确他们的目的是否是传播一种思想，但他们已经俨然成为了大众反叛的象征。

original: Popular Bandit

An unusually successful band of brigands is harassing this area and evading state troops. The band in general and the leader in particular have come to achieve popularity even outside of the immediate area due to their success. While it is very uncertain if their goals really are ideological they have started to become a symbol for resisting central power and authority in general.
translation: 一伙异常成功的强盗正在侵扰这个地区，同时还避开了国家的军队。由于他们的成功，他们的领导人在当地甚至附近的地区都有很高的声望。目前还不是很明确他们的目的是否是传播一种思想，但他们已经俨然成为了大众反叛的象征。

original: Slighted Monastic Order
Due to a disagreement with the ruling of our ruler in a case that concerned them a very influential monastic order in this area is currently being quite antagonistic.
translation: 由于对统治者统治的不满，一个在当地很有影响力的教会的敌视了我们。

original: Pleased Local Aristocrats
Due to a beneficial ruling by our ruler in a legal dispute a very influential family in this region is very positive towards our ruler.
translation: 由于在一次法律辩论中受益，一个在当地很有影响力的家族对我们的统治者十分满意。

original: Pleased Monastic Order
Due to a beneficial ruling by our ruler in a legal dispute the local monastery in this region is very positive towards our ruler.
translation: 由于在一次法律辩论中受益，一个在当地很有影响力的教会对我们的统治者十分满意。

original: Slighted Local Aristocrats
Due to a disagreement with the ruling of our ruler in a case that concerned them a very influential family in this area is currently being quite antagonistic.
translation: 由于对统治者统治的不满，一个在当地很有影响力的家族的敌视了我们。

original: Regulate the Monasteries

While the spiritual richness of the leading monasteries of our country is a constant asset for our ruler these monasteries also have a tendency to lapse into corruption and lacking discipline. We must curb the excesses of the monks and create set of strict laws with harsh punishments for those who falter, be they individual monks or entire orders.
translation: 尽管统治者视下辖寺院富足的精神是国家永恒的财富，但这些寺院也有一不小心变得腐败和无序的趋势。我们必须制止僧侣们荒淫无度的行为并制定严厉的刑罚来惩罚那些犯错的家伙，从个人到整个教会都不例外。

original: Regulated Monastic Law

We have created a firm and strict collection of laws to ensure the discipline of the monastic orders in our country. Harsh punishments await those who falter in their role as spiritual leaders, be it individual monks or entire orders.
translation: 我们制定了一部强硬而严厉的法律来确保我国教会的纪律。严酷的惩罚将降临在那些开小差的精神领袖们身上，无论是个人还是整个教会。

original: Invite a Lama to Settle in Our Country
translation: 邀请一位喇嘛来我国定居

original: We should invite a powerful Lama to settle in our capital. By patronizing this man and his future reincarnations we may create a lasting legacy for our dynasty.
translation: 我们应该邀请一位有声望的喇嘛住在我们的首都。通过这个人和他转世接班的恩赐，我们可以为我们的王朝创造一份长久的财富。

original: Lama
A powerful Lama has settled in our capital and allied himself with our rulers.
translation: 一位有声望的喇嘛住在了我们的首都并与我们的统治者联合起来了。

original: Influx of Tibetan Monks
A delegation of Tibetan monks have arrived in these lands to further the spread of Buddhism here and in all corners of the country.
translation: 一个西藏僧侣的代表团来到了我们国家并传播佛教。

original: Great Monastery

This province is home to one of the greatest monasteries in our country. While it is always a financial burden for the state to share so much land with someone else the rich and thriving community of monks here is doing its part to develop the province.
translation: 这个省份坐落着我国最宏伟的寺院之一。由于需要让出如此多的土地，这一直是国家的一个财政负担，但富有的僧侣和教士社区正在为省份的发展做着贡献。

original: Adopt Vajrayana Buddhism
The religion of Tibet is a powerful tool and Buddhism was once championed by great empires. Let us convert our country to this powerful new religion and learn the value of peace and discipline.
translation: 西藏的宗教是一件强大的工具，佛教也曾经被伟大的帝国所支持。让我们把国家转换为这种强大的宗教并学习和平与纪律的价值。

original: Destruction of Idols

A campaign to destroy pagan idols in our country is hardly gaining us any friends among the diehard supporters of the old religion but it is greatly speeding up the conversion of all pagans even if one might doubt the sincerity of some.
translation: 我国一项破坏异教圣像的运动难以吸引到顽固的旧教信徒，但的确大大增加了转化异教徒的速度，尽管人们可能会质疑其中一些的虔诚。

original: Hampered Growth
This province has been growing more quickly than the infrastructure could support. As a result social tensions are rising.
translation: 这个省份的发展速度过快以至于超出了当地基础设施所能负担的极限。这一问题加剧了社会紧张和阶层矛盾。

original: Improving Infrastructure
In order to support the rapid development of this province it has been supplied with extra food and easened the taxation pressure here.
translation: 为了支持该省份的迅速发展，额外的食物被进口以缓解当地的税收压力。

original: Supporting Local Monastic Tradition

Rather than try to imitate others we are cultivating a Theravada tradition that is very distinctively our own. This will no doubt strengthen our national institutions in the long run but it has also alienated us from other rulers.
translation: 相比于模仿别人，我们目前更倾向于加强具有我国特色的上座部佛教传统。毫无疑问，这将会增加我们的国教教会的影响，但长此以往下去，也会让我们疏远别的统治者。

original: Theravada Monk Exchange
Refused Monastic Education
Lankan Influence
We have taken great influence from the states of Sri Lanka and the monastic orders there. This has allowed us to form much deeper ties to the prestigious Theravada traditions of that island.
translation: 我们受到了来自斯里兰卡及其教团的强大影响。这使得我们能够与其久负盛名的上座部佛教建立更密切的联系。

original: Powerful Monastery
This province is home to a powerful Monastic Order that while content to mind its own business has grown powerful enough to disregard state power to a certain degree.
translation: 该省份是一个有能力僭越国权力的强大教团的本营。

original: Powerful Benevolent Monastery
This province is home to a powerful Monastic Order that supports our state. While their support helps us on the national level their influence over this province is growing rapidly.
translation: 该省份是一个支持我国的强大教团的本营。他们在此地的影响力随着他们在国家事务方面对我们的支持而急速增长。

original: Powerful Hostile Monastery
This province is home to a powerful Monastic Order in opposition to state power.
translation: 该省份是一个反对国家的强大教团的本营。

original: Bandit Leader

A former Bandit leader with quite a popular following has set up his business once again in this region. By now, however, he is both an older and frailer man and it is no doubt a question of time until his activities cease one way or the other.
translation: 一个老土匪头子伙同了不少追随者们在此地区重操旧业。但鉴于现在他的衰老和虚弱，他们的失败只是时间问题。

original: Myth of the Free Spirited Bandit Leader
translation: 一个追求自由的强盗领袖的传说

original: Enemies of the state everywhere are currently gathering strength from the myth of a common bandit leader we killed for his crimes. This myth will undoubtedly be relegated to a fairy tale in time but right now it is serving to unite those who oppose state power.
translation: 由于我们依罪处决了一名强盗头子，国内各地的敌对分子们开始以此为由寻衅滋事。虽然这件事的影响会随着时间的推移而慢慢消退，但目前这成为了国内敌对势力集结的导火索。

original: Grain for the Poor
We have been redistributing our surplus grain to make sure that nobody will have to endure hunger in our lands.
translation: 我们对多余的粮食进行了再分配，以保证国内没有人挨饿。

original: Grain Reserves
Our well filled reserves of grain are a guarantor of the stability of our country.
translation: 我们充足的粮食储量是维护国家稳定的保证。

original: Administrative Discontinuity
Our sudden replacement of the local governor in this province has led to lack of central control.
translation: 突然更换该地区的行政长官导致中央集权在此地的控制力大大降低。

original: Nepotism
The population in this province have notions that personal connections rather than competence is what guides appointments of officials to this area.
translation: 当地人认为，相比于能力，拥有丰富人际关系的人更适合在这儿做官。

original: Sold Gifted White Elephant
Minister Resigns

$PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$ARTIST$$TREASURER$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$ has publicly condemned the policies of [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] government. Our Minister will no longer have anything to do with us and reminds us that a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] that cannot uphold the rightful laws will attract nothing but liars and informers to [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] government.
translation: $PHILOSOPHER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$ARTIST$$TREASURER$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的政策和[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]政府进行了公开批判。我们的大臣选择告老还乡，并提醒我们，一个不能维护正确律法的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]只会吸引骗子和小人，而把真正的有识之士挡在[Root.Heir.GetHerHis]政府的门外。

original: Good Riddance!
[Root.GetName] Monasteries deteriorating

Due to a combination of lacking monastic discipline and a faltering economy many of the great monasteries of [Root.GetName] have seen their membership dwindling over the last few years.
