A concerned Bhikkhu has approached the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] with a warning that unless something is done soon the dire situation may lead to the last few monks abandoning their vows or seeking to join monasteries elsewhere, leaving [Root.GetName] impoverished both spiritually and economically. There are, however, many local landowners more than ready to infringe on the land an empty monastery would leave behind. As the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] is meant to protect Monastic life in [Root.Owner.GetName] it will be clear to many observers that the responsibility for whatever happens will rest on [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] shoulders.
translation: 由于缺乏戒律的约束和糟糕的经济状况，[Root.GetName]地区的很多著名寺庙近年来已鲜有信徒前来朝拜。一位忧心忡忡的僧人在觐见时提醒[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]应当及时采取措施，以防止仅剩无几的僧人数量进一步减少甚至转投他处以至[Root.GetName]地区彻底崩溃。与此同时，很多乡绅地主则对寺庙废弃后的土地虎视眈眈。[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]作为[Root.Owner.GetName]地区宗教势力的维护者，[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]必须在万众期待的目光下，承担起这个责任。

original: We must do all we can!
Perhaps now the land will come to better use.
translation: 也许这块地另作他用会更好。

original: Monastic Vows Broken

The religious discipline of the monks of [Root.GetName] is faltering. As a result of lacking funds, monopolization of higher monastic positions by a small group of the aristocracy and a [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] unable to protect the faithful in the way expected of a true Buddhist ruler more and more monks seem to be breaking their vows to abandon monastic life, or in some cases maintaining it while not honoring its principles. A particularly glaring case of a monk breaking his vows and inciting others do to the same has recently come to our attention and many will likely read a great deal into the way we choose to deal with this. While a good ruler should always show mercy and gentleness it is also the duty of any ruler to uphold the discipline of the monasteries, with force if needed.
translation: 随着[Root.GetName]地区僧人戒律的崩坏和财政困难的出现，贵族开始垄断高阶僧侣的职位，而[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]却无力保证僧人们的权利。越来越多的僧人们背弃了他们的誓言或不再遵守戒律。其中，一位背誓的僧人公开煽动其他僧人效仿他的行为引起了轩然大波，而我们对他的处理态度将变得至关重要。虽然统治者理应宽以待民，但对于大逆不道的行为还是要严肃处理。

original: We must show gentleness.
Fine errant monks all movable property and livestock.
translation: 罚没这些邪僧所有的财产！

original: Execute the monk and anyone who stands by him!
translation: 处决这个僧人和他的支持者！

original: Monastic Orders Support Pretender

As it is the monarch's duty to protect the monastic institutions it is those institutions duty to protect the country against bad ruelrs. Due to what they feel is lacking attentiveness to the duties of a monarch and inability and disinterest in upholding and protecting the common good in general and the monastic organizations of our country in particular some of the more powerful monasteries have openly come out in support of a distant relative to our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 君主有义务保护教会，而教会则有责任讨伐昏君。我们的教会认为一个对维护僧侣权利毫无兴趣且对人民不负责任的昏君必须被推翻。一些势力强大的教团公开叛乱支持一位王族远亲成为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: This is an outrage!
Precedent of [Root.Monarch.GetName]

A recent ruling by [Root.Monarch.GetName] was considered so just and well argued that it has been used as an example to strive for in similar cases in a recently created addendum to a collection of the Pali laws of [Root.GetName]. As [Root.Monarch.GetName] has become known for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] stringent and constant to adhere to the virtues of the Rajadhamma this is not the first time [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] rule has been put forward as a good example.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]近年来的统治被认为是一段值得后人参考效仿的时期。其在位期间的政策措施被写入[Root.GetName]的巴利法典以作为后来的统治者们参考的方向。以其绰号“严厉的[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]”而著称的[Root.Monarch.GetName]同时也是《生经》的推崇者，其对经中记述的美德的追求和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]法例使得他成为了优秀统治者的典范。

original: And it will not be the last.
White Elephant Captured
A white elephant has been captured in the hinterlands of [Root.GetName]. This auspicious incident has widely been interpreted as a testament of the wise and benevolent rule of [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的内陆地区捕获了一只白象。这一吉兆被人们认为是对[Root.Monarch.GetName]英明统治的祝福。

original: Let us take good care of it.
Sell it.
It would make an excellent gift!
A White Elephant

A white elephant has been captured in the hinterlands of [From.GetName] and [From.Monarch.GetName] has wisely interpreted this as a sign of the productive alliance of our two peoples. This is the greatest gift a ruler could possibly bestow upon us and will likely be regarded very well by our population. It will, however, also be quite costly to take care of this rare beast even though we could hardly refuse to do so.
translation: 在[From.GetName]的内陆地区捕获了一只白象。[From.Monarch.GetName]机智地将这一事件解释为我们双方联盟的成果。这对于一个国家统治者而言可以说是最好的礼物了，相信我们的人民也会很欢迎。不过，即便我们肯定会接受它，照料这个巨兽本身恐怕花费不菲。

original: Monasteries of [Root.GetName]

The wise and productive policies of [Root.Monarch.GetName] in regards to the monasteries of the realm have always been well considered and benevolent. No Monastery is allowed to go poor yet the discipline and strength of the institutions themselves have not been allowed to deteriorate. As a result the monasteries of [Root.GetName] are blooming and our state has become known everywhere as an example to follow.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]一贯开明仁慈的宗教政策被认为是英明而富有建设性的。对教条的重视使得戒律在寺庙中被得到正确施行，宗教影响力也得到了加强。[Root.GetName]的寺庙因此闻名天下，而我们的国家也被视为值得效仿的典范。

original: Demand that they help develop the province.
translation: 要求他们帮助建设省份。

original: Wonderful!
The Horrors of War

Not all men are cut out to lead a life of war and it seems the conflict our country is currently in has made some of them realize it. The number of deserters seeking to hide behind the walls of the monasteries is not big but they set a dangerous example. As a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] it is, however, our duty to protect the monasteries and while we have repeatedly warned them not to accept men like these it seems some still do.
translation: 在我国的内乱中，很多人意识到，并非所有人都能毫无牵挂地奔赴战场。一些人为了逃避战争躲进了寺庙。虽然目前这些逃兵数量还不算很多，但看来这是个危险的预兆。作为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]应当负起保护寺庙的责任，提醒寺庙不要收容逃兵。

original: We must remember to be gentle.
Demand that the monasteries release these 'monks' to us.
translation: 要求那些寺庙交出那些“僧侣”。

original: Fine the monasteries for any deserter found.
translation: 惩处那些查出逃兵的寺庙。

original: 'Wedge-Throw'

The last seasons have not been very kind to the [Root.GetName] region and one of the duties of a [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] is to take care of the poor. A delegation of farmers has now approached [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] asking to be exempt from taxes and to receive a 3-year loan so that they are able to take care of their families while they work to get back on their feet.
translation: 过去的几个季节对于[Root.GetName]地区恐怕是一段糟糕的日子而作为[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]得负起接济穷人们的责任。农民们组织了一个代表团希望免除税收并要求获得一笔三年期贷款用以重新自立和安顿家庭。

original: A reasonable request.
There is a chance the province recovers and the money may then be returned.
translation: 这是一个让省份恢复经济并收回钱款的机会。

original: Sadly the state coffers are also famished.
translation: 现在国家也很困难，我们爱莫能助。

original: Economic Recovery of [Root.GetName]
[Root.GetName] is now fully recovered from its harsh years and the rice farmers in the area have come to pay back the loan we so graciously granted them.
translation: [Root.GetName]已从艰难的岁月里完全恢复，而该地区较为富裕的农民们开始归还之前我们慷慨的贷款。

original: Ok.
Partial Recovery in [Root.GetName]
While the loan we granted the farmers in [Root.GetName] has helped them to slowly turn the area back to its former self they are still unable to pay the debt we once granted them.
translation: 我们给予[Root.GetName]地区农民们的贷款帮助他们逐渐恢复了过去的生活水准，但他们暂时还没有能力偿还贷款。

original: Write it off as a loss.
translation: 把这笔钱记作赈灾支出。

original: Demand repayment.
'Human Sacrifice'

[Root.GetName] is in dire need of better infrastructure. The local monasteries are doing what they can, as are the local aristocrats, but if the area is to prosper the state will have to step in. Plans to improve the situation require extra workers to join in the project from the countryside but all farmers are busy with the harvest. As ruler we can order them to lay down work to participate in construction projects for the common good but in return they will expect to be paid the customary 'Human Sacrifice' or the equivalent of the amount of rice that they could have grown during the same time.
translation: [Root.GetName]迫切需要完成一项项大型基建工程。当地僧侣和贵族们已经参与其中，然而想要完成预期恐怕需要整个国家的参与。想要赶上工期势必需要更多的人力参与建设。征召农民是我们不二的选择，但他们目前还有收获粮食的任务在身。作为统治者，我们如果征召农民们参与工程则必须发给农民们粮食补偿，或者也可以采用过去的“活人殉葬”法让他们永远闭上眼睛。

original: Pay the Human Sacrifice.
Abandon the project.
Demand that the farmers work without compensation.
translation: 要求那些农民无偿工作。

original: Bountiful Harvest

This harvest has been unusually bountiful and [Root.Monarch.GetName] could well make use of this unexpected wealth to fund planned religious works. An extra tax has been suggested to transfer the extra grain from the farmers to the state. However traditional Buddhist law dictates that he cannot take more than 10%, the 'Hay Sacrifice', of that which has been harvested and some of our ministers seem uneasy with breaking this rule.
translation: 今年取得了难得的大丰收，[Root.Monarch.GetName]可以考虑用这笔意外之财去支持宗教工作。有人建议设立一项新的附加税把农民们多余的粮食收归国有。但是根据传统的佛教法律《干茅祭法》规定，我们不能征收超过10%的粮食，如今粮食已经收获而我们的官员似乎不想破坏这条法令。

original: Levy the tax.
Let us not steal the fruits of their labor.
translation: 不要窃取他们的劳动果实。

original: Dana

It is at times such as these, when our country is characterized by relative tranquility that we are reminded to look at those who are less fortunate. The recent crop yields have been neither failures nor a great success and as a result most have food and the state have ample grain supplies. There are, however, still some unfortunate who haven't got enough food to feed themselves.
translation: 得益于保护不幸者和穷人们的基本国策，我们的国家在这段时间一直保持稳定。近几年来的粮食产量亦较为稳定，因此我国绝大多数国民都能保证温饱，国库也有所充实。不过，即使是这样的年月，还是会有不幸的人因没有足够的粮食而挨饿。

original: Let us distribute our grain to the poor!
translation: 把我们多余的粮食分发给穷人！

original: Keep it in reserve.
Vicious Words?

The local aristocracy in [Root.GetName] seems to have been growing quite powerful over the last few years. While we retain nominal control over the area much of the real power lies with the local landowners who have been known to grow their domains at the expense of monastery land. This practice, along with other excesses may well be used against them but in order to achieve the full effect we would probably need to embellish the truth a little. There are those who would be willing to do just that for us in exchange for nice positions in our administration afterwards.
translation: [Root.GetName]当地贵族的势力在过去数年中变得相当强大。虽然我们名义上掌控着这片土地，但事实上真正掌握实权的还是那些兼并寺院土地的乡绅地主。我们虽然可以采取暴力手段限制他们的权力，但最好还是软硬兼施，粉饰一下真相会更好。我们可以用官职去吸引那些愿意效忠于我们的人以达到我们的目的。

original: Let us find another way.
The end justifies the means.
Pariccaga

The willingness of [Root.Monarch.GetName] to risk life and limb in the protection of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] people is considered both unusual and worthy of respect. Leading monastic figures have voiced their support for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] and some even liken [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to an ideal ruler for this self sacrifice.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]甘冒生命危险保护[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的人民的行动被认为是神圣而值得尊敬的。宗教领袖们陆续发声表达对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的支持，有的甚至将[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]喻为愿为天下牺牲自我的完美统治者。

original: Ok.
Tapa

Recently [Root.Monarch.GetName] have come under attack by those who feel his rule has been one of extravagance and conspicuous consumption. Some of our ministers, however, insist that a certain amount of luxury is necessary for a ruler, especially when dealing with foreign monarchs and their emissaries.
translation: 最近，[Root.Monarch.GetName]因为铺张浪费和奢侈用度的作风而受到反对者们的抨击。也有一些大臣们认为统治者拥有一定数量的奢侈品无可厚非，尤其是在会见外国君主和使者的时候更应如此。

original: Let us do away with worldly things!
We cannot stoop to the level of peasants...
translation: 我们总不能穿成农民那样吧……

original: Political Rival Weakened

Even a great ruler has some detractors. A particularly successful and outspoken critic of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has lately gotten himself into a quite hard situation. His friends have left him and high debts make it very hard for him to support his family. While a resourceful person may yet recover from this situation we might also use this opportunity to get rid of this man once and for all.
translation: 再伟大的统治者也会有反对党。[Root.Monarch.GetName]的一位尖刻的批评者最近陷入了大麻烦之中。友人的离去和高额的债务使得他难以供养他的家庭。虽然这个足智多谋的人还有机会在以后脱离困境，但我们也可以利用这个机会让他再也翻不了身。

original: Make sure he never recovers!
A true [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] holds no grudges.
This is a time for charity, let us help this man recover.
translation: 行善积德，让我们帮他一把。

original: Old Rival Recovers

Our willingness to help a rival in need has converted him from a detractor to a firm supporter. With his powerbase rebuilt he is now eager to serve [Root.Monarch.GetName] and apart from his political capital he offers his own services as a minister of our government.
translation: 我们对宿敌施以援手的举动成功地将他转变为我们的坚定支持者。重新在政治场上站稳脚跟后，他很期望能为[Root.Monarch.GetName]效力。除了提供原有的政治资本外，以他出色的能力他还可以出任我国外交顾问的职位。

original: Great!
Old Rival Recovers

Our willingness to help a rival in need may have been a righteous act but now that he has recovered he is as critical as ever of our power. What transpired has perhaps weakened the basis of his position slightly but he is still intent to use all his power to sabotage the government of [Root.GetName].
translation: 我们对宿敌施以援手虽然是正义之举，但他在恢复元气不仅不知报恩，反而比以前更加变本加厉。即使在发生了这么多事后，他的政治资本已经大大削弱的情况下，这个该死的反对党依然不依不饶试图在暗中颠覆[Root.GetName]政府

original: No good deed goes unpunished...
Plight of [Root.GetName]

A representative of the farmers of [Root.GetName] arrived in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] today, imploring [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] to help expand and maintain the irrigation system of the province. The local population is growing and claiming new land at a speed that the current infrastructure does not support. The representative also asks that the state supply food to those who need it in the meantime.\nWhile this project would have few downsides besides the cost there are currently no plans to improve this particular region and doing so in reasonable time would likely be quite expensive.
translation: 一位[Root.GetName]地区农民的代表今天来到[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]请求[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]帮助扩建当地的灌溉系统。与此同时，当地人口的迅速增加也使得目前已有的基础设施不堪重负，该代表还请求国家能够向他们提供一些粮食以应付当前的情况。\n这个工程目前看来除了开销以外还有其他一些负面影响，但暂时也没有更好的解决该地区危机的办法。而如果想要及时完成这项工程，恐怕花销不菲。

original: This [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] is always ready to listen to the people.
You will have to wait for your turn.
Inheritance

A conflict has arisen in one of the more influential monasteries of [Root.GetName] after the death of a monk. The monk in question came from a very influential lay family and during his time in robes had managed to acquire a rich set of valuable manuscripts and an assortment of Buddha images and other things. While monks cannot own property as such the law still allows for a dedicated disciple to inherit these things and be considered as a son to the monk. In this case a young disciple has taken care of the monk as he lay at his end. There are, however, others interested, the monastery itself has argued that they should get the inheritance and would likely be very thankful for support in this matter. The lay family of the monk have also approached [Root.Monarch.GetName] hoping to inherit not only the manuscripts and images but also some of the land they have donated to the monastery while their family member was part of it.
translation: [Root.GetName]寺院的一位得道高僧的圆寂引发了一场争端。这位高僧来自于一个显赫的家族，在他出家期间，他收集了大量珍贵的经文手稿以及一些佛祖像等等。虽然佛陀们本不可以拥有个人财产，但依照法律，其嫡传弟子可以继承这些遗产并被视为其子。这次的事件中，一位年轻的弟子一直照料高僧到最后。另一方面，寺院方也声称自己应当继承这些遗物，并承诺在得到支持的情况下予以回报。而高僧的原家族成员已和[Root.Monarch.GetName]联系，不仅要求继承这些遗物，还希望收回曾经属于这个家族的捐赠给寺院的土地。

original: Rule in favor of the disciple.
Rule in favor of the Monastery.
Support the lay family of the monk.
Powerful Monastery in [Root.GetName]

The monasteries of [Root.GetName] harbor some of the oldest and finest lineages in [Root.Owner.Country.GetName] and have therefore always been influential. They have, however, over the years come to grow more and more powerful and have also come to cultivate a disturbingly close relationship to other powers in the region. It is hard by now to find any person of influence in one of the monasteries that do not come from one of the richer noble families in the region. Monastic discipline is important but attacking a powerful Monastery as entrenched as this is not done lightly, a tempting option is to simply ally with the monks and let them lend their power to ours.
translation: [Root.GetName]地区的寺庙流传着[Root.Owner.Country.GetName]最为古老和优秀的血统，并因此有着强大的影响力。随着时间的推移，他们的力量愈发强大并开始和地区内其他力量勾结。这些寺庙中但凡有着较高影响力的僧侣，无一不是出自当地豪强家族。宗教戒律固然很重要，但贸然对抗这种根深蒂固且割据力量雄厚的宗教势力恐怕并非明智之举。与他们结盟并要求分享权力才是明智之举。

original: A cleansing is required!
translation: 有必要进行一场大清洗！

original: Seek the blessing of the monks.
Ignore the situation.
Banditry in [Root.GetName]

Bandits have been harassing the province of [Root.GetName] for quite a while now, roads are unsafe and traders have been avoiding the area and taking alternate routes to get past. As local authority isn't as strong in this area as in some other parts of our Empire the brigands have been able to continue unchecked for now. This has become a matter of some concern even outside of the area as the leader of the band has been gaining a reputation as a leader of resistance against central power in general.\nLocal authorities have reached out to the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] for help to deal with the problem before it spreads.
translation: 由于土匪们对[Root.GetName]省的长期骚扰，道途危险使得商队们避开此地并绕行。相比于帝国境内其他地区，当地政府的软弱无能使得劫匪们在此地畅行无阻。随着这股盗匪势力的不断增强，他们开始对抗政府管理，并已经引起周边地区的担心。\n当地政府派出代表觐见[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]并寻求帮助以对抗盗匪并防止其流窜至别处。

original: We need to deal with these thieves.
translation: 我们需要处理这些小偷。

original: Let the local authorities handle it.
State help will help conclude this matter without diverting local funds. The process can be speeded up by decreasing local autonomy.
translation: 国家救助不需要转移当地的资金就结束这件事。可以通过减少地方自制度来加快结束进程。

original: Left to their own devises authorities will have to divert part of the local income to catch the bandits. The process can be speeded up by decreasing local autonomy.
translation: 留给他们自己的当局处理的话，他们将不得不转移部分当地收入来抓住强盗。减少地方的自治度可以加速这一进程。

original: Bandit leader caught in [Root.GetName]

The campaign in [Root.GetName] to catch the leader of the bandits in the area has finally proved successful. During the hunt for him his popularity has only increased, however, and it is clear this is a very dangerous man to be alive. The commander of the troops that caught the man recommends that we kill him now and not risk that he may one day incite those who idealize him to revolt against us. One of our ministers, however, wishes to remind [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] that to save a life is better than building a seven level pagoda.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]进行的抓住匪首的活动最终被证明是成功的。在抓住他的过程中，他的个人声望不断提升，很明显，这个人的存在是个危险。抓住他的部队指挥官建议立即杀了他，否则不日他将可能有煽动信徒叛乱，然而我们的一个部长提醒我们救人一命胜造七级浮屠。

original: Kill them all.
Risk martyring the bandits.
Banish him and imprison his followers.
translation: 放逐此人，囚禁他的追随者。

original: The Bandit leader may return one day.
translation: 强盗首领有一天会回来。

original: Bandit Leader Returns

The man we once banished for banditry in one of our provinces seems to have returned to our country, ready to once again make life hard for our local subjects. There is still a lingering popularity in some parts of the country and it is feared he may make good use of this to avoid the authorities once more.\nBy all accounts, however, he is an older and weaker man now and while the situation is still problematic it seems clear he cannot go on for long this time.
translation: 我们某个省份因盗贼行为被放逐的那个人好像已经回来了，并且准备再次涂炭当地的民众。在该国的部分地区仍然有挥之不去的名望，我们害怕他可能利用这一点再次躲避当局。\n不过据说他现在是一个年老体弱的人了，虽然形势依然严峻，但是很明显他这一次不能长久了。

original: Ok.
The Myth Lives on

The reputation of the bandit leader we had executed a few years ago has refused to die with him. While his band of brigands can no longer terrorize traders and endanger the integrity of our roads the myth of the bandit leader has grown out of all proportion. Eventually his fate will surely be one of many old stories told to young kids with little meaning, right now, however, it is a story told to ridicule [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] rule.
translation: 被处决的强盗首领的声望依然存在！然而他们再也不能勒索商人和阻碍商道了，匪首的神话般存在已不再。最终他的宿命成为毫无意义的睡前故事，现在，这只是个用来嘲笑[Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]统治的故事。

original: Ok.
Foreign Emissary Insults [Root.Monarch.GetName]

The emissary of one of our neighboring countries has given grave affront to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] by refusing to participate in a ceremony he was invited to attend. [Root.Monarch.GetName] is furious and while there can be some doubt as to if the slight was deliberate or not the public clearly sees it as such.\nIf we do not publicly condemn the ambassador we risk losing face, the council of ministers, however, urge caution.
translation: 我们邻国的一个使节拒绝参加典礼，这对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来说是奇耻大辱。[Root.Monarch.GetName]很是气愤，然而这到底是有意为之还是另有隐情确实令人怀疑。\n如果我们不公开谴责使臣，我们将有伤尊严，然而内阁要求我们小心行事。

original: Publicly deride the ambassador.
A ruler must never lose [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] temper.
translation: 作为统治者要克制[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]脾气。

original: The [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] accused of favoritism

It is with great pleasure that [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] have watched some of [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] childhood friends climb the state hierarchy but now this has made us the target of accusations of favoritism. The local governor of [Root.GetName] has been singled out by these accusations and the situation would undoubtedly be defused by replacing him no matter how competent he has been on that post.
translation: [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]很高兴看到[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]儿时伙伴晋升至国家层级，但是现在这使得我们被指控徇私枉法。[Root.GetName]当地官员因为指控被牵涉进来，毫无疑问解雇这位有能力的官员将能平息此事。

original: His services are required by the state.
We must avoid favoritism at all cost.
translation: 为了公平我们愿意付出任何代价。

original: The Laws of [Root.GetName]

Pali law is generally practiced in one form or another in many Buddhist countries and especially among the Theravada ones. While these laws are not collected and written down by the states themselves they do vary from country to country and at times a collection will have to be updated or renewed. A wise monk has undertaken such a collection recently in [Root.GetName] and has produced an updated version of one of the most commonly used law collections in our country.\nAs the collection itself builds upon actual cases it can, however, be seen as quite an up to date commentary on the rulings of [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 巴利法典普遍以一两种方式盛行于佛教国家尤其是上座部佛教国家。然而这种法律并没有被汇编写成文字，在不同国家也不尽相同，有时还不得不更新或者恢复它。最近一位博学的僧侣已经在[Root.GetName]着手进行这种法律的汇编，并且已经修正了流行于我国的法律汇编。\n因为这份汇编本身是基于当前国情而写的，它完全可以被看作是对[Root.Monarch.GetName]统治的最新评价。

original: Excellent! Promote these laws.
As our ruler has not been fair to his subjects this collection of laws reflects badly upon him and will decrease our §YPrestige§!.
translation: 我们的统治者不能公正对待子民，这份法律汇编就是最好的印证，我们的§Y声望§!将会降低！

original: As our ruler has been fair to his subjects this collection of laws reflects positively upon him and will increase our §YPrestige§!.
translation: 我们的统治者公正待民，这份法律汇编就是很好的印证，我们的§Y声望§!将会上升！

original: Let us do what we can to stop this from spreading.
translation: 让我们尽一切可能阻止它的传播。

original: Lawyers at odds

Lawyers placing bets on the outcome of a legal dispute is nothing uncommon in our lands and neither is a certain degree of friendly rivalry among the professionals in a courtroom. Once such rivalry turns into actual anger and passion then the integrity of our laws is at stake.\nIt appears two lawyers, each representing powerful patrons, one a rich monastery and the other an aristocrat family of some influence, have turned a recent legal conflict about a sizable estate into a heated row. This is very unfortunate and it now falls upon [Root.Monarch.GetName] to attempt to salvage the face of both sides in a fair way without compromising the integrity of our courts.
translation: 律师们打赌我国境内的一起法律纠纷其结果并没有什么不同寻常，这也不是法庭人员的内斗。然而一旦这种争斗转变成真正的怒火，我们法律的威信将受到伤害。\n两位律师，分别代表两位有权势的庇护人，一位是富有的僧侣，另一位是有影响力的贵族，已经将最近一起关于财产的法律纠纷变成一场激烈的争吵。很不幸，[Root.Monarch.GetName]不得不开始寻找以一种公平的方式处理此事，既要能保住双方的颜面还要维护我国法律的诚信。

original: Demand a retrial with other Lawyers.
Judge in favor of the monastery.
Judge in favor of the nobles.
Compensate both parties.
A useful alliance?

Many ages ago Mongol rulers adopted the Buddhist religion and sought to spread it among their people. Over the years, however, many have returned to the old ways of the Shamans. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has always been fascinated by the legacy of the likes of Kublai Khan and the empires they once created in the name of that religion. As word reach us of a dynamic and growing Tibetan monastic order it was therefore clear to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] that this needed to be investigated.\nThe emissary of the Lama now stands before us and has explained that the Lama indeed expects that [Root.Monarch.GetName] is a reincarnation of Kublai Khan. He is also prepared to support our rule if we allow him to spread his sect in all the lands we control.
translation: 多年以前蒙古统治者接受佛教并力图将佛光传播给他的子民。尽管如此，时隔多年后许多民众已经重拾古老的萨满教。[Root.Monarch.GetName]一直醉心于忽必烈大汗的遗产以及那个以古老宗教命名的伟大帝国。正如富有活力朝气蓬勃的西藏僧侣所传圣谕，很明显，对于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]来说，他要考证这一切。\n现在喇嘛的使者站在我们的面前说他们真切的希望[Root.Monarch.GetName]是忽必烈汗转世，如果我们允许他在我们的土地上传播他的宗教，他将会密谋支持我们的统治。

original: The time for change has come.
Let's stick to our old ways.
Messenger Returns from Tibet

Our Messenger from Tibet has returned with news of a powerful religious leader who has become interested in the cause of [Root.Monarch.GetName] and his dynasty. If he is to come to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], however, we must be able to do far more than just guarantee his safety. For the Lama to tie his destiny with ours we must swear that he and his future incarnations will be given the proper respect and influence in our realm and that we will create a great Monastery for him and his disciples. If we cannot make these guarantees we will have to content ourselves with receiving a delegation of monks eager to found a new Monastery in our lands.
translation: 我们的信使已经从西藏归来，带回了最新消息——一位有影响力的宗教领袖对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的事业和王朝很感兴趣。如果他来到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，我们要做的不仅仅保证是他的安全。这位领袖将会与我们同舟共济，我们一定要发誓给与他和他圆寂后的肉身以合适的尊重、在我国的影响力，为此，我们要为他和他的门徒建造一座宏伟的寺庙。如果我们不能完成保证，我们则必须接收这些渴望在我国建造新寺庙的僧侣。

original: Agree.
Accept the monks.
Shamanic Figures

Conversion from a Shamanist country to a Buddhist one does not happen overnight and a great deal of people within our borders still worship in the old ways. Eager to spread his religion, however, the foremost Lama in our country have condemned the common Shamanic figures that many common people still honor and demanded that they all be destroyed.
translation: 从一个萨满教国家转变成佛教国度并非一日之功，我国境内很多民众依然崇拜古法。尽管很多民众依然以信奉萨满教为荣，然而热切传教的先驱喇嘛们已经将萨满教僧侣定罪并且摧毁了它。

original: Burn the Figures.
Let us give them time...
Death of a Lama

Our most venerated and honored Lama has died and the search for his reincarnation has begun. While his order is certain they will be able to locate his new self quickly it is likely that some help from the state to fund the expedition would not go amiss.
translation: 我国最受尊崇的喇嘛圆寂了，寻找转世灵童的工作已经开始。尽管在他圆寂前的清晰指示下，寻访僧众可以快速定位灵童的位置。但为了保证探寻工作不会出现任何差池，或许我们应该给予资金支持这次探寻工作

original: Let us give them a hand.
I'm sure they can handle it.
translation: 我相信他们自己能应付得了。

original: Reincarnation Found
The order of our old High Lama has managed to find his new self and have enthroned him in their Monastery.
translation: 我国的僧众已经找到新的转世灵童并举行了坐床登位仪式。

original: Long may he live.
Legitimacy of Incarnation Questioned
translation: 肉身佛像的正统性受到质疑。

original: The intricacies of rebirth can sometimes be lost on the simpler minds. Even though his order insists that their new Lama is a reincarnation of their old leader some people in the countryside have been very hesitant to accept this fact. As they do not recognize him they fear they have been duped and on a few occasions tensions have risen to the point of armed conflict.
translation: 对于平凡大众来说达赖的重生难以理解。即使高僧们坚称他们的新达赖就是已故去老达赖的转世，然而一些乡民对此非常怀疑。他们不承认新的领袖，并认为受到了愚弄，并且在一些场合已经发生了武装冲突。

original: Send envoys to convince them.
Send troops to convince them.
Sri Lanka

The Island of Lanka, recently conquered by our troops, is full of rich Buddhist monasteries and society seems to be practically run by the monks within them. As [Root.Monarch.GetName] has finally gotten to visit them he stands in awe before the economic and cultural wealth of the monastic orders.
translation: 我国军队最近征服的斯里兰卡岛实际上是一个佛教徒治理的国家，境内遍布豪华的寺庙。 [Root.Monarch.GetName]终于得以访问此地。寺庙浓厚的文化和富足的经济让他深深感到敬畏。

original: We must make this part of our culture!
Plunder the Monasteries!
Religious Guidance

The island of Lanka has been the source of a strong Theravada Buddhist tradition for centuries. It is in many ways a model society for a Theravada state and its thriving Monastic communities are the envy of the Buddhist world.\nWhile our own state also follows the Theravada way our laws and traditions are a patchwork of local traditions, ideas from competing Buddhist schools and we lack the strong Monastic infrastructure of the island. Our ministers suggest that in order to remedy this we should send an embassy to Sri Lanka and ask that they send us monks to carry their Theravada traditions to our country.
translation: 上座部佛教在斯里兰卡岛已经盛行几个世纪之久了。在许多方面斯里兰卡都是上座部佛教国家的楷模，它繁荣的僧侣团体令每一个佛教国家羡慕不已！\n我国也是一个信奉上座部佛教的国家，在法律和传统方面我国就是当地传统、信念和相互抵触的佛教流派思想的融合，然而我们缺少斯里兰卡那样宏大的寺庙设施。为了弥补此等缺憾，我们的大臣建议我们派遣使者前去斯里兰卡请求他们派遣僧侣给我们带来上座部佛教传统。

original: Let us send an embassy.
No, we must support our local sects!
translation: 不，我们必须支持本地宗教！

original: An Embassy from [From.GetName]

Thriving Monastic communities, holy sacred relics as well as a long tradition of how to handle the coexistence of monastic and regal power make us the envy of many Theravada rulers. It is therefore no surprise that the [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.GetName] should aspire to imitate our greatness. The [From.GetAdjective] embassy that arrived today asks that we allow a number of their monks to travel to our country and receive ordination here in order to bring our traditions to [From.GetName].
translation: 繁荣的佛教团体，神圣的宗教奇迹！宗教权利和皇权和平共处已是我国多年的传统，这令众多上座部佛教国家统治者羡慕不已。毫无惊奇，[From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]希望模仿我们。[From.GetAdjective]的使者已经到达我国，并请求我们允许他们派遣僧侣到我国学习，以此来给[From.GetName]送去我们的传统。

original: Allow it.
They shall do no such thing!
[From.GetAdjective] Answer

The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.GetName] has allowed 40 monks to receive ordination in [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] country. He has also sent a group of monks directly from his lands to ours to ensure that the Theravada traditions are transfered in a sensible way.
translation: [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]已经允许派遣40名僧侣去[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]国家学习传统。他也已经直接派遣一群僧侣来我国学习，这样可以以一种合乎情理的方式向他们国家传播传统。

original: Great.
[From.GetAdjective] Answer

The [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle] has sent word that he will not allow our monks to learn the ways of Lankan Buddhism nor will he help us in any other way to develop our religious institutions.
translation: [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle]已经告诉我们他不会允许我们的僧侣去学习兰卡的佛教，也不会以任何方式帮助我们发展宗教组织。

original: Ok.
Must have at least one rival to do this.
translation: 至少有一个宿敌才能这么做。

original: Must wait until §Y$DATE$§! until we can do this again.
translation: 必须等到§Y$DATE$§!我们才可以再做此事。

original: They have no Casus Belli against a country without a truce with them.
translation: 该国没有任何针对无停战期国家的宣战理由。

original: There is no province of theirs we could fortify.
translation: 他们没有省份可以让我们设防

original: We cannot upgrade the fort in this province any further.
translation: 我们不能进一步升级该省份的要塞。

original: There is no non-capital province within coring range we could seize.
translation: 可核心化范围内不存在任何我们可以夺取的非首都省份。

original: Seized Province
Promoting Investments:
Placates the local rulers, changing their Liberty Desire by $LD$ at the cost of $PRESTIGE$ prestige.
translation: 花费$PRESTIGE$威望安抚当地统治者，改变其独立倾向$LD$。

original: This will cause your subject to embargo your rivals, at the cost of $LD$ Liberty Desire.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价，你的属国将对你的宿敌实施禁运。

original: This will cause your subject to stop embargoing your rivals, removing the penalty of $LD$ Liberty Desire.
translation: 取消$LD$的独立倾向的惩罚，你的属国将不再对你宿敌实施禁运。

original: You will place your own dynasty on their throne. Changes Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价，你的家族将入主他们的王室。

original: Forces them to change their religion to yours (§Y$RELIGION$§!), changing Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价，强迫他们改信你信仰的宗教（§Y$RELIGION$§!）。

original: Forces your vassal to pay an additional $TAX$ (currently $AMOUNT|Y$¤ monthly) of their income to you as scutage, but they will no longer be called to wars.
translation: 强迫你的附庸国额外支付其收入的$TAX$（当前为每月$AMOUNT|Y$¤）作为免服兵役税，但是这样做的话，他们将不会在战争期间与你并肩作战。

original: Turning off Scutage will increase their Liberty Desire by $VAL$.
translation: 废除免除兵役税将会提升他们$VAL$的独立倾向。

original: Sends §Y$MP$§! of your monthly Manpower to your March. This will change their opinion of you by $OPINION$.
translation: 每月授予§Y$MP$§!的人力资源给你的卫戍国。这将使他们对你的好感度改变$OPINION$。

original: Builds or upgrades a fort in your march. You pay for the fort.
translation: 你支付金额在你的卫戍国修建或者升级一座要塞。

original: You will upgrade the fortress in §Y$PROV$§! to §Y$NAME$§! at a cost of $COST$
translation: 你将提升你位于§Y$PROV$§!的要塞至§Y$NAME$§!并花费$COST$

original: Changes the primary culture of a lesser union partner to yours (§Y$CULTURE$§!). It will change their Liberty Desire by $LD$. It will also cost us $DIP$£dip  due to their total development.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价，改变被联统国的主流文化为你的主流文化（§Y$CULTURE$§!）。根据他们的总发展度，这将花费 $DIP$£dip£。

original: Siphon $VAL$ of their yearly income ($AMOUNT$), which will worsen relations by $OPINION$ and increase Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 以$OPINION$的外交关系损害及$LD$的独立倾向为代价，压榨他们年收入（$AMOUNT$）中的$VAL$。

original: Reduces Liberty Desire by $LD$ at the cost of $PERCENT$ (currently $AMOUNT|Y$¤) of their monthly income.
translation: 为了降低$LD$的独立倾向，我们需要支付他们月收入的$PERCENT$（当前是$AMOUNT|Y$¤）。

original: Sends officers and army instructors to them, which will cost us $VAL$ (currently $AMOUNT|Y$¤ monthly) of their army maintenance. It will change their Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 向他们派遣军官和教官并支付$VAL$的军队维护费（当前是每月$AMOUNT|Y$¤）。这将改变他们$LD$的独立倾向。

original: The subject must give up $VAL$ of their Trade power to you. Changes Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价，属国向我们转移他们$VAL$的贸易竞争力。

original: Forcibly seizes one of their provinces within coring range. This will anger them.
translation: 在可核心化范围内强占他们的一个省份，这将激怒他们。

original: We will take §Y$PROV$§!. Their Liberty Desire will increase by $LD$ and become $LD_TOTAL$.
translation: §Y$PROV$§!将属于我们。他们的独立倾向将提升$LD$至$LD_TOTAL$。

original: Makes your Colonial nation start a war against another colonial nation or natives. You must select one of their Casus bellis.
translation: 使你的殖民地对其他殖民地或者原住民国家发动战争，你必须选择它们的其中一个宣战理由。

original: §Y$SUBJECT$§! will declare a §Y$CB$§! war against §Y$TARGET$§!.
Starts colonial elections, changes Liberty Desire by $LD$.
translation: 以$LD$的独立倾向为代价执行殖民地执政官选举。

original: Increases trade power in all the Trade company's provinces by $VAL$, while causing an annual inflation of $INFLATION$.
translation: 该贸易公司所属省份的贸易能力将提升$VAL$，同时会导致每年产生$INFLATION$的通货膨胀。

original: It will also have the following effects on the subject:
translation: \n这将给该属国国带来以下的影响：\n

original: Aspects
We would gain $KARMA$ karma, since this is the right thing to do.
translation: 我们将获得$KARMA$业力，因为这是善行。

original: §YThere are mothballed forts in your country!§!
Mothballed fortresses have no garrison to defend them and will quickly fall to enemy besiegers.\n\nThe following forts are currently mothballed:
translation: 闲置的要塞没有卫戍部队，很快就能被围城的敌军攻占。\n\n下面是当前处于闲置的要塞：

original: Subject Turns Against You

Our warmongering, so they say, has caused ire among our subjects. As the rumors go then they think we care little for ruling justly and more about conquering like barbarians. As false and rude as they are it would be unwise to leave this be.
translation: 据说我们的好战已经引起了我们属国的不满。流言蜚语四起，他们认为我们不关心正义的统治方式而只是像野蛮人般的征服领土。他们虚伪且粗鲁的，让这种情况依然存在是不明智的。

original: Make an example out of them.
I am sure we can smooth things over.
translation: 我确信我们能平息事态。

original: Liege Makes Example of You
Due to malcontent our liege has seen fit to make an example out of our nation. It is a disgrace.
translation: 由于搞到不满，我们的宗主国决定要对我们国家杀鸡儆猴。这简直是一个奇耻大辱。

original: An eye for an eye...
Loyal Subjects

It is well known that our subjects are some of the most content and loyal in the world. To drive a wedge between us and them is thankfully virtually impossible, and as such it does reflect well on our nation.
translation: 我国子民的忠诚和满意度举世皆知！再也没有人能离间我们了，这是我国繁盛的最好证明。

original: This time will be remembered
This should be exploited
Disloyal Subjects

It is no secret that the animosity between us and our subjects are a dire one indeed. In our court the halls runs red with blood and black with secrets as hatreds flourish. Naturally this has to be dealt with.
translation: 这一点已经不是什么秘密了，我们和属国间存在着很深的敌意。我们的法庭充斥了鲜血和黑色秘密，怨恨在这里滋生。我们必须处理它！

original: Let it be
Deal with it
Cannon Fodder

It appears our country is getting rather empty and lacking in a very important resource: Cannon fodder. Fear not! While we may lack this resource then one of our subjects have plenty of fresh meat for the battlefields. Should we force their servitude they would be less than pleased, but such is the way of things.
translation: 我们的国家缺少一种重要的资源：炮灰。无须担心。虽然我们缺少这种资源，但我们的其中一个属国可以为战场提供新鲜血肉。假如我们强制征召他们，他们将不会对此感到愉悦，但这就是事物运转的方式。

original: Guns need men to fire them
We cannot risk antagonizing our subjects
translation: 我们不能冒险让属国敌视我们

original: Cannon Fodder
It seems our liege has seen fit to force the servitude our subjects to make up for foolish leadership. Our fields grow emptier and will probably remain that way.
translation: 看来我们宗主已经决定对我们进行强制征召。我国变得更加空虚，而且这种情况可能还将持续。

original: This is an outrage!
An Extra Tax

It would be an understatement to say our economy is performing 'poorly', in fact some would say this is a disaster. While we struggle to make ends meet our subjects, of all people, are doing more than well. Perhaps we are not taxing them enough.
translation: 保守来说我们的经济表现很差，事实上对一部分人来说这就是灾难。就在我们挣扎于收支平衡时，偏偏有些人，譬如说，我们的属国还过着美滋滋的生活。或许我们还没对它们征收足够多的税。

original: An extra tax might help
translation: 一笔额外收入总是好的

original: We don't need them
An Extra Tax
Our liege has required us to pay a large sum of gold to help repair their failing economy.
translation: 我们的君主要求我们支付大量的金钱来恢复他们失败的经济。

original: Damn them!
Rightful Ownership

Our rightful land in [rightful_province.GetName] sits underneath the rule of our liege. This is an unseemly situation and if continued we will only be cast further under their shadow. This cannot be allowed, we must have our rightful land back!
translation: 我国的领土被我们的宗主国非法占有，如果这种不合理的形势继续下去我们将持续笼罩在宗主的阴影之中。真是天理不容，我们一定要夺回我们的合法领土！

original: Request it
Let it be
Rightful Ownership

Of late one of our subjects has seen fit to remind us of the tensions caused by us owning land in [rightful_province.GetName], that they view as rightfully theirs. Handing it back to them would show us to be a benevolent power, however, such a move could also weaken us.
translation: 最近我国与其中一个属国陷入了领土纠纷，他们把我们的一些土地视为他们的合法领土。归还纠纷领土，会展现我们的仁慈之心，然而，这样做也会削弱我们的国力。

original: It is theirs by right
It is ours and always will be
Rightful Ownership Refused!
Our request to get our rightful land back was denied! This is an outrage!
translation: 我国对合法领土的索回遭到拒绝！这是暴行！

original: Damn them!
Subject is Tired of War
It would seem that with our wars that one of ours subjects have been destabilized quite a bit. Of course we could just let them handle it, but it would be a show of good faith if we aided them.
translation: 看起来持续的战争已经使我们的一个属国国内局势严重动荡。当然我们可以让他们自己处理，但是给与帮助会展现出我们的善意。

original: Send aid
Let them fend for themselves
Liege Sends Aid
Our liege has seen fit to send aid so we can rebuild our country after the wars.
translation: 我们的君主给予我们救助，我们可以在战后重建家园了。

original: Send thanks
Economic Freedom
Now that we are no longer subject to another country's whims we can conduct our own trade policies and won't have to live from circumventing trade regulations and smuggling.
translation: 现在我们再也不受任何国家的妄想支配，我们可以执行我们自己的贸易政策，从而远离失效的贸易管理和猖獗的走私。

original: Ok.
End of Embargo
With the Embargo gone our smuggling bussiness has regretfully died.
translation: 随着禁运的停止，我们的走私活动也随之销声匿迹。

original: Tyrant Overlord
Returned Rightful Province
Benevolent Overlord
Scutage Benefits
Loyal Subjects
Our subjects are loyal and that makes diplomacy go smoother.
translation: 我们忠诚的属国让我们的外交更加顺利.

original: Disloyal Subjects
Our subjects are disloyal and that makes diplomacy a bit more difficult.
translation: 我们不忠的属国让我们的外交变得有些棘手.

original: Castramentation

Wherever there's war, there's fortresses. Some are temporary, field fortifications that are abandoned after the war has been won or lost. Others are permanent fortification, with great, solid walls which provide a sturdy defense against all that is thrown against them, be it men, cannon balls or other projectiles. Improvements on fort maintenance lead to better forts and makes it cheaper and easier to maintain our first line of defense, the forts.
translation: 哪里有战争,哪里就有要塞.有些是暂时的,有些要塞在战争胜利或失败后被废弃.另一些却是永久的,巨大的坚实的城墙提供了健全的防御来抵御任何攻向他们的东西,无论是士兵,炮弹或是其他抛射的武器.进一步改善要塞的维护问题能使要塞运作的同时花费更少的钱进行维护,并使它更容易成为我们进行防御的第一道防线.

original: Land Reform

Many ancient rights and customs lie in the way of developing the lands under our control. We must undertake a sweeping land reform to ensure that all lands in our country are organized and held in such a way as to make developing them to their furthest potential as easy as possible.
translation: 在我们的国土上，许多陈旧的权利和习俗妨碍我们进一步开发土地.我们必须进行一场彻底的土地改革来保证我们所有土地处在高效管理下,并进一步开发它们的潜力.

original: Peasants with Pitchforks

The constant discontent among the lower classes and our incapability to deal with it has brought us to the brink of riots. We are badly equipped to deal with this, and are urged to take the matter to the Emperor, to see if we can get some sort of help. Manpower and gold is what we need to extinguish the fires that smolder and rage in the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 不满在下层阶级中不断积聚，但是我们无力解决它。这使我们处于暴乱的边缘。我们缺乏必要的装备，因此我们强烈建议把这件事报告给皇帝陛下，看看是否能得到某些帮助。我们需要军队和金钱来扑灭这场即将在[Root.Capital.GetName]街上爆发的叛乱。

original: Ask the Emperor for help.
Scrape together what little men we have and deal with it ourselves.
translation: 集合我们仅有的人力，让我们自己解决这个危机。

original: To Destroy Rebels, Or Not
translation: 消灭叛乱者，或置之不理

original: The free city of [From.Country.GetName] and their problem with the lower classes has forced them to ask us for help. The messenger spoke of fires smoldering and raging in the streets of [From.Capital.GetName] as a metaphor for the discontent and likely rebels that the free city struggles with. They humbly ask for manpower and gold, so that they may be able to deal with this swiftly and efficiently.
translation: [From.Country.GetName]的自由市以及他们与下层阶级的矛盾迫使他们向我们求助。信使提到[From.Capital.GetName]街头积蓄的不满以及一触即发的叛乱如暗火一般肆意蔓延，令自由市深陷泥潭。他们谦卑地向我们寻求军队和金钱的帮助，或许他们有能力迅速高效地解决这件事。

original: It's a reasonable request, and one we will honor.
translation: 这是个合理的要求，我们将响应他们。

original: The problem is deeper within [From.Country.GetName] and until they realize that, we will not send help.
translation: 这个问题在[From.Country.GetName]根深蒂固。除非他们认识到这一点，否则我们不会提供援助。

original: [From.Country.GetName] is told that we will help.
[From.Country.GetName] is told that we refused to help.
translation: [From.Country.GetName]得到消息，我们拒绝帮助他们。

original: The new Emperor will be coronated in [This.Country.GetName].
Help to Crush Rebels, or Not?

For every day the discontent grows and no matter how we try to use the men we have at our disposal, once one fire is quenched another smolders into flames before our eyes. Where is that messenger? We hope our humble request from [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] will not anger [From.Monarch.GetHerHim], but that [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] will agree to help us.
translation: 不管我们投入多少军队，不满的情绪每天仍在上升，即使镇压了一场叛乱，另一场又会在我们面前爆发。那个信使在哪？我希望我们来自[From.Monarch.GetName][From.Monarch.GetTitle]的谦卑请求不会激怒[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]，而是说服[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]来帮助我们渡过难关。

original: Manpower and gold, just what we needed!
translation: 军队和黄金，正是我们需要的！

original: [From.Monarch.GetTitle] claims the problem is too deep to be solved with manpower and gold...
translation: [From.Monarch.GetTitle]宣称这个问题已经无法用区区军队和金钱来解决了……

original: The Coronation Occurrence

[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle] [PAP.Monarch.GetName] placed the Imperial Regalia in the hands of the new emperor of Holy Roman Empire, a symbol of the [PAP.Monarch.GetTitle]'s right to crown Christian sovereigns and the emperor's role as protector of the Roman Catholic Church. It was a great honor to be selected as the location for the coronation, and the church of [Root.Capital.GetName] could barely hold all the dignities that had gathered to see the emperor crowned.
translation: [PAP.Monarch.GetName][PAP.Monarch.GetTitle]将帝国皇冠交到神圣罗马帝国新皇帝手中，象征着[PAP.Monarch.GetTitle]加冕一位基督教君主为帝国皇帝和罗马天主教会的保护者。被选中作为举办加冕典礼的地方是一件非常荣耀的事，[Root.Capital.GetName]教会几乎将所有的尊严，聚集在为皇帝加冕上。

original: We are blessed indeed!
The Treaty Conference

After the Treaty Conference was over, the participants thanked us for our help in assisting them with all the necessary details which surrounds such an important event, and for our neutrality in this matter. This helped them focus on the task at hand. Though we were not monetarily compensated for anything more than the expenses made for the conference, we are now considered a more prestigious country than before.
translation: 条约会议结束后，与会者感谢我们帮助他们处理围绕一个重要事件的所有必要细节，并感谢我们在这个问题上保持中立。这将帮助他们更专注于手头的任务。虽然我们在会议上损失了一笔钱，但是我们认为我们国家现在比以前更有影响力了。

original: Worth all the hassle, then.
Custom and Tax Privileges

One of the Free Cities in our vast empire is struggling, barely making enough money to keep itself away from the dreaded hole that is bankruptcy. Once they fall, they will have a hard time climbing out of the hole that they, unfortunately, has dug themselves. We could try helping them by granting them some custom and tax privileges that, if handled correctly, will allow them to make quite a bit of gold.
translation: 我们广阔帝国上的一个自由市正在苦苦挣扎，在破产的深渊旁摇摇欲坠。一旦他们倒下，他们将自食其果，经历一段漫长的时间走出经济萧条。我们可以向他们提供一些税收优惠，如果处理正确，他们就能存下一点钱。

original: Grant them custom and tax privileges.
They have not deserved this.
Custom and Tax Privileges Given

The... news of us struggling by the brink of bankruptcy was a small surprise, but the big surprise was that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] had decided to help us by granting us certain common and tax privileges we doubt few other Free Cities have.
translation: 我们挣扎在破产的边缘的消息有点让我们吃惊，不过更大的惊喜是[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]决定帮助我们，赋予我们一些其他自由市所没有的税收优惠。

original: As surprising as it might be, it is a great gift!
translation: 尽管令人非常惊讶，但这是一件非常棒的礼物！

original: Wellborns with Weapons

Land-owning nobles in [Root.Capital.GetName] dislike our Free City status, and lately we have tired of trying to keep them happy. Had they been mere peasants, armed with pitchforks and torches and with little military training, we would be able to deal with any revolt they might produce. But these are men and women familiar with war and weapons of all sorts, and should not be underestimated. The only one they might listen to is the Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire...
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName]拥有土地的贵族不喜欢我们自由市的地位，最近我们已经厌倦了试图让他们满意。如果他们仅仅只是手持干草叉和火把，没有受过军事训练的农民，我们能够应付他们产生的任何反抗。但这是一群熟悉战争和各种武器的贵族，他们不能被低估。唯一能规劝他们的也许只有神圣罗马帝国的皇帝了……

original: Ask the Emperor for help.
Give the nobles what they ask for.
Plea for Help with Rebellious Nobles

It has come to our attention that the Free City of [From.Country.GetName] is struggling with land-owning nobles that dislike [From.Country.GetName]'s status. The country asks for our help to rebuke the nobles and make them accept [From.Country.GetName] as a Free City with all that it means.
translation: 我们注意到[From.Country.GetName]的自由市与不喜欢[From.Country.GetName]地位的土地贵族展开了斗争。这个国家向我们寻求帮助制止贵族们的行径并让他们接受[From.Country.GetName]作为一个自由市应有的地位。

original: They will have our help.
translation: 他们将得到我们的帮助。

original: If they cannot handle their citizens, are they really fit to rule a country?
translation: 如果他们连自己的民众都无法安排好，又怎么适合治理一个国家？

original: Helped or Hindered?

The nobles are getting bolder, and are now trying to engage the peasants and burghers to join their revolt against us and our status as a Free City. So far, they have had little success with this but we fear, as we always do when someone are trying to shatter the peace we fight so hard to keep. What will [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] think of us? Will [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] help us with these unruly nobles?
translation: 贵族们变得越来越大胆,现在他们正试图吸引市民和农民加入他们，来反抗我们，动摇我们自由市的地位。到目前为止，他们没有取得任何成功，但是只要仍有人试图打破我们努力维系的和平，我们就无法安心。[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]如何看待我们？[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]是否会帮助我们对付叛乱的贵族？

original: The help has arrived from the [From.Monarch.GetTitle]!
'...unfit to rule...' So, no help sent then.
translation: 「……不适合统治……」所以，不会有任何帮助了。

original: City League

The Hanseatic League and the Lombard League has inspired us to inquire if any other Free Cities would be willing to enter a league together with us. We are not trying to gain an alliance with them, only see if they would be willing to cooperate with us in certain matters, such as trade, keeping imperial peace, support tribunals and, in time, perhaps even maintain a unified force.
translation: 汉萨同盟和伦巴底联盟鼓励我们去打听是否有其他自由市愿意和我们一起加入联盟。但我们无意与他们结盟，只想看他们是否愿意在某些问题上与我们合作，例如贸易，维护帝国和平，支持法律，甚至在未来必要的时候建立并维持一支联合军队。

original: Send diplomats to [This.Country.GetName]!
Work some more on this idea. It is not yet perfect.
translation: 在这方面再努力下，这还不够好。

original: The City League Suggestion

We have heard of the Leagues of old, some of which still exists. The Hanseatic League, for example, where merchant guilds have created a commercial and defensive confederation, or the Swabian League which was a mutual defense and peacekeeping association. The Free City of [From.Country.GetName] has suggested that we join something similar, a cooperation of sorts, where we collaborate in matters of trade, keeping imperial peace, supporting tribunals and perhaps later the maintenance of a unified force.
translation: 我们听说过一些旧的同盟，其中一些仍然存在。例如由诸多商人公会创造的商业和防御联盟，汉萨同盟，或者共同防御和维持和平的联盟，士瓦本同盟。[From.Country.GetName]的自由市建议我们加入这样类似的同盟，在那里我们可以进行贸易合作，维护帝国和平，支持法律并在未来的某一天建立并维护一支联合军队。

original: What do we have to lose? Nothing? Join it!
translation: 我们会失去什么吗？不会？那么加入吧！

original: It seems like a waste of time, nothing more.
translation: 这看上去就是在浪费时间，没有其他了。

original: [From.Country.GetName] will receive your agreement.
[From.Country.GetName] will receive your refusal.
Members of the City League

[From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] has agreed to cooperate with us on some matters, such as trade, keeping imperial peace and supporting tribunals. A unified force will have to wait.
translation: [From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]同意与我们在某些问题上合作，比如贸易，维护帝国和平，支持法律。但是考虑共同建立联合军队还为时尚早。

original: We are part of this Free City League!
translation: 我们是这个自由城邦同盟的一部分！

original: Declined the City League

'It is with deepest regret that [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] must refuse the cooperation with [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] of [Root.Country.GetName]...'
They will soon see the glory of our combined forces and regret that they did not join us!
translation: 他们很快会看到我们同盟取得的荣耀，并为他们拒绝加入我们的决定而感到后悔！

original: The City League Membership

The cooperation between various Free Cities, based on and inspired by leagues such as the Swabian League, the Hanseatic League and the Lombard League, seems to be working splendidly. They have agreed to work together on matters of trade, keeping imperial peace and supporting tribunals. We, as a Free City, could ask for membership in this rather exclusive club...
translation: 基于施瓦本联盟，汉萨同盟和伦巴底联盟这样的同盟而催生的众多自由市之间的合作看上去运作的十分出色。他们同意在贸易，维护帝国和平和支持法律问题上共同协作。作为一个自由市的我们，可以要求成为这个同盟的一员……

original: Send a diplomat to their leaders!
translation: 向他们的领导人派出一位外交官！

original: We have no need for this.
Potential City League Member

Our cooperation with other Free Cities works so well that we get more and more applications for membership every day! [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.Country.GetName] is one of many that wishes to join us.
translation: 我们与其他自由市合作得很好，这使我们每天得到更多的成员资格申请！[From.Country.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]就是众多希望加入我们的申请者中的一员。

original: Accept [From.Country.GetName]'s application.
Refuse [From.Country.GetName]'s application.
Cooperative Reforms

Many scholars and learned men call the Free City of [Root.Country.GetName] their home. By cooperating with their colleagues in the other Free Cities in our League, they have been able to refine their ideas and theories in ways that are of great benefit to us.
translation: 许多学者和有学问的人称[Root.Country.GetName]的自由市为他们的家园。通过与居住在我们的同盟中其他自由市的同事合作，他们有能力完善他们的想法和理论，这对我们有很大的好处。

original: Splendid!
Common and Tax Privileges Granted by the Emperor
translation: 皇帝授予公民和税收特权

original: The Emperor of the Holy Roman Empire has granted us special common and tax privileges.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝授予了我们公民和税收特权。

original: Special Privileges Granted by the Emperor
Agreed to the City League
Refused the City League
City League
Inspired by older city leagues such as the Swabian League, the Hanseatic League and the Lombard League, Free Cities in the Holy Roman Empire have agreed to join forces in some matters and cooperate.
translation: 受到例如士瓦本同盟、汉萨同盟或者伦巴第同盟等较早的城邦联盟启发，一些神圣罗马帝国内的自由市赞成在一些重要问题上相互合作团结起来形成一股力量。

original: Withheld Reform Ideas
Introduced Reform Ideas
City League Reforms
The new City League reforms is spread throughout the Free Cities and will help all of these countries achieve greatness.
translation: 新的城邦联盟改革在自由市之间传播开来，这将会帮助这些国家变得更加强大。

original: Grant Seat in $NAME$
This has the following effects:\n
Giving a province a seat in $NAME$ will give some bonus, but at every issue, a majority of the seats have to be appeased.
translation: 在$NAME$授予某个省份一个议席将会带来一些奖励，但是在每个议题上，需要满足大多数的议席。

original: Withdrawn Parliamentary Seat
The population of this province feel that they have been robbed of their rightful influence over the politics of our country.
translation: 这个省份的人们感觉他们在对我们国家政治上产生影响的权利被夺走了。

original: Rotten Borough

This Province has a seat in the Parliament despite being of relative unimportance. This has allowed those with power in the area to control the votes as the voters are few enough and poor enough to be easily manipulated.
translation: 尽管显得微不足道，这个省份仍在议会有个席位。这使得那些在这个地区里拥有权力的人能够借参选人数量稀少且软弱无力的事实以成功操纵选举。

original: Parliamentary Scandal
The capital is shaken by the actions of a visiting MP and the inability of the state to punish him for his conduct.
translation: 首都被一位前来拜访的国会议员的种种行为以及这个国家无力为此而制裁他的事实所震惊。

original: Demanding Representation

The people in this area are demanding greater representation in the central government. The movement is centered on their old provincial assemblies which they feel should be recreated at a national level.
translation: 这个地区的人们要求在中央政府获得更多的代表权。这项运动的核心在他们那些认为应该在国家层面被重新建立的旧的省级议会。

original: Hope of Representation
Recent developments have led to the people of this country to hope for a representative parliament and a written constitution.
translation: 最近的发展已经引起了这个国家的人们对于代议制议会和成文宪法的强烈渴望。

original: Rotten Boroughs

Due to its seat in parliament [Root.GetName] can boast quite an influence on the politics of our country. That seat is, however, the only thing that distinguishes the area from much richer parts of our state. This is something that the local landowners have come to realize and through a combination of bribes and threats the votes of [Root.GetName] have come to be controlled entirely by a few corrupt yet influential individuals.
translation: 由于[Root.GetName]在议会中拥有席位，它可以在我们国家的政治运作中产生相当一部分影响力。然而那个席位是这个地区唯一能够让自己在我们国家更加富庶的众多地区里脱颖而出的地方。这一切的重要性已经被当地的地主们所洞察，经过一系列的贿赂和威胁后，[Root.GetName]的选举已经被完全控制在一些腐败而有影响力的人手中。

original: Rotten!
This Parliament Seat will change its voting pattern from now on.
translation: 这个议会席位从现在起将会改变议会的选举方式。

original: We must reassign the seat.
translation: 我们必须重新分配这个席位。

original: Corruption of Vote

The MPs of the Rotten boroughs in [Root.GetName] have chosen to oppose our proposal in Parliament. It seems the landowner who controls the area has been persuaded that the issue is not in his best interest.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]腐败选区的国会议员们已经选择在议会中反对我们的提案。看来那些别有用心的人已经成功说服了当地领主，现在领主们感觉我们的提案并不符合他们的最大利益。

original: Rotten!
We must bribe the landowner then.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!
The influential University of [Root.GetCapitalName] has managed to sway the Members of Parliament of [Root.GetName] to come out in favor of increasing University funding.
translation: 富有影响力的 [Root.GetCapitalName] 大学已经成功左右了[Root.GetName] 议会中议员的意见，现在他们转而支持增加大学经费的提议了。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

Apart form being a seat of parliament [Root.GetName] is also the centre of a number of influential companies with a stake in overseas trade. It appears many of these have decided that they would benefit from the currently debated issue being implemented and have exerted pressure on their Members of Parliament to make it so.
translation: [Root.GetName]不仅在国家议会中占据一个席位，还坐落着许多涉足海外贸易的位尊权重的大公司的总部。看来它们中的许多公司已经认为，若当前议会正讨论的议题通过，他们就能够获利。并且，他们已经开始为此对议员们施加压力了。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

The army is in many ways the most influential internal force in [Root.GetName] and their loyalty to that organization has persuaded the Members of Parliament from this seat to vote in favor of the current issue out of loyalty.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]，当地军队从各方各面来说都是最具有影响力的一股地方力量，他们的忠诚说服了此席议会成员在选举中支持现在的议案。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

The current debate in Parliament on how to best protect domestic production has attracted the attention of many in [Root.GetName]. This seat of Parliament has come to support us in the debate, in the hope that it will benefit from the suggested policy.
translation: 现在议会里有关如何最好地保护国内生产的辩论已经引起了[Root.GetName]当地许多人的注意。现在这一席位已经在辩论中转向支持我们，并且期望将来能够从这项提议的政策中获益。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

As the seat of our capital the province of [Root.GetName] stands to benefit a lot from the currently proposed reforms. Luckily enough people have realized this to ensure that the seat is now voting in our favor.
translation: 作为我们的首都议会席位，[Root.GetName]省能够在当前提议的改革中获得许多好处。好在足够多的人们已经意识到了这一点，这保证了这个议席现在能够为我们的立场投票。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!
It seems the MP's of the seat of [Root.GetName] have realized how beneficial the currently debated issue would be to them. Their support for our cause is most welcome.
translation: 似乎在[Root.GetName] 议会中拥有席位的国会议员们已经意识到了目前正在讨论的议题将会给他们带来多大的好处。因此他们对于我们议案的支持越来越普遍。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

It seems the MP's of the seat of [Root.GetName], staunch supporters of our cause just a little while ago, have come to change their opinion of the currently debated issue entirely. We cannot know for sure how this happened but is clear that we can no longer rely on their vote.
translation: 似乎不久前还是我们的坚定拥护者的[Root.GetName]国会的议员们已经彻底改变了他们对这场辩论中议题的看法。究竟为何会变成这样我们无从得知，但显然我们无法再依靠他们的选票了。

original: Greed is a horrible thing.
translation: 贪婪是多么可怕的事情。

original: Rotten Borough

While it looked like the vote of [Root.GetName] would in fact come out in support of the currently proposed reform to eliminate the Rotten Boroughs in our Parliament it seems whoever supported the MP in the area suddenly realized that he was about to lose his seat. He has now managed to convince the MP to vote against our reform.
translation: 现在看来[Root.GetName]的选举确实将会转向支持目前被提议的改革——那项将会终结我们议会中腐败选区的改革提案。似乎那个支持腐败选区国会议员的人突然意识到了他将会失去他的席位。现在他正在试图说服那位国会议员来投票反对我们的这项改革。

original: Rotten!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

A determined campaign by members of the administration in [Root.GetCapitalName] to oppose the changing of laws and regulations to accommodate integration of other systems into ours have successfully convinced the MP from the area to oppose our proposition.
translation: 为了维护现行的体制，一场由[Root.GetCapitalName]官僚机构成员发起的运动正在坚决抵制有关法律法规的改革，他们已经成功说服了那个选区的国会议员反对我们的提案。

original: Ok.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!
The MPs of [Root.GetName] have been convinced by those that hold interests in the production industries of the province to oppose opening the regulations that protect them from outside competition.
translation: [Root.GetName]的国会议员们已经被那些为了维护生产制造业省份利益的人说服了，他们将反对有关开放市场的法规，以此来避免外部的竞争压力。

original: Ok.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

Many in [Root.GetName] have been quite dissapointed in the proposal to increase naval spending. They feel the area already contributes so much to the armed forces of our country and had rather expected the Parliament to authorize more funds for them than ask for more money for the navy.
translation: 许多在[Root.GetName]的人们已经对于增加海军经费的提案感到无比失望。他们认为这个地区已经为我们国家的军事力量贡献了太多，因此更期待议会能够给与他们更多的拨款，而不是为了海军向他们索取更多的资金。

original: Ok.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

The dominance of the navy in the province of [Root.GetName] has meant that the proposed increased spending on the army in Parliament has been rather coldly received there. Despite initially having been positive to the proposition the Members of Parliament from this area now see no choice but to vote against it.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]这个省份海军势力占据着主导地位，这意味着议会有关增加陆军经费的提案在这里的待遇会非常冷淡。尽管最初来自这个省份的国会议员支持这项提案，但是现在他除了投票反对这项提案以外再无选择的余地。

original: Ok.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

While initially in favor, the MPs from [Root.GetName] have declared their disgust for the current issue. It signifies a far-reaching ambition of the state to own and control everything within its borders and they say they won't stand for it.
translation: 尽管一开始赞成，但是来自[Root.GetName] 的国会议员们却已经表达了他们对于现在这个议题的厌倦。这意味着他们将不会支持这个国家完全掌控国内的任何事物这一远大目标。

original: You may very well think that. I couldn't comment.
translation: 你们最好慎重考虑一下，我先不发表评论。

original: [Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

The MPs of [Root.GetName] are surprisingly positive to our proposal in the parliamentary debate. It appears the university in [Root.GetName] is convinced it will be involved in the counting and measuring that the current proposal entails and scholars are delighted for the opportunity to take part of some new raw data regarding our country.
translation: [Root.GetName]的议员们格外积极地支持我们在议会上的提案。看来[Root.GetName]的大学深信他们能参与这个提案所需的统计和计量工作，学者们十分乐意把握获取关于我国的新鲜原始数据的机会。

original: Ok.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

Voting in favor of increasing taxes has been a very tough sell in [Root.GetName]. After numerous protests the MP from the area has withdrawn his support for our proposition and is now opposing it fearing for his reelection.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]投票赞成增加税收已经变成了一项十分艰难的举措。在当地爆发许多的抗议之后，来自这个地区的国会议员已经撤回了他对于我们提案的支持，并且现在由于担心他的落选转而开始反对我们的提案。

original: Ok.
City Life

As representatives of areas that are sometimes quite distand from [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] many MPs often find that life in the capital during their visits is very different to what they are used to. Some find it both cramped and filthy and many seem quite relieved when they get to return home.\nThis year has proved even harder than usual to endure for the delicate sensibilities of our MPs. The hot months have been unusualy hot, the wet months unusually wet and the cold months unusually cold. A number of MPs have now decided that they have had enough and have approached us asking to help make their stays more pleasant.
translation: 由于代表们有时来自于距离首都[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]十分遥远的地区，许多国会议员经常发现在他们拜访首都期间的生活和他们习惯的家乡生活有很大不同。一些人发现首都的生活拥挤而且脏乱，而对于大多数人，似乎当他们回到家乡的时候感到如释重负一般。\n今年已经表明我们的国会议员们在这种微妙的感触中比往年更加难以忍耐。炎热的几个月变得异常闷热，潮湿的几个月变得异常渗人，寒冷的几个月变得异常严寒。许多国会代表们已经表示他们彻底受够了，并且已经前来寻求我们的帮助以改善他们的情况，使得他们能够更加舒适地待在首都。

original: We must do what we can.
translation: 我们必须做我们力所能及的事情。

original: They'll have to endure like the rest of us.
translation: 他们必须学会像我们剩下的人一样忍受这种情况。

original: MP in Scandal

A minor scandal has occured in the capital during the current debate. It seems rather than attend the sessions himself one of the MPs was out disturbing the public peace and harassing his landlady. The outrage is great both among his peers and in the street and is likely to haunt future parliaments for years.
translation: 最近的议会辩论期间，首都传出一桩丑闻。似乎跟出席会议相比，某个议员更喜欢扰乱治安并且骚扰他的女房东。议会和民众都怒不可遏，这可能要影响议会好几年。

original: Let it slide.
Arrest the MP.
Absenteeism

Given its great influence over the politics of our country it would be easy to assume that all MPs attended parliamentary sessions with great enthusiasm, eager to do the most with the power they have been trusted with. This is, however, far from the case and in any given parliament there will be some that never show up, either because they are still enjoying their estates in the countryside or because they decide to partake in the many joys of the capital. The problem has grown more and more lately and we fear foreign dignitaries are laughing at us behind our backs. There are a number of measures that might be taken to increase attendence but none that the current MPs would take very kindly too.
translation: 假如我们的国家议会在政治上拥有巨大的影响力，那么很容易断定所有国会议员将会带着巨大的热情出席议会会议，并且积极地将他们被赋予的权力发挥到极致。然而现状是与此相距甚远，每当议会被召开的时候这里总有一些人永远也不会出席。要么是由于他们一直沉浸在自己的乡村别墅里，要么是由于他们深陷于首都各种各样的娱乐活动中。这个问题最近变得越来越严重，而且恐怕外界的政要正在我们的背后偷偷嘲笑我们。在这里我们可以采取一些措施来提高议会的出席率，但是显然在这群国会议员中没有一个人会乐意这样去做。

original: Fine the worst excesses.
translation: 惩罚那些最荒淫无度的家伙。

original: There's nothing we can do.
Demands for Representation

A number of hostile publications have begun to circulate in the cities of [Root.GetName]. Anonymous, yet very critical, authors claim that our the government is 'Autocratic' and demand both a written constitution and a parliament where the various parts of our country can be represented.
translation: 一些怀有敌意的出版物已经开始在[Root.GetName]的城市中传播。一些匿名的，然而十分批判的作者声称我们的政府是“独裁”的，并且要求我们既要推出一份成文的宪法又要建立一个能够广泛代表各个地区的议会。

original: Ban the Publications
Make vague promises of Reform
translation: 做出含糊的承诺会进行改革

original: Financial Aid

Due to the current poor government finances any contribution to the state coffers is very welcome. It is therefore with some enthusiasm that we receive the representatives of a number of rich city assemblies offering to help. Their price, however, is greater representation in government in general and formalized ways for the state to ask for their help in the future.
translation: 由于目前政府非常贫乏的财政，任何对国库的贡献都是非常珍惜的。因此我们收到了一些来自富裕城市募集的热心援助，然而他们也提出了要在政府中拥有更多的代表这个条件，并且正式规定国家在未来向他们寻求支持的方式。

original: Grant them Greater Representation
translation: 给与他们更多的代表权。

original: Refuse their money.
Promise to take their views in consideration.
translation: 承诺将会考虑他们的建议。

original: Refuse their money.
Demands of the [Root.Culture.GetName]

While our country lacks a national parliament, local assemblies exist since ancient times in many of our provinces. These have little influence outside of their own provinces but they will sometimes approach the state and their existence allows for a more efficient taxation of the provinces.\nLately trouble have been brewing in [Root.GetName] where a number of such provincial assemblies have recently begun to demand representation at a national level. They feel that they are poorly represented by the central government and that a central parliament where they could offer their opinions to the ruler would be the only way to alleviate this.
translation: 由于我们的国家缺乏一个国家议会，而在我们的很多省份从很久以前就存在了一些地方议会。这些地方议会在他们自己的省份之外几乎没有影响力，但是他们将来有时会遇到涉及国家层面的问题，并且出于对他们自身的考量这些省份需要一个更加有效的课税体系。\n最近在[Root.GetName]就酿成了麻烦，一些地方省议会最近已经开始要求在国家层面具有一定的代表权。他们认为目前他们在中央政府的代表影响力微乎其微，因此他们呼吁建立一个可以让他们向统治者提出建议的中央议会，他们认为这是缓和目前困境的唯一途径。

original: We will think about it.
Such ideas need to be crushed.
translation: 这种想法必须彻底丢掉。

original: Direct Contribution

Enthusiastic about the currently debated issue in parliament a group with their interest very much aligned to ours from [Root.GetName] have come to make a direct contribution to the state. It is their hope that the money can be put to good use to 'convince' any MPs that are still opposed or at least compensate us for any such costs we have had up until now.
translation: 一个来自[Root.GetName]的对目前在议会中辩论的议题十分关切的团体，他们的利益与我们的政见非常吻合，最近他们给这个国家带来了一笔直接捐款。他们希望这笔钱能够很好地用于“说服”任何仍然反对我们的国会议员，或者至少补偿我们到目前为止已经付出的任何代价。

original: I'm sure we will find a use for it.
translation: 我相信我们将会把这笔钱派上用场。

original: Parliamentary Traditions

One of the more difficult things about being a parliamentarian has nothing to do with the debates in the capital but rather how to sell the new laws to the people back home. Still a local MP will often have an easier time to explain a new tax than the collector sent by the central government would in less representative systems.\nIt seems the MPs in general and the ones from [Root.GetName]in particular have become so adept at defending policies that we can see a rise in the support of the central government as a whole as a result.
translation: 成为一个与在首都的辩论毫无关系的国会议员并不是一件难事，恰好相反，如何向家乡的人们推行新出台的法律政策是一件更加困难的事情。在代议制下，一位地方议员通常会比一位由中央政府派遣的征税官更加容易解释一个新出台的税法。\n大体上，国会议员们似乎已经变得十分善于拥护政策，尤其是来自于[Root.GetName]的议员。因此我们可以预见到结果——议会对于中央政府的支持程度在整体上将会越来越高。

original: They finally understand me!
Support of local Assembly

The local assembly in [Root.GetName] has been quite enthusiastic in their support of our current proposition in parliament. So much so that they have already begun with the necessary preparations for what they are certain will be a certain approval.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的地方议会已经在议会中非常热心地支持了我们最近的提案。他们已经开始着手于必要的准备以确保他们将会随时成为我们的坚定支持者。

original: Remarkable.
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

Citing their eternal loyalty to the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] and their full confidence in [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] ability to know what is best for our state the MPs of the seat of [Root.GetName] have come out in support of our position in Parliament. Their support for our cause is most welcome.
translation: 出于他们对于[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的永远忠诚，以及他们完全相信[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]能够做出对我们的国家来说最有利的选择，[Root.GetName]议席的国会议员们已经开始在议会中支持我们的立场。他们的支持对于我们的事业来说是求之不得的。

original: Great!
[Root.GetName] changes stance in debate!

Citing their mistrust of [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] and [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] ability to know what is best for our state the MPs of the seat of [Root.GetName] have reversed their support of our position in Parliament.
translation: 出于他们对于[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的不信任，以及质疑[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]是否有能力做出对我们的国家来说最有利的选择，[Root.GetName]议席的国会议员们在议会中已经颠覆了他们以前支持我们的立场。

original: Their lack of trust is disturbing.
translation: 他们对我们的不信任令人担忧。

Trade
Government

$BUILDING|Y$ is obsolete due to your technology level and has been superseded by $NEW|Y$.
translation: 由于您的科技水平，$BUILDING|Y$已经废弃了，并被$NEW|Y$所取代

Regiments needed: $VAL$\nBase: $BASE|Y$\n
This is the minimum number of full strength regiments needed to progress the siege.
